We were given a room on the fourth floor in the back of the hotel. The hotel is more of a motel style which is fine. When walking up to get to our room the grounds are old and need an update. The walls are cracking and paint chipping. Our room was very spacious. It also smelled of mold and dust. However it did  appeared clean. The AC did not work, it was very warm, the maintenance person did come and adjust it for us, apparently the person before us ran the heater and it has to be managed by a maintenance person to switch it each time. The air filter looked as though it had never been changed it was gross to
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us. We take the time to listen to your constructive comments, so we can continually improve our services. We hope you will reconsider and give us another chance to host you to provide the quality stay that you deserve.

Summary: A very late rewiev! Stayed at this hotel from 06/07-20/7 2016 for 14 days. loved the location and staff. The hotell really needs to remove carpets and fix rooms! Was thinking about 14 days this summer as well, but prices are slightly high, when you have to travel all the way from Norway! But people.... For familys with 2 kids, this place is perfect if you wanna visit knott`s or Disney! Maybee next year:o)

Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and your continuous patronage. Summary: The hotel is in a great place, location wise.  With that said.  The hotel falls way short of the pictures they have on their site. My son was so excited to use the pool and hot tub.  Went into the pool area which was dirty and you can tell the foliage had not been taken care of.  The pool was freezing and so was the hot tub.  Went to the front desk to ask why the hot tub was not working and was told that he had to call maintenance to turn it on.  In my experience hot tubs are always suppose to be hot or at least get hot when you turn the jets on.  the entire first floor on the north side is boarded up, it looks like the hotel

Summary Heading: Hotel horribly managed but has wonderful friendly staff

No answer at frontdesk nor security for the loud guests in the pool area at least until 1am. Moved to another room next day. A/C worked. At sleeping time noticed it wasn't automatic. Again no one at desk to answer the phone. Slept in freezing cold room. Both rooms were stuffy. Breakfast was ok. I liked the room set up and building but the hotel desperately needs a new hotel management team. Has a potential to be

Summary Heading: Want to love this hotel, but....
Summary: We've stayed here twice and we really want to love this hotel but it falls short on several things. Our first stay: no hot water and terrible internet. Our second stay: no air, terrible internet, gross breakfast, pool closed without notice, no phone in room. This hotel has so much potential if someone would pay attention to detail. The hotel is currently being renovated and we stayed in the "new" rooms during both stays. Rooms were nice but little attention was given to details that would have made them so much nicer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You get 1 star for simply being safe for me and my family ,for having hot water, etc. After that you need to work to earn them.  1. AC was broken. 2. At least 2 elevators were broken. 3. Printers at business center were broken. 4. Breakfast, which was NOT included, was minimal at best.  So, the one thing I have to do, which bumps this from 1 to 2 stars, was the staff. They were polite and accommodating at every turn. The front desk guy, Rudy, even offered his own personal email when I needed to print travel documents and the business center printer was broken. The AC was out, not only for our rooms but several rooms. We were promised a maintenance person by 10 PM but no one showed. Ever.   In addition, some alarm was going off literally 24/7 while we were there. I have no idea
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback regarding your visit. YES the renovations are on going and they are having a few issues but they seem to be trying really hard to fix these problems asap, Our keycard  worked perfectly fine every time and our  room was cleaned very well everyday and  plenty of new towels left so we were overall very pleased
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the kind words. We have new lock and will be installing them this week. The rooms are being updated every day. We are working on the halll ways this week and next week to make the hotel look better.

Summary Heading: Very satisfied! Can't wait to come back!

Summary: This is tough to post as we loved this place when we stopped by about 6 years back. Apparently new ownership since then? Regardless, we came for a four night stay and wished desperately that we had sought lodging elsewhere after we checked in. Honestly I hate giving terrible reviews, but this is what yelp is about, to issue honest feedback so that future visitors can make an informed choice.  I digress.  We checked in and were given two non adjacent rooms, although we asked for such as our kids were staying in their own room; teenagers. The rooms were at least nearby. We got to our room, low and behold, the key would not function and the handle plate was lifting away from the door. Made the trek back to the front desk and oddly was now given the room next to that of our kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and sorry that the hotel we are under a renovation and will are almost done with the rooms part of this with new locks arrival on early next year. Summary: The hotel has improved a lot and everything was amazing!  It has a new look and more renovation are being done to other part of the hotel. The staff were amazing and friendly!  The location is outstanding and it even has shuttle to Disneyland to make thing more convenient

Housekeeping only brought partial sheets and expected me to make the bed.  Jack hammer.  Food was disgusting. (Holiday Inn)

Summary: Booked one night for a day trip to Knotts Berry Farm. Room is huge with 2 TVs, living room, no carpet, kitchenette. Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and so happy that you enjoyed you stay. Yes, we are updating the hotel, We just got the first 22 sofa sleeper and we will more each day. Even thou while sunbathing by the pool someone stole my friend money from the room (probably cleaner) when we went to reported to the front desk and cleaner supervisor was called all the hotel workers were speaking in Spanish didn't care we are next to themüò£ . I wouldn't recommend this hotel as a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and sorry to here about the missing money. We do take this very serious and we did talk with the Housekeeper that clean you room and we didn't think she took the money. She has been with the us for over 6 years and has never had any issue wit h in the past. Again very sorry this happens and wanted to insure you that I do care.  Thanks

Summary: I went back to Southern California for my sister funeral, and I have stayed at the Radisson several times when I go to visit California, I love the area, it's directly across the street from Knott's Berry Farm, good strip to stay on. But on this encounter, the hotel has lost it's appeal. There was a roach in my refrigerator, and mind you to say how did a roach get in the refrigerator...well it's not turned up high like it's freezing it was at room temperature. I stayed on the first floor level and upon checking in I was told that the room key works sometimes and sometimes it don't so you have to wait sometimes in order for the guy on the floor to let you into your room, and it smelled like someone just got out of the pool, that wet pool smell left in the room, the sofa was dirty
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and very sorry to here about your experience at the hotel. I am new here and trying to clean up a lot of issue here. We are improving the rooms and should be done by end of November with that said we are looking at a new locking system as well. We should have the room in order when you check in and need to do a better job inspecting the rooms.   Please accepted my apologize for the condition of the hotel!  Mike

Summary: I believe this hotel will end up being ok once they get through their remodel. Right now there are some issues that I know are being addressed as to why I only give it an average rating. It is in a great location and wouldn't "write-off" this hotel yet. Give it some time to work through their issues and I believe this hotel will stand out once again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and understanding that we are trying to make this better for everyone. I am new here and will do everything to make this hotel stand and be proud again.  Mike

Summary: The hotel was in renovations during our stay. Our room key never worked, we had crying kids after coming home late from Disneyland and had to wait 45 minutes to have a staff unlock our room. No towels, late room cleaning and not having a room key that worked for 4 days was terrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry to here that your key issue didn't. We have clean all the door lock and about 85% are working but are temperamental because of the out side elements. We have placed an order for new lock and will be a great hotel soon.

Summary Heading: An ok hotel if you don't care about sleeping well
Summary: Super nice staff. horrible rooms. and terrible breakfast buffet. Great location for Knotts Berry Farm and other attractions. The pool looked nice but we didn't use it.   The pictures on the site do not represent the room you will get. You should ask if renovations are done before booking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry we didn't take good care of you. Yes we are having a renovation which is almost done and will be done by end of the month. We arte waiting on the new couches should be here soon. We are then working on the breakfast room next month. Again Thank you very much.

Summary: This place is not the same as before. So sad. Keys not working and must be let in every time, property is run down and under partial renovation, lack of attention to any details, dirty carpets in common evlelator area, no changing of cups upon cleaning or sometimes trash, towels must be laundered then returned to you. Breakfast is expensive and mediocre at best. Not sure what is going on there now. Times where your room not available during day 10-1pm for painting. The whole thing is weird. I don‚Äôt recommend looking to close at anything there cause you‚Äôll notice all the stuff thats not exactly as it should be or has been done on the dime. This WAS such a beautiful relaxing place and so disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and very sorry about you stay. We are having some frowning pains but we will come out with a great Hotel! Again thank you for staying with us!

Summary: For a Radisson Hotel this location was a huge let down. They recently changed companies for their key system and most of the room keys would not work. We had to call the front desk every time we needed to get into our room. However, we were understanding and that was not our main issue during our stay. The day after we arrived we were gone from earlier morning until after 6 pm; when we returned our room had not been cleaned and our AC was not working properly. The next morning we talked to the front desk about our concerns and they were very polite and said they would make sure our room got cleaned and would have someone look at the AC. When we returned the AC still did not work and I would hardly say our room was cleaned the bed was made and trash was taken out however we did
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us  and sorry you had a bad stay. I am the new GM and was out on training from 10-16 and till 10-23, I am sorry my manager on duty was not there to help you. Let me talk with my staff today and I will call you as soon as I get information from my staff.   Again very sorry i couldn't get back sooner to you.  Mike

Summary: Very basic hotel ,money were stolen out of my wallet while at the pool probably by the cleaner ,reception didn't care at all told me manager is not available over the weekend ,it has been 4 days since it happened still no respond ,had to move hotel as did not feel safe ,very bad experience  !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and I am very sorry to hear about the missing money. I was out of town that week and just got back today. I question everyone who went to the rooms and no one said they had been in your item. We get cell phone and lap top turn in by housekeeping so I am very surprise ti hear about that. If I could be any more helpful feel free to call me back.  Again very sorry to hear about this.

Summary: We had stayed at this hotel before and found it comfortable and in a good location. We had no hesitation in returning, this time with our two young children. Check in was slow with one guy on the desk who wasn‚Äôt the quickest. This was also where we discovered the hotel was under going renovations and that our room key might not work! We did eventually manage to get the key working every time (sometimes on the 10th attempt!) and never had to call maintenance but all very strange.  Our biggest issue was that the hotel had sold us the room on the understanding that we‚Äôd be using the sofa bed as we had 4 people in the room. After building the sofa bed up,it was clear that it was not fit for anyone to sleep on. Not only was it very thin and ‚Äúv‚Äù shaped, it was also on a slope meaning
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is in such disrepair it was sad. I was feeling bad for the employees that kept trying but really they should all be sent home for a month. The grounds were in need of care, the floors were dirty in the room and the kitchen staff was ill prepared.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your stay due to the condition and cleanliness of the hotel, your guest room as well as the service you received from our staff at that time. This is certainly not the kind of experience we would like you to have. Your feedback is appreciated and will be forwarded to the hotel management for further improvements. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to redeem ourselves and deliver a seamless experience on your next stay.

Summary: good for the price. close to Disneyland . had a free  shuttle. pool not heated. rooms clean, good maid service everyday. nice setting around the pool. beds comfortable. staff were fine but a bit slow to fix things. close to shopping good location for knots berry farm
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us as we try to make the hotel better for everybody the room should be done by the end of October and then will be starting on the restaurant and banquet and lobby in January again thank you for staying with us and hope to see you soon

Summary Heading: So bad even the manager has left !!
Summary: My wife and I stayed here 21st/26th August (see prior very poor review)-so bad we left early and I now note that the then-manager has since left! He obviously got fed up with the never-ending complaints. Wise move!! Management is replacing carpeted flooring with very cheap laminate so is obviously aiming at the low-end market. This is such a huge mistake and has ruined what, years ago, were very comfortable, cosy suites that were a pleasure to come back to at the end of a hectic day. No more walking around in bare feet on lovely soft carpet!! Shame on a cheapskate management!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying was back in August yes the general manager did leave the hotel the first week of September I am the new general manager and I do promise you that I am doing everything in my power to clean the hotel up in to make it better again hopefully give us another chance at the end of the year thank you

Summary: Radisson Buena Park has been a hotel that has always kept my interest with the stays but this one was poor to say the least.  Entry problems, maid issues and night personal is steering me away from this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry we did not live up to your expectations ,  I do have a lot of issues going on at the hotel but I am working with all of them to make this hotel where are used to be we are looking to upgrade the Internet redo the whole restaurant and lounge the lobby the trees in the atrium as well as all the rooms thank you for staying with us and hope to see you soon

Summary: Spotty Wifi, the further you get from your room, towards the center of the hotel, the stronger the wifi.  Shouldn't it work the other way around?  Room key didn't work despite the 4 pairs they gave me.  I had not TV guide.  I had to fumble around channels and do guess work over what network I was watching.  The pool is big enough for children.  For such a prime location on a main street near an attraction like Knott's Berry Farm, I would expect a better upkeep in maintenance.  The gym is a joke.  Something like 4 or 5 treadmills none of them operational or even plugged in.  Free weights were a poultry offering  I was there for a week.  Not a great experience
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and would like to apologize about your stay. We are trying to change everything at the same time and some item have not been address. We just change to spectrum cable and are waiting them to print out channel listing, we should just do it our self. We are addressing the key issue every day and think we know what going wit them. Thank you again and hope to see you next year when everytjing will be taken care of .

Summary Heading: Fantastic service in the middle of remodel
Summary: Trouble with the room keys but the friendly staff took care of it with there eagerness and understang.  Free shuttle service to Disneyland at very convient times and closeness to down town bus makes this a great location to publicly transport to the sites in Las angeles
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry the hotel is in the middle of the remodel but it will be back to a great hotel again soon. I am glad my staff was on the ball and helpful with you during the stay.

Summary: Although the bathroom and some other parts of the room were a little outdated the bed was still comfortable and it was fairly clean.  The service was fantastic which included free transfers to Disneyland and extremely helpful staff.  The pool/spa was also great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy you enjoyed you stay. We hope to see you again after we are done with the remold.

Summary: I was so disappointed by this hotel. It's in a prime area and carries a good hotel chain name. This place is a dump! It took forever to check in because there was only 1 person and I think he was reading each person's terms and conditions or something. The keys didn't work so someone would have to unlock your door. The rooms have so much potential but they are letting them go! The floors are some cheap linoleum that supposed to look like laminate wood that I wouldn't dare walk on with bare feet! The bathroom was so old and outdated. The dresser drawer was broken and kept sliding out so I stuck some paper in the jam to keep it shut so I wouldn't hit it. The A.C. wouldn't shut off and the paint was all chipped on the walls. The bed was ok and pillows were soft. I was only staying
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry to hear about your stay. We are remolding the hotel and some item are not being address. I am the new GM here I am working on all item right now. I would like you to come back in a few months to see the new hotel and all item will be address by then.

Summary: Basically hotel staff is inconsiderate at this location. they placed a family of 4 with a 2 year old and 3 year old in a room that the room key did not work and we had to wait outside until someone could open our door EVERY TIME we wanted back in. We were the only room on the first floor where the construction was happening so we had to walk over all the debris every day and night. Along with the noise at 7:30am this was far from a great vacation which we saved all year for. NEVER AGAIN>
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry we drop the ball during your stay. I am the new general manager and we are working on improving the hotel in every way, remoldong the rooms, staff, cleanness. The rooms should be done by mid November and then we are we are working on public space.  We hope to see you again after this is finish.

Summary: Internet on 4th floor very poor in strength. The key cards had some issues with all rooms and we had to call someone everytime we wanted to enter in room. Pool was good. Overall I am not satiesfied. Will not recommend to a friend or relative.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry we did not take good care of you. We are planning to upgrade the internet when the renovation is over. I will talk with my staff to make we check the speed at different parts of the hotel to make sure it working good.

Summary: Have stayed in this hotel 3 times in the past & it was excellent.  I'm not sure what happened but it is now the complete opposite.  The room keys didn't work so we had to wait for someone let us into our room every time we needed to get in.  Supposedly they're renovating, but it looked 20 years older than the last time I stayed there 4 years ago.  The bathroom light didn't turn off so was like trying to sleep with a spotlight in your face.  Was finally fixed after asking 3 times.  They offer a free shuttle to Disneyland for which we reserved spots the night we arrived.  After waiting for 15 minutes after the scheduled 11:15pm pick up, I called the hotel to inquire when it would arrive.  It turns out they didn't have a driver so and therefore didn't bother to make arrangements to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry for the treatment. I am new manager here and have a lot of items to fix. Once all the renovation are down I am sure the hotel will look amazing again. We are working on the rooms right now and have plans to do the Breakfast room, meeting room, lobby and the courtyard in the next few months. I am starting to work on the service side now and will have the staff trained soon.  Thank you again and very sorry you had a bad experience.

Summary Heading: This hotel is Radisson in name only !!
Summary: This used to be our favourite hotel but I would now strongly recommend you avoid it like the plague !! - You can no longer call it a hotel. It is an extremely dated and very dirty place with very old and very dirty furniture. The door locks did not work and we had to wait for a staff member to come to our rooms to let us in,often for twenty minutes or more. There was dust everywhere and I had to take a dozen hangars to Recpn to be cleaned. Not once did the cleaning staff change our dirty cups during our stay - which we cut short after just a few days and moved to a proper hotel.I complained to the hotel manager, who promised to investigate and contact me very shotly afterwards.I am still waiting for his response after over 4 weeks!! No surprise there then! A new owner is
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am very sorry you feel this way. We are improving the hotel with new floor we have order new sectional for the sitting area as well as new window treatment. We are cleaning the hotel better everyday since I started at the first week of September, we still have a long way to go but we are working on a lot of issue. I hope you can give us a second look after all the items are completed  Thank you and hope to see you again..

Summary: a lot of noise. Every morning there were workers who started working around 06:30 with renovations at the hotel. The room was not cleaned properly. The door cards did not work, with no room. As a result, we had to wait for a staff member who opened the door. the kingsize bed was very hard and the sofa bed extremely thin. I do not recommend this hotel to other tourists.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and sorry to hear about the noisy during your stay. I will talk with my staff so that we take care of it better next time. I hope you will stay with us again and hope to see you after the renovation is done.

Summary: Well!!! Keys did not work for the room so every time I needed to get into room I had to call the front desk and hope that I wasn't put on hold and request that someone open my door. Almost always I had to call back more than once. When I called the Manager, he told how this was such an inconvenience and that I should be more understanding to the renovation that was going on. He offered to credit 1 night but I haven't seen that yet. Also, there was the noise of the construction that started 7:30 every morning. I guess that is why there isn't any alarm clocks in the room. And the smell, I could not tell if it was musk or mold. I would have never stayed at this Hotels with all the problems going on. I think the only think that would make me happy is a full refund, but I done see
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and very sorry you had that experience you had at the hotel. Unfortunately, we are having issue with our key card but no manager in duty should talk to you like that. I have talk with the renovation team people about start before 8 am and will reach out again. I will also check on the credit which it takes up to 5 business day to get back on your account. Again very sorry and will address all issue,

Summary: It's a shame. This was such a nice place, but it has fallen into severe disrepair. The people are so helpful, but everything (except the actual bed) was broken, leaking, dated, etc. Radisson needs to do more than just install new (cheap laminate) floors.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and glad that you see some of the things we are already doing but we are adding new couches and new window treatment to all the room. We are also painting all the room inside and out to update the feel of the room. I hope after all the renovation is done you will see the new look Radisson Hotel

Summary Heading: No key for rooms. Don't stay here
Summary: If you heard faulty towers this is it, but not funny. Don't visit this hotel. When we checked out and asked for a reduction as on two occasions we had to wait 30 minutes to get into our room, the receptionist suggested we could have stayed elsewhere if we weren't happy
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I am sorry you didn't enjoy your stay. I agree waiting 30 minutes is to long I will address this with my staff today and we are have 2 company coming out this week to look at our locks to see what we can do. Very sorry again and hope you can give us a second chance.

Summary: Had a 2 night stay since this was the official hotel of my nephew's wedding. Was given a $30 discount per night at check in due to room key situation. Electric door locks not working with key cards so room had to be opened manually by hotel staff every time we needed to get in. This was incredibly annoying. The room was basically clean but furniture beat up,unreliable WiFi,  TV in living room not working and bad sewer smell in bathroom which occurred a few times. Seemed to be coming from sink. We washed clothes in the 4th floor guest laundry but not informed that only the washer worked so had to hang wet clothes all over the room. Had breakfast buffet in the restaurant but eggs cold and generally awful! The worst was nearly missing the wedding ceremony since the promised shuttle
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry you stay was not worried free. We are looking at all option about the key issue and hope to have answer soon. I am very sorry again and hope you could give us a chance after the renovation are done.

Summary: Beautiful property and great rooms. Close to Disneyland and a block away from Knott's Berry Farm. Medieval times, Pirate dinner theater, wax museum and so many things to do within a block. Great dining nearby like Claim Jumper. Super convenient to the 91 and I-5 freeway access. Free shuttle to the park. We liked it so much we stayed a second night and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy to read about your stay. We should be down with room renovation by end of October 2017. Then we are working on the breakfast room and meeting rooms.

Summary: The hotel is horrible. The pictures in the photos were nothing like the actual hotel. It's old, the room smelled awful, a maintenance man had to pre-open our room door cause the keys didn't work. We checked out the very same night. Asked for a refund and until today, I have not seen the money put back into my account. Called them three times to see what's going on and they kept giving me the run around. Do not book your stay at this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and I will ahve ny front desk manager give the refund back to you.

Summary: Room was so so,  key cards didn't work entire time we were there which was frustrating, staff were pretty quick to respond opening doors. Tv didn't work  right, and rooms felt damp. Breakfast was pretty good, staff were nice, hotel was quiet except for construction workers who started at 700.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review. The 803Sharia and the Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group will work diligently to ensure any situation is fully investigated. We appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention. I am the new general manager and are working a lot issue to make this a great hotel.

Summary Heading: Door keys and WiFi not working
Summary: The hotel facilities and room conditions did not reflect the pictures. Our hotel room door had to be opened by staff every time during our whole stay due to tech issues. Wifi not working in room. Hotel is in need of a renovation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about our recent stay here at the Radisson Suites in Buena Park and yes we are having some challenges with our key system right now but we are working on them every day. The wifi for working in your room is an issue with me so so let me look to see if everything is working properly so this doenn't happen again. We are going through the renovation on the rooms right now and should be done by early November of this year. I hope you can give us a second chance.  Thank you,  Mike Thomas General Manager

Summary Heading: Radisson has no accountability in their service.
Summary: We as a group reserved 2 rooms for 6 nights at Radisson Suites hotel in Buena Park. CA. Upon our arrival, we were told by receptionist that there were no rooms available for us due to their A/C and room door lock being malfunctioned!!!! He did not even help us to search for alternate hotel. We were left with our own luck to find another accommodation ourselves. I have been traveling quite a lot for both business and pleasure purposes, but have never come across this shocking situation. How could they manage to stay in business with such the way they treated us??
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and I am very sorry you were treated this way, I took over the hotel on September 01 and have heard about that weekend. I wish I was here during that time and would have been handle differently. I would like for you to reach out to me after all of the renovation are done so I can show you that we are all about taking care of the guest. mike_thomas@radissonsuitesbp.com  Mike Thomas General Manager

Summary Heading: I don't recommend staying here until renovated.
Summary: The hotel needs to be shut down, renovated and then reopened.  Great location though.  None of the room keys work so you have to ask staff at front desk to let you in your room each time.  Also, there was a sign on the gate of the pool from the board of health closing it down.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us. It is good to know that our location worked perfectly for you. On the other hand, we are sorry to hear that you were not pleased with the hotel condition and the key card was not working accordingly at that time. We appreciate the feedback and will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit we can exceed your expectations.

Summary: I gave them a one because I can't give them less than that.  Currently they are under construction and no where on their website does it say this. We asked the guy what time they start working at and when they are done. He said they could start as early as 6am and end when ever they want. When we got to our room we found out the card keys do not work for any of the rooms. Apparently they have had this issue for over 3 months. We have to go to the front desk and they have to call someone to let us in our room. They also said we can't be out late since they have to get someone to let us in. Instead of telling us that the keys do not work, he says if they don't work let us know. It seems really fishy that their keys work but they can't get our room keys to work. We didn't feel safe
Manager Response: I am sorry we did not live up to your expectation during your visit. I am working on a lot of items since taking over on September 01, and will make the necessary change to fix the hotel. Please give us a second chance when the hotel is done with the renovation  Mike Thomas General Manager

Summary: Where do I begin - we redeemed points to stay here - my husband travels alot. We were supposed to get the room for 20$ and points.  When we checked in - they tried to charge us 60$.  Good thing we had the confirmation to prove that we were only supposed to pay 20$. We were then told that the key card may not work and we might have to get ahold of maintenance to be let into the room. The room was really dirty - the furniture was black stained and there was crackers stuck to the inside of the couch cushions.  The bathtub had dirt all in the bottom at the time of check in and the toilet handle broke and we had to fix it ourselves in the middle of the night. We put the do not disturb sign out and housekeeping came into the room anyway and cleaned. Which means they touched all my
Manager Response: Hi David:  We appreciated your comments on TripAdvisor but are sorry you encountered keycard and Housekeeping issues during your stay.

Summary Heading: Do not stay here room odor horrible!
Summary: We have stayed at many Radisson all clean nice hotels. This Radisson was gross...room smell is horrible sticks to your clothes even after you leave. Room keys don't work and staff has you waiting endlessly to get you into your room. Switching rooms did not solve the issue either same problems. This was such a disappointment. Pictures online very deceiving. Pool area was all dead trees.
Manager Response: Hello Acrobarrett:  Please accept our apologies for the odor and keycard issues you encountered during your last visit to our hotel.

Summary: The hotel looked a lot better on line than in person. First room door lock did not work, had to be let in the room when ever needing to go back? Very inconvenient. The room smelled weird as did the room they moved us too? Mildew mold?
Manager Response: Hi Diane:  We're sorry you had keycard and odor issues during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary Heading: In desperate need of attention to detail!
Summary: It's taken me a couple of weeks to write this review since returning from my holidays as my ipad decided not to work! My family and I stayed here for 4 nights at the end of our holiday at the beginning of August. I don't really want to run this hotel down to the roots but I will give an honest review as a customer. Upon arriving at the hotel, driving Upton the foyer the hotel's gardens outside were very overgrown and need cutting back. Good check in service and we were made aware of the keys not working properly, after 3 attempts, asking the maids we went back to the reception to let us into our rooms. Maybe we were one of the lucky ones who had a renovated room but it still needed tricking, exposed hole in the wall (pipe work) in the wardrobe, tap that continually leaked and
Manager Response: Hello Knighty46:  We regret the troubles you had recently in our hotel.    Your feedback about the keycards, landscaping, furniture and overall condition of the property will certainly be used to improve our facility and services.  I do read all of these reviews, as there is no secretary on staff here at the hotel and I welcome the opportunity to discuss your concerns at any time!  Regards,  Rod

Summary: Freaking terrible. I have been to this hotel before and it was never this bad. Ffs the ac was broken in the old room and the new room they transferred us to. We lugged our items around. The ac was broken and leaking. Our key cards werent opening our doors or any amenities! So we had to wait for house keeping to open our room. The window wouldnt open and the cherry on top- having a late check out at 3 p.m confirming the late check out at 3 p.m and then being told at 11:30 you had an HOUR to leave!
Manager Response: Hello tahmidaa:  Please accept our apologies for the keycard, AC and late checkout issues during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: Hotel is being renovated which is good, it needs updating!  People were great,  pool was refreshing and food in the breakfast buffet was excellent. Our room was overlooking the pool, carpets need replacing other wise it would have a better review.
Manager Response: Hi Sue:  We regret the troubles you had with the carpets, but are glad you otherwise enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: This hotel was convenient but so disappointing. The room was damp and the carpet lumpy. The pull out bed was horrible too. The property was really pretty and the staff was nice enough, but the keys to my room didn't work and I had to go to the desk twice just to get in and never did get a key, we just had to have maintenance let us in and show ID at the desk. The hot tub was green and smelly.
Manager Response: Hi kathysD3780JE:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  It was great to read your kind comments about our team members but we are sorry about the keycard and spa troubles.

Summary: We recently stayed here for five nights, while in town for a national softball tournament. I was surprised to see the door to our room propped open when we arrived. After closing the door and unpacking, we noticed a STRONG odor of urine in the bedroom area. The sliding glass door in the bedroom and the pocket door to the bathroom, looked like it had never been cleaned. The drawers on the dresser would not stay closed. The wash basin in the bathroom was separating from the counter top and looked like it would drop on your feet at any second. The tub faucet would not shut off. Carpet was stained/dirty and furniture was worn. We constantly battled with the unreliable key reader. When housekeeping would clean the room, towels were not replenished. How do you leave a room with no
Manager Response: Hi Testin:  We're sorry you had such an unpleasant stay in our hotel recently.  Your feedback about Housekeeping, phones, odor and the public areas will be used to improve our facility and services, and we thank you for sharing them with us!

Summary: This is my first review of any hotel.  I was very disappointed with this hotel.  The room was dated.  The internet connection was slow.  Breakfast was awful.  It is not at all what a Radisson hotel should be.
Manager Response: Hello dianerB1852DO:  Please accept our apologies for the breakfast quality and WiFi issues you encountered during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: Friendly service. Our room key did not work to get into the room, even after we got it replaced. Maintenance had to use a screw driver and a hammer to open everytime we needed to access the room. The only reason i would stay there again is for the free shuttle to disney land.
Manager Response: Hi okanyp:  We regret the troubles you had getting into your room recently but glad you enjoyed the use of our complimentary shuttle.

Summary: We arrived to the hotel during the night. The reservation paid in advance was for a 2 queen size bed. After waiting 30 minutes in the reception desk, they told they was unable to open my room. So they gave me a room with one queen bed and a sofa bed and no room keys. To enter the room I needed to go to front desk and ask for the security to open it. At first they told me the key recording machine was broken. Next day the problem was the locker.. Next day other problems.. All lies. Pool is dirty. Floor is dirty.  If you are thinking about going disney and stay in this hotel, be prepared to wait 30 minutes after arriving tired waiting for someone to open your room. I'll never return.
Manager Response: Hello DiegoDeMauro:  We're sorry you had to wait so long to check in, and had keycard issues during your recent stay here.

Summary: It turned out to be much further away from where I need to be daily so I ended up staying one night.  Rooms are okay for the price.  Staff was very pleasant and service oriented.  Food from room service great.

Summary: This hotel is close to Knott's Berry Farm. They also offer a shuttle to Disneyland, which helps cut costs on car parking. Pool area is nice. Breakfast is good. Rooms were very good in my opinion. The hotel grounds/architecture has a nice charm to it. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Hi YVR-Traveller_2016:  Please come back to visit us again soon and thank you for your kind words on TripAdvisor!

Summary: Over we stay here multiple times a year and usually have a great experience, this last trip was a little lacking but nothing that cant be fixed. We love the location, we always go here for any and every event from Baseball Games to all the Theme parks in the area. This is our Go To Hotel and we will always look here first.
Manager Response: Hi lyndam388:  Thank you for your long term loyalty to our hotel.  You should be pleased to know that we have begun renovations on our guest rooms for an even better product!

Summary: We stayed for four days at this hotel. It is next door to Medieval Times and near Knots Berry Farm. The rooms were a good size, but the included breakfast was sparse and the rooms in general needed a face lift.
Manager Response: Hi bandden:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  Please be advised that we have just launched a renovation of our hotel, starting with the guest rooms.    We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: Check in was fast however the guy was very pushy about us buying the mideival times tickets through him. Had to tell him no multiple times.  The room was terrible...stains all over the floor, the carpet needed to be re-stretched. The bedroom smelt like pee over by the balcony. The bathroom always smelt like poop, not sure if they are having plumbing problems or what. We had water on the floor coming from somewhere. We had dead bugs and smashed bugs all over the walls and floors. The fridge had some weird  orange gunk on the back of it. The cleaning staff was hit and miss whether they wanted to leave us soap or not. The restaurant that they have there didnt even notice us sitting there until 15 minutes later. Oh and forget  about sleeping in past 7 because they are SO LOUD!!
Manager Response: Hello caitlinh221:  Please accept our apologies for the less than perfect stay in our hotel recently.  It was unfortunate to read about the carpet, odor, pest and noise problems you had, along with pushy service at check in time.  Your feedback is helpful to us in an effort to improve our facilities and services.

Summary: We were on vacation to rest and relax and enjoy where we were to stay. We were hoping things had changed at this place since we had stayed here before, but things were much worse. We won't be back. Hotel felt like it was falling apart.
Manager Response: Hi 303sandyl:  Please accept our apologies for a less than perfect stay recently.  You should know that a comprehensive renovation of the hotel is underway, and we hope you will be able to come to see our improvements in the future.

Summary: This hotel has cockroaches.  Do not stay here. When my husband asked the front desk if anyone had complained the clerk said No.  This was clearly a lie. If a hotel has cockroaches it is an infestation.  I believe this must be some kind of health code violation.
Manager Response: Hi Dionna:  Please accept our apologies for the pest problem you recently encountered.  We are routinely inspected by various agencies and companies to ensure that our hotel is in first class shape, as well as receiving monthly service from a professional pest control company.

Summary: My room was very nice and big. Slept comfortable with my husband and a 2 year old in the king size bed I wish the pull out couch did not have a blood stain. Plenty of storage space. Kitchen was nice IT was nice having 2 TV's
Manager Response: Hello brianneb278:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you truly enjoyed our hotel and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Check in, check out and the dining experience is what I expected for a Radisson hotel which was very good.  The location was walking distance to everything that you need for entertainment and food.  Their shuttle service is also convenient to see other major attractions in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Mark:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you for such a wonderful review!

Summary: I will never stay at a radisson hotel again. The room was filthy, spiders in the corners and under the sheets of sofa bed. Hair in dirty sheets. The toilet got clogged. There was mold in the shower. It also smelt bad.
Manager Response: Hi rosemarier453:  We're sorry you had pests, linen and bathroom issues during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: The room had a musty smell, the couch smelled, the rug was worn out and was stained; it was not a very pleasant experience for the money we paid. When the hotel was booked, my wife was told that breakfast was provided; it was not. The restaurant was expensive for a buffet style breakfast. You could even take coffee out.
Manager Response: Hello Otiliaw:  Please accept our apologies for the odor and carpet problems you encountered during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: This hotel is not newly built one, but actually not bad.  The unit is one-bed room unit: 2-double bed-bedroom for 4 persons has a TV set, closet and 4-drawer chest, living room has sofa, table and kitchnette. In courtyard provided a swimming pool and Jacuzi spa. The hotel serves breakfast every day, but I recommend a Cuban bakery Porto nearby. Also, you can reach; Starbucks, Burger King on the other side, In & Out Burger and Target, Ross Dress for Less and Knott's Berry Farm, Knott's Soak City, within 1 block. This hotel is suitable for family outing.
Manager Response: Hello shonsshon:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you enjoyed our hotel and understand why you would recommend Porto's next door!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights in May 2017. Hotel is well located for Disney Theme Parks and the rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. Staff are very helpful and friendly and appeared to genuinely want to make our stay a good experience. Good WiFi, free parking and plenty of eating options nearby (give the Rock&Brews bar a look - directly opposite). Definately worth a stay.
Manager Response: Hi davidbP3855KF:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you had an enjoyable stay and were able to try our great neighbor Rock & Brews.

Summary: Our room had cockroaches so we were moved to another room. We didn't see any cockroaches in that room but the TV in the living room didn't work, bathtub wouldn't drain and when it started pouring rain outside, our clothes were soaked due to a hole in the ceiling in the bedroom! There was water everywhere! Horrible stay. This place should be condemned. I was fully refunded my money but the damage was done.
Manager Response: Hi Shantelley:  Please accept our apologies for a troubled stay in our hotel.    It was unfortunate to read about the pest, TV and bathtub issues that you had.

Summary Heading: Stayed for my daughters cheer comp @ Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: I had read many negative reviews after booking our room so I was super nervous as to what to expect. I can say our room was clean, quiet and the beds were super comfy. Every tv and appliance worked very good. The garden area was pretty and pool and jacuzzi were clean and fun. The pool is heated which was a plus for my kids. The staff is super accommodating and friendly and the Flora restaurant was great tasting for dinner. Over all we enjoyed our stay and would recommend to a friend.
Manager Response: Hello Martiemarie:  We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that your family enjoyed the pool and restaurant, and we hope the cheer competition was successful!

Summary Heading: Nice Courtyard and pool, rooms need work
Summary: Our check in and out experiences were smooth, and the staff was friendly. The courtyard is pretty with lots of trees, and the pool area is kept clean. The room had a lot of repairs needed, and the carpet had a lot of stains. There are no roll away beds available. We rented through Hotwire without knowing what hotel we were getting. We expected the hotel would be better than it was, but that is the chance we took signing up this way.
Manager Response: Hi 343aimeeb:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor feedback!  We are sorry for the carpet issues you had in your suite and glad you enjoyed our pool area.

Summary: This hotel had many positives. Great location, lovely gardens, enticing swimming pool. There were probably other amenities that I did have time to explore. However wifi should have been connectable as I could not connect. but also needed some tender loving care. Loose toilet seat. Also correct the wifi service.
Manager Response: Hi Richard:  Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor!  Your comments about the WiFi and toilet seat will certainly be addressed, and we appreciate your remarks about our pool area!

Summary: On a Good Note the check in was friendly and nice and bed comfy.  Condition of Hotel was filthy, carpets in room with dirt and stains I would not even walk barefoot.  Couch and Chair in Sitting area so old and stained I would not sit there either.  Had to mess with toilet to flush.
Manager Response: Hi N4697ALlisad:  We're sorry you had a less than perfect stay.    It was unfortunate to read about the problems you had with the carpet and furniture in your suite.

Summary: This was a great experience at a clean and well staffed hotel.  Ramon at the front desk was particularly helpful and friendly.  I appreciate the suites and kitchenette.  Property is well located, near Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: HI AZCheryl:  We appreciate your kind words on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how well Ramon took care of your needs, and that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel.

Summary: Location, prices, pool, hot tub and exterior of hotel are great. But the rooms are in need of an update. New furniture, new carpet, new fixtures and some touch up paint. But overall good for a nights stay.
Manager Response: Hi K2613BGjesusa:  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Although some items in the room were outdated, the value paid plus the courteous staff made up for it. My family and I enjoyed the room and all the space plus the convenient location. Fit 4 adults, 1 child and a baby perfectly! I would stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Hello Ally:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!

Summary: The atmosphere is really great. It feels like a patio in Mexico. However, looks don't make it. The rooms smell weird due to their proximity to the pool. The carpets are old and stained. I felt uncomfortable walking in bare feet. We went as a group and there was scheduling issues and double booking. Part of my group went to "their" room and someone else's stuff was in it. I think that I could make due with the hotel, as I did on this trip because we had no choice. It was booked for us. I wouldn't choose it myself again.
Manager Response: Hi Sally:  We're sorry you had odor and carpet issues in your suite recently during your stay in our hotel.

Summary Heading: Peaceful romantic/family friendly location, relaxing pool, spacious parking, not so good wifi connection, friendly staff
Summary: This hotel is in a great location with nearby 24 hour restaurants for food like Subway or iHop. The hotel's swimming pool was the best and very nice peaceful breeze from trees. There was plenty of parking space.   The room's carpet needs a wash. It was helpful to have a wet bar, microwave and a cooler. Just be wary of the wifi connection. I think the hotel needs to put wifi extenders because the connection on phone doesn't stay on and on laptop its very shaky; constantly loses connection.   Bathroom drains are slow on the tub and sink. They probably should put liquid plumber. The toilet also got stuck once.  There's local shopping centers within a short drive. I think the hotel has complementary shuttle that could take people there too. I rented car. Friendly hotel staff made
Manager Response: Hello 571syeda:  Please come back to visit us again soon for another fantastic stay!  We appreciate your kind words about our staff members.

Summary Heading: Very good place to stay over when visiting Anaheim
Summary: Stayed over for one night. Very clean room, welcoming staff. The pool was neat, the whole area has a nice atmosphere to it.  Breakfast was very poor, doesn't worth the price. Internet was decent in the lobby and around the pool, barely reaches the bedrooms in the hotel rooms.
Manager Response: Hi Irina:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how pleased you were with our team members and pool area, although we are sorry you did not enjoy breakfast.

Summary: Old hotel with bad breakfast and wifi ! Small pool area  A lot of sound through walls and roof .  Good and nice housekeeper. Otherwise not worth it for more than a maximum of 35-50 dollars per night. They say u can sleep 6 in there rooms well not all true ! There is two double beds in the bedrooms and a bed sofa from the 70's old tv and awful wifi in the rooms.  So in my opinion only if it is really cheap!!
Manager Response: Hello afaf22:  Please accept our apologies for the less than spectacular stay you recently had in our hotel.  It was unfortunate that you had WiFi and sofabed problems.

Summary: My fianc√© and I stayed here for 5 nights over our Easter Break. We had a wonderful stay. Our room was clean and the bed was immensely comfortable. The staff was very kind and accommodating. They printed the tickets we needed for the Clippers game and our Universal visit and they moved us to a room that did not face the main road when we requested. We ended up at the very back of the property which was nice and quiet in the evenings. We were concerned that we might find the pool area noisy, but we never heard it at all. It is also worth noting that a school band stayed at this hotel for the last couple of nights we were there and we never heard the children at all. Unfortunately we spent most of our time away from the hotel sightseeing and taking in some pro sports games, so we
Manager Response: Hi Joey_JoJo_7:  We're sorry you had trouble with the WiFi during your recent stay here but glad you otherwise enjoyed your stay.  Your vacation sounds like it was very well thought out, and as a lifelong Clippers fan, I hope you enjoyed seeing them at Staples Center!

Summary Heading: A chilling experience at Radisson Suites
Summary: A 6 day stay with a completely malfunctioning air conditioning unit and the management never moved us to another room.  The room was freezing and the management did not care, even though the property engineer recommended that we be moved immediately.
Manager Response: Hello U757HOwilliamw:  Please accept our apologies for the air conditioning issue you had in our hotel recently.  We should have certainly moved you to another suite if you had a problem that could not be resolved to your satisfaction.

Summary: Our overall stay was excellent.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Always smiling.  We were surprised to have two rooms, nice bathroom and bar area with fridge and microwave.  The pool area was beautiful but the pool was very cold.  Hot tub was great.  Only poor review would be the carpets were very dirty with many stains near the elevators and stains in our room.  Also the couch had stains.  The beds were very comfortable and the bedding very clean.  It was very quiet during the night.  We enjoyed our stay and we would use this hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: Hi 253ruthk:  Please accept our apologies for the carpet problems you recently had but we are glad you found the beds to be comfy!

Summary: Room was clean and of decent size, housekeeping staff could be more attentive for guest needs.  For example, had to retrieve towels from pool because room didn't have enough.  I notified the desk and had same problem the next two days.
Manager Response: Hello steven2X9270ZO:  Thank you for your feedback about Housekeeping services in our hotel-your comments will help us improve our service delivery.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: First room they gave us the sliding door was broken, matience was called he couldn't even fix it. Stains on sheets,  comforters,ceiling,carpets. A.C. doesn't work too good.  But the staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Hello M7992TBjenniferr:  While we're thankful that you found our staff friendly, we're sorry you had troubles in your suite including the sliding glass door and AC.

Summary: Overall, we loved our stay. The beds and pillows were comfortable and spacious room. Location was great and close to most popular attractions. The pool and hot tub were nice and kids loved it. Staff was great and kind.   I did minus one star because the hotel can use some updates and wifi was bad.   I would still return especially for the same great price!
Manager Response: Hello:  Please come back to visit us again soon...we are upgrading our WiFi system at this time!

Summary: The hotel is adequate but badly in need of updating.  I used to stay here when it was Embassy Suites and was shocked to note the decline since it was taken over by Radisson.  The suites have an amazing set layout with a refrigerator and microwave.  The beds were very comfortable.  The BEST part of the hotel was the daily shuttle to the amusement parks and free parking.  I picked this hotel over another one based on the shuttle and lack of parking fees (the other hotel charged 20 a night for parking and had no shuttle)   However, the room smelled of mildew, had stained carpet and furniture, the carpet was coming away from the wall in several places and the sheets/bedspreads were stained (this maybe due to having everything white and it being hard to keep white).  The resterant
Manager Response: Hi swrktp:  It was great to read that you were able to use our complimentary shuttle service during your recent stay in our hotel, and enjoyed our in-suite amenities.

Summary: The hotel is a little older and could use some upgrades, but it is right next door to Medieval Times and has a pool and hot tub to relax in after a long day at Disneyland. Staff was amazing. Overall for the price we would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello kristencM1044LW:  We're glad you enjoyed our pool and hot tub, and appreciate your kind words about our staff members.

Summary Heading: Late room cleaning and slouching bed
Summary: If you want to stay in a dirty room that isn't cleaned daily and a couch bed at an angle with a flat mattress than this is the place for you. It walking distance to Knott's and several places to eat.  The hot tub will make you think twice with it's cloudy appearance.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out and writing your review. We are pleased to find out that you liked the location of the hotel. However, we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied during your stay due to condition of your room particularly with its cleanliness and the bedding, as well as the hot tub. Your feedback will be forwarded to the hotel management to ensure that all guest rooms and amenities are up to Radisson Suites Hotel standards. Hoping that you will give us another  chance to exceed your expectations.

Summary: The bed is extremely comfortable. The location was perfect - so close to restaurants and attractions. The only complaints I have are the wifi was terrible and kept going on and out, mostly out, and there were stains on the carpet. Other than that, the room was clean, the bathroom was clean, we received new towels and house cleaning daily. The courtyard is beautiful. Parking is good too, Definitely enough for everyone!
Manager Response: Hello Jessica:  Your feedback on TripAdvisor is very much appreciated!  Please accept our apologies for the spotty WiFi and carpet issues but we are glad that you otherwise enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Clean and comfortable hotel within a five minute walk to Knotts. They have a regular shuttle to Disneyland and Knotts. The beds are really comfortable and all the rooms are suites. I have stayed here many times in the past. The only downfall is the wi-fi coverage, it is very spotty.
Manager Response: Hi Jere B:  Please accept our apologies for the spotty WiFi.  You should know that we are upgrading our system at this time so it should be greatly improved on your next visit!

Summary: Overall this place is a good choice. It is surrounded with many places to eat very close to Medieval Times and Knotts Berry Farm this the reason I pick this hotel. The only concern I had is the check in  process it was slow and had to wait before I got acknowledge.
Manager Response: Hello 698fayec:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor feedback.  We're sorry you weren't greeted cheerfully upon arrival...we will certainly pass this on to our Front Desk as a reminder!

Summary: The hotel was in the center of major attractions. Perfect for my daughter's spring break trip. We walked to and from Knotts Berry Farm easily. The hotel room is across the street! The rooms were very spacious and clean.  We only ate at the hotel for breakfast because it was a "bonus" for being "VIP' Expedia members. Unfortunately,  the breakfast was very bad. Just a few basic items and did not seem fresh. I would return to the hotel but eat elsewhere and suggest they reconsider they're breakfast options.
Manager Response: Hello Patzy V:  We value our VIP members and their feedback!  In particular, your breakfast comments will be used to improve our product offerings.  It was great to read you otherwise enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: We stay here every time we go to California/Disneyland and love it! The hotel staff is very kind and accommodating. The free shuttle to the park is awesome! We just love it. It's very clean and rooms are great!
Manager Response: Hello 438lacih:  Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you took advantage of our free shuttle and had a great time at the Happiest Place on Earth.

Summary: This is the most dated and least renovated Radisson I have ever stayed in.  Hotel area looks like a jungle. Furniture, interiour and buildings are old and broken. Muggy smell in the room. Bathroom amenities not replaced. Pool area dirty and hot tub water dirty too. Elevators extremely slow and beds are small. With my Club Carlson gold card, we got 2 free drinks per night (no room upgrade). However the restaurant and bar was not tempting at all, and we did not try neither the free drinks nor the free breakfast.  Positive side: - ok location close to knotts berry farm - soft beds and pillows - soft towels (if they remember to refill) - spacious room with living room - quiet area - free parking  Ok - affordable hotel if you just need a place to sleep and dont need clean pool and
Manager Response: Hi TranFamilyNorway:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor and value your Club Carlson membership.  A renovation of our hotel is planned for this year, so all of our suites will have a fresh, clean look.  Your comments about the restaurant and elevator will also be used to improve our facility and services.

Summary Heading: Great location but not Radisson standard
Summary: The pictures of hotel are not accurate as trees have taken over. Rooms are as clean as can be for a hotel that needs some renovation and maintenance. Bed was really comfortable. Carpets are old, frayed in places and lost colour. Layout of hotel is good with sitting area of suite looking into pool area and walkway but bedrooms look out of hotel. Door between blocks any noise from one room to other. Location is ideal for Knotts Berry Farm (5 minute walk to gate), restaurants and fast food within walking distance and a mall 10 minutes walk away. Hotel is beside a 4 lane highway but traffic noise not a problem. Our first room was dark as trees growing right beside bedroom window and trees are all around pool area restricting sunlight. We had to be moved as we found roaches in room.
Manager Response: Hi Mary K:  We're sorry you had carpet and pest problems in your suite but glad you enjoyed our location.  Your feedback is appreciated as we strive to make improvements to our facility and services.

Summary: Stayed here for seven nights. Our first room had the biggest roaches I have seen in my life (one even trying to crawl into the fridge!!), the kitchen sink taps did not work, the room was dark and not particularly clean. After kicking up a fuss we were moved to a similar styled room on the same floor which was certainly brighter and cleaner.  The hotel BADLY needs renovated from top to bottom and is verging on either neglect by the owners or they are just able to keep things going (like applying a bandaid....).  The pool area, while it looks pretty at first glance, needs major work done on the trees which surround it. They have taken over and are making the area quite dark and overgrown. The hotel also supplies the smallest and thinnest towels at the poolside. Come on Radisson
Manager Response: Hello billkrr1:    We're sorry you had a pest issue in your suite and that our service delivery was not consistently positive.

Summary: Beautiful atmosphere and friendly staff made our stay enjoyable. Family friendly hotel. Rooms were clean and beds were quite comfortable. Slept very well. Anything that was needed was provided in a timely manner by staff. This is the hotel we choose to stay in for our vacations to Southern California.
Manager Response: Hi 511careyc:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you stay with us frequently and your family was comfortable.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Hotel is ok. Grounds are nice with Spanish flare. Room furniture is old and needs to be burned. At least in room 432. I had high hopes for this place.  Hot tub is gross, we dubbed it the cheese dip. For $175 weekends I want at least a working pullout. Staff members were able to mark the room down. THANKS!! I'm glad this place did not have a dog house or I would have been in it. Momma was like WTF!!! You're never booking for us again. I had booked 3 nights here. Don't expect to get a lot of help if you booked via third party's. I always make the hotel honor third party prices or beat them. Reasons being they are there to fix problems or your this "sorry but you booked third party I can't do much to help you" üòÖ
Manager Response: Hi Kingkongdaddy:  We're sorry you were inconvenienced during your recent stay in our hotel.  It was unfortunate to read about your thoughts on our furniture, hot tub and affiliation with our third party partners.

Summary: Stayed here a few days celebrating my sister's birthday. Other then the lackluster appearance of the grounds due to lack of upkeep and the outdated furniture in the room it was clean and comfortable. I stayed here when it was the Embassy Suites and last year at the Raddison as it is a safe area.
Manager Response: Hi Dianeco2016:  We're delighted you you enjoyed your stay recently for your sister's birthday and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our stay was for four nights.  The staff went above and beyond in every way.  The breakfast was great.  We really enjoyed the stay there.  They have shuttle to and from Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm.   The parking is free and have many parking spots.
Manager Response: Hello Blaine:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you so much!

Summary: I stayed with my parents in the suit and we had a great experience. The hotel is a bit old style and needs maintenance but it was good to see that repair and renovation work was going on while we were there. Also, whenever we asked for any assistance, be it housekeeping, room service, etc., the staff was always helpful. At times, we ordered tea/coffee sachets and cream in the night and we did get them in our room. Overall a memorable experience.
Manager Response: Hello Shriya:  WOW!  What great comments about your stay!  Thank you for choosing our hotel and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was in good shape and clean. Lounge and breakfast buffet were super. It was a little far out from Sand Diego but the freeway worked well and our travel time was reasonable.
Manager Response: Hi jamesbU2300XJ:  We appreciate your terrific review on TripAdvisor!  Your kind words about our staff will be passed on and we're delighted you enjoyed our suites and restaurant.

Summary: We made reservations almost 7 months ahead of time. On the day we checked in we were told  "due to a computer glitch, they have overbooked and we didn't have a room. We were moved to a different hotel, the room at the other hotel did not even have a refrigerator. I wish management would have emailed or called us ahead of time.
Manager Response: Hi Y5680VEsharonb:  We're very sorry you had to be relocated to another hotel due to us not being able to honor your reservation.  While we would have loved advance notice of this situation, sometimes it is not possible to do so.

Summary: Highly recommend Radisson Hotel. Great customer service, very clean and affordable. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Our stay was pleasant and most definitely will be returning in the near future.
Manager Response: Hello bobbym654:  Please come back to visit us again soon for another terrific stay!

Summary: Where do I start. They gave us a different room than what we booked, when I called to complain he said we booked through a third party so there was nothing they could do about it. Then asked me what I was complaining about, we had enough beds. I said I wasn't sleeping on a double bed with 2 kids the entire trip since I booked a king bed. He said all he could do was give us complimentary buffet service. The tiles were coming off the floor on the exterior walkways. They used bungi cords and kitchen stackables to lock the buffet room doors instead of fixing the doors. None of the exterior or swimming pool gates were locked. The pullout sofa in our room was nailed shut so we couldn't even use it and my son scratched his Leg on one of the nails.
Manager Response: Hi alexgM9544FY:  Please accept our apologies for the less than stellar stay recently in our hotel.  Your comments about the sofabed and tilework will be used to improve our facility.

Summary Heading: Every thing is really old need to be updated
Summary: The carpet was dirty and not safe for children to crawl on  No wifi in the bedroom it was hard to connect Staff communication was very bad we asked for house keeping in the morning and we came at night and was not clean the house keeping is not available at night Breakfast was okay and it's not worth the price they charge   This hotel is looks good on the outside but not in the inside I wish it was more clean If they changed few things it would be great place to stay
Manager Response: Hi alzeneh:  We appreciate your feedback regarding the WiFi and carpet issues.  Please accept our apologies for the communication problems, particularly in Housekeeping.

Summary Heading: Updated review 5 years later- still a deal!
Summary: After 5 years we decided to try this hotel again as the price on Hotels.com was amazing for a suite. The room was still great with plenty of space and a perfect little kitchen area with fridge, sink, microwave, counter, and table. The shower head was nice and high with good pressure and plenty of hot water. We had really nice beds this time and enjoyed the beautiful grounds and pool and hot-tub more this year. We did not use the shuttle because it is still poorly devised, and the free breakfast area is now a costly little restaurant area. There are several restaurants within one mile of the hotel, and the kitchen made it easy to bring our own food for most meals. Again, for a suite, the price can't be beat and our kids thanked us over and over again for the nice hotel.
Manager Response: Hello bromcd:  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for returning and leaving feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you found great value in our hotel again and enjoyed the area as well.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel. The phone did not work. The toilet leaked. There were only 2 channels on the tv that were clear.  All the others were static. The love seat was torn on the back cushion. There was a dirty wash cloth hanging over the shower curtain. There were burns in the carpet. I complained the next morning and they gave me and my granddaughter free breakfast so we went to that and all the food was cold, the eggs, potatoes, it was bad.  We were the only people there to eat, that should of given me a clue. I asked if we could use the shuttle to go to Disneyland, it was 8:00am and they said all the shuttles were full until 9:15 so we drove our car to the Disneyland Parking area. I could not recommend this hotel. I did not have a good experience.
Manager Response: Hi Marlinda K:  We're sorry you had phone, TV and plumbing issues during your recent stay here.  It was unfortunate to also learn that you did not get to utilize our complimentary shuttle either.

Summary Heading: An ok place to stay nearby Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Radisson because we got what we thought was a crazy deal through Hotels.com. The pictures of the Radisson were incredible and all the hotel sites indicated that this was a $$$$ hotel that we were getting a steal on. We arrived late, around 10:45 PM. The Lobby doors opened automatically and we were surprised by how beautiful the lobby interior was. The inner courtyard is full of palm trees and it seemed very luxurious if not from perhaps a bygone era. I do feel like I need to share what happened when we checked in. We went to our assigned room and when we walked in we were shocked to find the bathroom trashed and the bed covers pulled back. We hauled our stuff all the way back down to the front desk and consulted management. They were very accommodating, assigned
Manager Response: Hi lookstrong:  TripAdvisor is a great forum for reviews and we're glad you use it!  We're sorry there was a mixup with your room assignment and were concerned about security.  Also, your feedback about breakfast will be used to improve our offerings in the restaurant.

Summary Heading: Pick this one (you won't be sorry!)
Summary: Great property. Tropical theme, nice pool and spa for the family. The suites are fantastic. Internet was a bit slow but that's an easy fix for them (and they're reading this) so for YOUR stay it will probably be much better. Walking distance to PORTOS  ((Amazing)) and Knott's Berry Farm. Try Amaya restaurant next door as well its awesome!
Manager Response: Hello jayg478:  Yes we are reading this and we are making changes to our internet at this time!  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: This is what you have to put up with just because is close to Disneyland
Summary: PROS: Room has two units, one bedroom and one with a sofa bed. It is close to major theme parks. Lots of parking space. It did not smell cheap detergent like many other hotels in this category. It is expensive for what they offer. CONS: Building is old. Some items in the room are partially malfunctioning (the toilet flushing mechanism inside the tank had to be fixed many times in order to stop the water from running). Parts of the blind that covers the door was broken. Stairs are old and dirty. One of the gates in the back of the building would not lock (broken) so anyone could enter at any time. The only reason I stayed here is that my kids high school group was in the same hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Eddie O:  Thank you for your honest review on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your kind remarks about our location as well as the suggestions about how to improve the blinds, stairs and gates.

Summary: This hotel was amazing. Staff is fantastic and the grounds are stunning. The courtyard is completely inviting with a pool, hot tub, fountain for ambiance and lots of Palm trees. The room had a separate living room beside the bedroom with a small kitchenette. We were shocked that we paid so little for such a high end room and hotel! Love this hotel!
Manager Response: Hi T7779JQdavidr:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor review!  It was great to read about how well our staff took care of you, along with being able to enjoy our pool area.

Summary: Room was clean, lots of space (2 double bed suite) had couch in living room area but didn't need to use it. Great place for families.  Free internet and parking. Affordable/economical breakfast buffet. I got ill the last night of our stay and we were not ready to leave by checkout time ( I am the mom- dad was trying hard to get everything packed and ready... we were over an hour late getting checked out- the staff did call or knock every 15 minutes past 1130 to see if we were gone:(
Manager Response: Hello 627sammij:  We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor and sorry you were sick during your stay!  Please accept our apologies if we rushed you out on your departure day.

Summary: Location of this hotel is great and the staff was very accommodating. I found the overall condition of the hotel to be older and in need of a remodel. The room carpet and decor was older and stained. There was not a pleasant odor when we opened the door to the room.
Manager Response: Hello JeffDx4:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor and your kind words for our staff members.  Please accept our apologies for the condition of the property but please know that a comprehensive renovation of the hotel is planned in the very near future.

Summary: The room was not in good shape: stains on couch, carpeting has hills in it, room phones had no dial tone, etc. My daughter got sick in the middle of the night and they had nobody to come help us. The parking lot security guard had to bring up a towel.
Manager Response: Hi stephaniehY4595NU:  We're sorry your daughter was ill during your stay and that you had Housekeeping issues.
