Summary: This hotel is beautiful.  The pool area feels like you're in Costa Rica.  Lovely landscaping!  Rooms were very nice, loved the wooden blinds and french doors.  Excellent place for families!  Will for sure stay again!
Manager Response: Hello Kristy:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're delighted you enjoyed our tropical feel and were comfortable in our suite.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and had fresh towels and beds made daily. When extra towels were needed, the staff had them to our room very quickly. The staff was amazing. The pool area was beautiful. We will definitely be staying here again next year.
Manager Response: Hi Melaniexr2000:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor feedback!  We're delighted our staff took care of you and that you enjoyed our pool and facilities.  We look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: This is like a motel 6. Spend the extra money and stay down the street at marriot. It was so dirty you could see the dirt on the furniture on the furniture in the room and in the lobby. It looks like they haven't changed their furniture since the hotel was built. Disgusting. Never again.
Manager Response: Hi daniellehF6285KU:  We apologize for the Housekeeping issues you encountered while in our hotel recently.  Your feedback will assist us in making sure that we take steps to make improvements to our facility.

Summary: Not quite what you would expect from a Radisson hotel. This feels like a motel on a (neon-lit up) strip joint. A bit run down and dated. Terrible breakfast food quality (think Motel 6); don't pay for the breakfast buffet one. There is a Starbucks and a McDonalds across the street, and you can do better for breakfast in either place. Popular little pool in the inner courtyard - lots of excited smaller kids. Overall, the place is a good choice for a budget traveller with family (pullout couch and two double beds do help here), who plans to visit Knott's Farm (walking distance) or Disney, and doesn't care much about amenities other than free parking.
Manager Response: Hi TravelandLearn_11:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor.  It's unfortunate that you didn't enjoy our breakfast offerings but we're glad you felt that we are a good value for budget travelling families.

Summary: I expected much better hotel based on my stay at other Radisson locations in the USA and Overseas.  This one did not meet the expectation of these hotels. However, it is an OK hotel. The Wi-Fi in the room did not work. In the lobby no problem. The breakfast was OK too.
Manager Response: Hello 841kaym:  Thank you for your kind remark about our breakfast offerings but sorry that you had WiFi troubles.

Summary: If I could turn back the clock and NOT stay here, I would. Beds were terribly uncomfortable and broken, very misleading information when booking, very rude receptionist when trying to resolve a breakfast issue.
Manager Response: Hi Kerri:  Please accept our apologies for the service challenges and uncomfortable beds you recently encountered in our beds.

Summary: Good staff.  A bit run down, but clean and they are trying.  If you can get it for a reasonable price, then I recommend it.  Not luxury but not a dive.  Nice pool and good basic family accommodation.  Fridge and kitchen sink are useful if you don't wish to dine out every meal.  Quiet at night.  Quite secure. I believe pool was shut by health dept. previously but OK now.  You may want to check that.
Manager Response: Hi Kai S:  We're delighted that you enjoyed our hotel, pool area and in-suite amenties.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful floor plan in desperate need of an upgrade
Summary: I enjoyed the ambiance this property provides. The open courtyard with obvious Spanish architectural influences sold this property for me. I loved the location as there are great restaurants and bakeries nearby. The only criticism I can provide is that there needs to be updates made to the room as they are dated. The open floor plan of the suite I stayed in was great and spacious but the carpet was dated, along with the technology. The only issue I experienced is that the refrigerator was not plugged, so I had food spoil. But I personally plan on visiting this property again in the future for leisure! Great staff as well.
Manager Response: Hello E304MQjessicas:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback!  You should know that a comprehensive renovation is planned for this year!

Summary: I love this hotel. I'll definitely stay again. I loved the clean suite style rooms, the shuttle to Disney and the breakfast in the mornings. Our kids are free!!  The manager seemed very concerned that we were enjoying our stay and breakfast. We loved that!! The staff treated us very well. We would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello jenniferoM4171NY:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  It was great to read how satisfied you were with your stay in our hotel and were able to enjoy breakfast and our complimentary shuttle service.

Summary: Awful flooring, expensive cost and no breakfast included with that. Do not use this hotel if you have other options. I would recommend country inn and suites over this any day. Even though both are from carlson, this hotel sucks.
Manager Response: Hi buuv:  We're sorry you felt that our floors were not satisfactory but appreciate your loyalty to the Carlson brand of hotels.

Summary Heading: Bed Bugs, Terrible Customer Service, Infestation of gnats, Swarm of Bees
Summary: I checked in around 130pm and my first room was 416, I found bed bugs in both beds. I called front desk to ask for someone to come and move me to another room. Waited 30 mins then walked downstairs to front desk. Chris was super nice and said he had already called maintenance but he can get me another room immediately. We headed back to 416 to grab my things and showed him the bugs in both beds. He apologized. He escorts me to room 418. The key card on the door wouldnt open and it took us a dozen tries to get it open. We finally get in and check both bed and notice nothing. It was already 230 pm and I had work to get done so I agreed to the new room and asked if  management could get a hold of me to talk further about the bed bugs. He said he will let them them know immediately.
Manager Response: Hello JfromTheBay2017:  Thank you for the review on TripAdvisor.com although we wish it was better.  It was unfortunate that you had pest problems, not bed bugs, along with the telephone and breakfast issues you referenced.  Please reconsider the cancellation of your Club Carlson account if the issues you had are isolated to your visit to our hotel.  Be assured that the comments you shared will be resolved satisfactorily.

Summary: Great value and great location. The suite had an excellent layout that was perfect for us and our 13 year old triplets. We will definitely use this hotel again and would recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Hello seanmI8531FO:  We were delighted to read your wonderful remarks on TripAdvisor!  Hopefully you and your triplets will come back to visit us again very soon!

Summary: The rooms are clean and equipped with microwave and fridge which makes the stay comfy. Pool area is private and enclosed by a tropical courtyard. Staff is friendly. The parking area is ok. Concerned about security of vehicles.
Manager Response: Hi staceyc200:  We appreciate your feedback about your recent stay in our hotel on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you enjoyed our in-suite amenities and pool facilities.

Summary: Terrible room. It was very loud upstairs someone walking. We could not sleep due to that sounds. Also very loud heater running sound all the time. Also window installed beside the bed and very chilly and also loud to outside walking sound.  and it was different style room with others.
Manager Response: Hello mikyeongs2017:  Please accept our apologies for the noisy neighbors you had during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: My experience with Radisson hotels have always been positive.  From Tallinn Estonia, Riga Latvia, Klaipeda Lithuania, to Buena Park California, my rooms are pleasant and spacious.  The dinning within the hotels have been great, the food is amazing and reasonably priced.  From my first experience staying at the Radisson Blu I have become a member and will stay with them for my travels whether business or leisure.
Manager Response: Hi Al N:  Your loyalty to Club Carlson is very much appreciate, along with your kind remarks about hotel.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: This hotel is right down the street from Knotts Berry Farm and right next to Medieval Times.  Our group did not visit these places, however, instead we were in town to go to Disneyland.  We chose this hotel because for the cost we were getting more than what we would get closer to Disneyland.  The drive to Disneyland from this hotel was extremely easy, just hop on the freeway and a few minutes later hop off and you're there!  The furniture in our room was a little rundown, but the size of the room was perfect! Parking was easy, never had a problem finding a spot during our stay.
Manager Response: Hello elmntlizz83:  We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us recently, particularly our location and convenience from Disneyland.

Summary: I had my second stay at this Radisson, and it was again a good experience. I was in town on a Disneyland trip and had some Carlson points left so I stayed two nights at this hotel with two friends. The only thing I wish was different is that they had queen beds. The pull out bed was completely unusable so we had to squeeze two adults into one of the double beds. Other than that, the rooms are great and the beds are comfortable. All rooms are very spacious with a separate living room area, microwave, mini fridge and sink area.   The shuttle to Disneyland is great if the times work out for you. We had a car this time so we only used the shuttle once to go back to the park after an afternoon break. Parking at the hotel is free, which is a great plus. I would recommend this hotel if
Manager Response: Hello Michaels017:  Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed using our complimentary shuttle and had an enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Dirty hotel and really out dated
Summary: Wouldn't recommend anyone to stay here. not a good sign when the first thing you see on your way to room is a pile of dead flies on the floor which no one bothered to clean up, AC never worked, my friend was rudely woken up at 8am by house keeping saying they need to leave already check out was at 12pm
Manager Response: Hi richardmN1096FO:  Please accept our apologies for the pest and AC issues you encountered during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel with my husband and 3 children an we had to check out 2 days early because the room was so dirty. The carpet was very old and so dirty I couldn't even let my baby crawl on it. The furniture in the room was old and very stained and even the sheets were stained and looked to have blood on them. When I booked this hotel the photos online looked fine but were not at all what we found.  I would  definitely not recommend this hotel as it really put a damper on our family vacation.
Manager Response: Hello behndanielle:  We are sorry you had Housekeeping issues while you were with us recently.  It was unfortunate to read about the carpet and linen problems you encountered but we appreciate you bringing them to our attention.

Summary: Dirty capers, room smelled awful. Pictures on website were very deceptive. Booked for four nights try to cancel the other three after checking out the room was told I could not.  Had to go and buy new sheets, towels.
Manager Response: Hi F8446AJchristinas:  Please accept our apologies for the carpet and odor problems you encountered during your recent stay in our hotel.  It was unfortunate to read that you felt the linens were not acceptable.

Summary Heading: Room needs updated and floors cleaned
Summary: A lot of noisy kids when we checked in a weekend, to be expected right next to knotts. Staff was very very nice, but the rooms need updating and serious cleaning of the floor or just new carpet or better yet tile. Skip the restaurant (Flora). Food is not that great expensive and takes forever to prepare. Restaurant across the street
Manager Response: Hi Unicorn11500:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor.  It was unfortunate that you had noise issues and slow service in the restaurant.

Summary: The room was absolutely wonderful.  I'd read the reviews and was apprehensive but when I opened the door I was Very pleasantly surprised.  The rooms were big, the internet worked wonderfully, the hotel was quiet, and it was centrally located.    The downside was the door key was temperamental and a bit of a pain but overall, I give this hotel a three thumbs up and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello daphnekr:  Please accept our apologies for the key card issue you encountered, but we are glad you otherwise enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: The prices that they are charging people do not match. It was an uncomfortable stay, and not peaceful. The property has potential but needs to be renovations. It was highway robbery. I guess they figure that they can charge outlandish prices due to the location, and this is not right!
Manager Response: Hi sabrinapC4050RE:  We're sorry you felt that our rates were higher than they should be in our marketplace.  Please know that a renovation of our facility is being planned at this time.

Summary: If you want a feel like home experience. You need to stay here. I have been here two times now. The rooms are nice and clean. If you stay please try the restaurant/bar. It is remarkable to. Anthony at the front desk goes above and beyond. I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello scotti415:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!

Summary: When we checked in and went into our room, it took about 3 minutes for our key cards to work, then we got in and the room was filled with mosquitos everywhere when we didn't see a single mosquito the entire time we were outside. There were streaks of leftover feces in the toilet as well. Something that looked like cheese was in the mini fridge and the entire room smelled rotten. We went to pull the sofa out into a bed and there are blood stains on the mattress and it is not even thick enough to sleep on comfortably. The TV in the living area did not turn on and the tv in the bedroom wasn't worth turning on and had fuzzy terrible picture. The air conditioning was stuck on keeping it freezing as well and the housekeeping staff disregarded the do not disturb sign. The chair in the
Manager Response: Hi Ubetgiraffe91:  We're sorry you had so many unfortunate issues during your recent stay in our hotel.  It was unfortunate to read about the pests, cleanliness and maintenance issues in your suite.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and the location was smack in the middle of everything. Our room was a non smoking,However, it smelled a bit like smoke. Besides that it was a wonderful stay. I would recommend this hotel and I would be staying again.
Manager Response: Hello brisav2017:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you enjoyed our location but we're sorry you had an odor problem in your suite.

Summary: Rooms very spacious and accomadating staff.  Nice and clean hotel, beds were very comfortable.  Good for families because of the split rooms.  Professional and courteous staff with great grounds and close to many activities.
Manager Response: Hello 765jamieo:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  It was great to read about our comfy beds and service oriented staff.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: .  I was there with my family and we enjoyed our time there it was convient to many things.   The hotel is gorgeous and staff is very friendly.    The room was spacious to with a pull out sleeper sofa.   The kids enjoyed their stay
Manager Response: Hello Maria:  We truly appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how satisfied you were with your stay and thank you for your kind words about our staff members.

Summary: The staff is so positive and helpful! Very great staff! Anthony and Leticia were the greatest!! Anthony made chewing in fun and quick! Leticia was so helpful with ordering breakfast and giving amazingly service!! The courtyard was so tropical and beautiful looking!!
Manager Response: Hello 890deantep:  Thank you for such great feedback on TripAdvisor!  Your kind remarks about Anthony and Leticia were great to read and we're glad they were good service providers.

Summary Heading: Crappy hotel... Literally, there was poop in the hall.
Summary: This hotel looks very nice in pictures and has a very pretty central area with a fountain, trees, etc. The room was ok, beds were decent and the room had proper amenities. One of the lights crackled every time we turned it on, and honestly I was a little afraid something was gonna fizzle out, explode or something. The room had stains on the carpet and the shower curtain was ripped. Not very nice.   The worst part was the poop. In the hall and on the roof. Not kidding. The poop, (human or otherwise) was lying on the floor in the walkway between rooms. It was NASTY! There was also poop on the roof area next to the elevator. And not just one turd either, multiple poops! So gross. It was cleaned up eventually, but it was ridiculous and disgusting. Would never ever ever ever EVER
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor.  It was troubling to read about the refuse that was in the public areas of the hotel.  While we're glad it was cleaned up, we apologize that you had to see it in the first place.

Summary: This is a clean and convenient place to stay. Reserving and checking in were very easy. There is a multitude of restaurants in the area should one miss the service at the hotel.   Being down the street from Knotts Berry Farm and near Disneyland is super convenient not to mention the hotel shuttle.
Manager Response: Hi OrphanJon:  We appreciate your comments on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that you enjoyed our location, check in experience and complimentary shuttle service.

Summary Heading: Nice enough but needs a few tweaks
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights with our child. The suite aspect was very welcome and we took advantage of having the two rooms. The extra TV was nice as was a dining table. The mattress in the couch was pretty gross, but the hotel staff did eventually trade it out for a clean one. The beds were very comfortable but the television didn't come in very well in the main room. The grounds were quite lovely and we enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Breakfast was okay, but the ambiance in the restaurant could be improved as it reminded me more of a cafeteria. Lots of teams at the hotel as well, but very family friendly. My biggest qualm was that housekeeping forgot to clean our room every day and we had to call down in the evening to get someone to service it. Very odd. Overall, good value for
Manager Response: Hello AlanaN1111:  Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor.  Please accept our apologies for the challenges you experienced with Housekeeping.  Your comments will be shared with them for resolution but we are glad you otherwise had an enjoyable stay.

Summary: I stayed there for one night with my wife and 2 young kids (3 and 1). The hotel was right next to Disney, it was clean, and the staff was great with the exception of 1 front desk worker who was pretty rude.
Manager Response: Hello goredsox2017:  We love it when guests leave us feedback on TripAdvisor but we are sorry that someone at the Front Desk was not helpful during your stay.

Summary: Nice hotel, very nice sleep, very clean. Big rooms, soft towels, nice shower, extras in the bathroom.  The mattress is very comfy, soft sheets. Big space at the tv room. Extra bed (sofa bed). Good coffee inside the room.
Manager Response: Hi Lulis8:  Thank you for the positive comments on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted your enjoyed our spacious suite, bathroom amenities and comfy mattresses.

Summary Heading: Good location for vacation with little kids.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights, and we enjoyed ourselves. The location was great as we were able to walk to Knott's Berry Farm and Pirate's Dinner Adventure. Our children are 4 and 5, and they had a great time. We were able to get kid snacks from the Wal-Mart down the street (applesauce pouches, juiceboxes, fruit, etc.) and store it in the room easily as there was a table, fridge, microwave, and sink. The room was spacious, the bed was super comfy, and the landscaping made us feel like we were somewhere tropical. The rooms can use some updating, but it met our needs.
Manager Response: Hi BusyMommy79:  Thank you for letting us know how much your family enjoyed your stay recently in our hotel.  It was great that you found our location convenient, and the suites spacious.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: Good hotel, excellent location for knots Berry Farm and hotel provided a free bus to Disney. Breakfast included in our stay which was good but the same every day. Rooms very spacious with a bedroom, lounge and a kitchenette. Staff friendly and helpful. I would love to return to this hotel and LA and would recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Julia:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted you were able to use our complimentary shuttle service and found our spacious suites to be comfortable.  Your comments about our staff were also appreciated!

Summary: My family and I stayed in a double suite with two beds and a sofa sleeper.  The room was clean, but showed signs of wear.  The beds were firm but comfortable.   However, the sofa bed was in need of a new mattress.  It was thin and I felt every spring and bump.
Manager Response: Hello laurapD1021LL:  We appreciate your comments on TripAdvisor and are glad your family enjoyed your stay in the hotel.  Your feedback about the sofabed will help us improve the facility and our amenities.

Summary: Need to remodel the hotel...too many things are old ..staff is good  .. my pillow was very smell human hair... found stain at bed sheet.. towels have stain... central heating can't turn it off... worth your money but need to change lot a things
Manager Response: Hi Sam:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor.  Please accept our apologies for the heating and linen issues you had during your recent stay here.

Summary: We stayed 12 nights at Buena Park Radisson suites. And I could have stayed another 12. This was our second visit this year and it didn't disappoint.   The rooms are great, spacious, clean & well equipped. The staff are GREAT, we, well my brother, kept ordering Amazon packages, and the staff on the desk couldn't have been more helpful. Upon check in, we got the room we asked for, top floor over looking the pool & most beautiful gardens. The hotel was rather quiet, unlike Disneyland, and it was just brilliant. We had an issue with our shower head, we called the front desk, within 5 minutes the maintenance men were there & fixed it.   The hotel is super close to Knotts Berry Farm and has a FREE shuttle there & also to Disneyland, which was very helpful.  There is a big mall within
Manager Response: Hello lethal77:  We appreciate your great feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how helpful our staff was, along with how comfortable you found our accommodations to be.  Please come back for another 12 days!

Summary: Staying with this property was a feel like home experience. I feel secure and happy during my stay with this property.  The location is super perfect, you will get all kind of food here down the street !!
Manager Response: Hello 786parveenra:  We are delighted to know that you feel that our hotel is your home away from home!

Summary: The Hotel is nice from the outside but the inside the room carpet is old and smells, phones for service out of order, the staff don't acknowledge that you are a radisson member, breakfast no idea where it was no concierge services.
Manager Response: Hi ixquisasilb:  Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you encountered during your recent stay with us.  It must have been frustrating to not have room phones operating and staff members not acknowledging your Club Carlson status.  We appreciate the feedback in an effort to improve our facilities and services.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location. The staff is wonderful. Knotts Berry farm is across there street and the drive to Disneyland is about 15 minutes. Hotel bar is great never really busy so your servers quick.
Manager Response: Hello Trudydamas:  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay in our hotel!

Summary Heading: NOT WHAT IT USED TO BE - new owners
Summary: This is my third time here.  Let's start with what is still lovely.  The gardens are a lush oasis. Fenced pool area. Super friendly staff.  Free parking. Spacious quiet rooms. Good selection of restaurants within walking distance.  (Indian resto next door delivers.) Beds and linens are lovely.  Energy saving lighting. Kitchenette. Let's start with what surprised me this time around. The rooms smell. The first room smelled of urine.  This one is musty. Sofas and armchairs are very worn.  Stained carpets. Breakfast (omelette station, table service with real china in the gardens) is no longer included.  Now $11.95 per person buys a self serve styrofoam cup, luke warm instant coffee, plastic plates and utterly inedible food (for some reason rice is served at breakfast).  Daily
Manager Response: Hello SunnyinNaples:  We appreciate your return visits to the hotel and your constructive feedback.  It's unfortunate that you had problems with the WiFi and odor in your suite.  Regrettably, our complimentary breakfast ended about three years ago but we try to offer good buffet value at $11.95 per person.

Summary: Nice big rooms and very nice, funny staff! I would stay here again. Some of the stuff in the room was a bit worn and needed replaced (couch), but everything was very clean and spacious. Location is great, with lots of things to do and places to eat within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hi N796OVrobinh:  Thank you for leaving us some great comments on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted you found our staff to be funny and our location ideal!

Summary: Awesome staff. Very friendly and accommodating. Most helpful hotel staff I've come across in several years. Nice facility. Great location. Lots of good food and entertainment nearby. Easy access to highways.
Manager Response: Hi anthonybP151LK:  Thank you for sharing your great feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how satisfied you were with our location and that our staff was helpful.

Summary: the hotel is very clean and quiet, very family oriented and has an old spanish style omniance, and then opens to beautiful greenery with a heated pool and ajcuzzi AWESOME, then enter modernized very nice and very clean rooms
Manager Response: Hello natashar633:  We're delighted that you shared thoughts about your recent stay in our hotel!

Summary: Liked hotel location, layout and room layout. Unfortunately, the kitchenette sink and living room phone didn't work, and the drain in shower wasn't attached. The carpet looked like it wasn't layed correctly, because it was folded around some of the baseboards. Also had off white stains on white comforter.
Manager Response: Hi Chip and Dale 2017:  Please accept our apologies for the trouble with the sink, telephone and linens in your suite.

Summary: Convenient Location. Average to Poor rating from me. External property and staff matches to my expectations. Lot of trees surrounding internal pool area need to be trimmed. Place smells musty or old. Room got the worse score of Poor - Carpets, sofa bed, fixtures were tattered, dirty, and/or broken. For family use, would not go again.
Manager Response: Hello Stevette2017:  Your feedback on TripAdvisor was very much appreciative.  We love to hear kind remarks about our staff members but regret the problems you had with the carpet and sofabed.

Summary: The suites with separate bedroom and living room/kitchen area are perfect for families. I love the shutters on the door and windows to let light in but still feel private. Nice pool area. Walking distance to Knott's Berry Farm and shuttle service offered to Disneyland. We've stayed here twice and will stay again!
Manager Response: Hello Cristen:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor and look forward to seeing you again very soon!

Summary Heading: I'm pleading with you not to stay at this hotel -
Summary: I walked into the lobby to check in and there were three people working behind the counter; not one of them spoke to me. After standing there by myself (with no one in line) for several minutes, I was finally helped. I get to my room, and the travel door lock had been broken off. There was dust everywhere. The coffee cups literally still had old coffee in them from the old guests. The carpets were stained and lumpy. The sofa was worn and tattered. The curtains were dirty, and when I pulled them back to look at the view, I saw what looked like a huge clump of grey matter. Upon closer inspection, I was horrified to discover that the huge clumps were masses and masses of spider webs! Not only this, but it was obvious from the screen that the hotel room had been broken into before,
Manager Response: Hi JessicasU459ZV:  Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant stay in our hotel recently.  Your comments about the overall cleanliness about your suite were alarming, since we generally receive terrific feedback from our guests about our facility.  However, we are far from being "crooks" being part of the Radisson family.  I am available to discuss this matter with you further if you would like.

Summary: The hotel is located at a convenient location and looks nice on the outside.  However, it is run down and way below for the Radisson standard. Furniture in the room was stained/dirty, microwave was filthy, no hair dryer, no shampoo or conditioner in the room.  Breakfast was below average.  Water wasn't draining properly from the bathroom tub.  Don't think we will return
Manager Response: Hello Vivian:  We're sorry you were disappointed with your recent stay in our hotel.  It was unfortunate to read about the trouble you had with the furniture, microwave, missing amenities and hair dryer.

Summary: The hotel has the potential to be beautiful and welcoming - and probably once was. I could imagine the inner courtyard full of lush vegetation and an outdoor pool/hot tub would be a perfect oasis to relax in warmer weather. However, the overall property is a bit run down, and the inside of the room left a lot to be desired - from an overall strong musty smell in the room that made it to difficult to sleep, to carpets that are coming away from the wall, to finally a window/side wall that lets in a lot of cold air and dirty sheets with holes in them which shocked us when we checked in. The service was nice - both front desk and the housekeeping lady who helped us in what seemed to be an impossible quest to find clean sheets without holes in them. I get that it was over a long
Manager Response: Hello Urszula C:  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us but regret you had linen issues in your suite.  Please know that a renovation of the hotel will be forthcoming this year.

Summary Heading: frank enjoyed the fireworks view from window
Summary: good stay overall, except the cold water in the pool which was not repaired within the time staying.  Radisson has the resources to have gotten the cold-water issue repaired the same day that it went down.  In fact, the problem was reported to be a broken filter which made the water be unsafe to swim.  The water had a strong  urine smell that was not detectable from looking. The staff should have closed the pool since it was unsafe due to a high level of bacteria.    Radisson should have repaired the filter and understood the danger of having children and non-children exposed the water.  In fact, Radisson should have a professional to check the water safety daily.
Manager Response: Hi 626harrym:  We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor.  It was unfortunate that you had trouble with the swimming pool and our maintenance team was aware of the situation.

Summary Heading: Had a Great New Years Weekend
Summary: Bullseye view of the Fireworks on New Years Eve.  Large Clean Hotel Suite Friendly Staff  I was pleased all the way around. This weekend getaway could not have been any better.  Thank you to the entire Radisson Hotel Staff.
Manager Response: Hi Toche212:  Happy New Year to you and we're thankful for your kind words here on TripAdvisor!

Summary: The hotel is nice and clean. Friendly staff, location can't be beat. We were right next to Knotts, Medieval Times and Rock and Brews. All made for a fabulous weekend getaway. The rooms are large, the beds are comfortable. We were able to entertain a few family and friends for my birthday with the large table in our room.
Manager Response: Hello Toche212:  Your feedback on TripAdvisor was terrific to read!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay, were able to entertain guests and visited Rock & Brews...we love them being across the street from the hotel!

Summary: We have enjoyed this hotel for many years. It has an "oasis" vibe that is very pleasant. However, lots of changes have occurred since we started staying at the Radisson Buena Park. They no longer offer included breakfast and the buffet that is offered is not commensurate with the cost. The bar is under stocked and offers no appetizers or bar snacks. The rooms are in need of TLC and updating. The location is great for the Orange County area and area attractions. The staff is overall very pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Hi Janet:  Our staff appreciates your repeat visits to our property!  Your feedback about our breakfast offerings and bar environment are helpful to improve our facilities and services.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was spacious and the right size for our family. We were not in the room too much, but when we were sleeping, the people above us were walking hard and not allowing good sleep. The hot tub was also in front of our room and it was noisy at times.
Manager Response: Hello Sheilae2017:  Happy 2017 and thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted that our staff could be helpful to you but sorry about your noisy neighbors.  Please come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: We stayed in room 443 from December 22-25, the first night we had no heat.  We called it in and they were aware!!! Why assign a room that has no heat?? It was stormy cold weather and we were miserable- no offer to change rooms, etc.  it was fixed the next day however.  We then paid close to $50 for four breakfasts which were mediocre at best.  Signs said happy hour started at 3; there was no such thing. Elevators stunk like mildew. Pull out sofa was GROSS, so we forced 15 year old kids to sleep together instead of residing on the pull out.  Coffee/condiments not replenished. Not enough towels given for four people to shower without sharing wet towels.  The free shuttle to Disneyland was a definite plus and when a storm moved in one evening they came and got us upon a call.
Manager Response: Hi susanflies:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor about your recent stay in our hotel.  It was unfortunate that you had heater trouble in your suite along with various Housekeeping issues.

Summary: In a word, the room we were assigned, #444, was disgusting!  There were large stains, including blood and what appeared to be fecal matter, on the sofa-sleeper mattress.  In addition, portions of the bedroom floor appeared to be collapsing, and the telephones were non-functioning  I reported the above to the front desk clerk, and she was completely unsympathetic.  I wasn‚Äôt even given an apology. The entire experience was completely unsatisfactory, and my family and I will not be returning to this property.
Manager Response: Hi josephsH3588GX:  As I mentioned in my recent email to you, we're very sorry about the less than satisfactory stay you had in our hotel recently.

Summary: do not mislead by the name of this hotel , this location is horrible , very old property. better to go for some lodge or motel. carpet is stinging, bathroom door does not lock , no heating during winter or may be no AC during hot summer ..even they will charge full money ...very bad experience...
Manager Response: Hi katherinec961:  We're sorry you had a disappointing stay with us recently.  Please accept our apologies for the trouble with the carpets and heating system.  We will use this feedback to make improvements to our facility.

Summary: This is the third time that we have stayed at this property in the past year, and this time I accidentally left my wallet in the room, with my credit cards, gift cards and money in it!  I received a call from the managers on staff, Anthony and Melissa, saying that housekeeping had turned it in.  A few days later I received it in the mail, with everything intact!!  So impressed with their honesty!!  I would definitely recommend this property to everyone!!  Also love that my kids can have their own connecting room, and the price is good, and in walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm!
Manager Response: Hello Petra:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!  We truly appreciate your kind remarks about our staff!

Summary: We only stay at this hotel because the location is prefect for everything we visit in Buena Park. The Hotel itself is slowing with every stay is worse and worse from the inside decor of the rooms to the outside decor. The food is has also down graded as well.
Manager Response: Hi Kristina:  Thank you for your recent review on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry you were disappointed with your last stay and we'd like for you to know that a comprehensive renovation of the hotel is being planned for the near future.

Summary: like the hotel and suits . was close by alot of events.   hotel rooms were very clean especially bathrooms.   some noise from kids staying there but over all a good nice safe place to take family and friends
Manager Response: Hi Jj B:  We're sorry for the noise during your recent stay in our hotel but glad you otherwise enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: I love the room layout and Disneyland shuttle
Summary: The layout of the room with a separate bedroom from the living room with a fold out bed is great for a family.  All rooms have a fridge and microwave.  Even though it isn't right next to Disneyland, they offer a quick free shuttle that is only 15 minute away and is easy to schedule.
Manager Response: Hello 564delaineb:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're delighted you enjoyed our suites and their amenities, along with complimentary shuttle service to Disneyland!

Summary: The stay was good, away from the rain back at home. The staff was wonderful, friendly and hospitable. Thank you Kris, Anthony, and Sandra for your help and directions. Good Location. The day manager female was wonderful Sandra had to call her to help Spanish speaking guests in the lobby...they made me feel that the staff cares about each and every single guests at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi topetem001:  We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor.com!  Your comments about our superstar staff members will be shared with each and every one of them!  It was great to read that you enjoyed our location too.

Summary: This place has certainly gone down hill. I've been staying at this hotel the last 5 years or so and the last few times the stay was fine. This time however was a different case. From check in the guy at the desk didn't know what to do and didn't know how to imprint my card on the paperwork, so he needed to get help. He didn't really say much just looked lost and confused. (I work front desk and talking to your guests from the time they check in is big.) We had asked for a specific room which was not given. Totally understandable since it was a Friday night. But to be right next to the stairs was ridiculous. I called the front desk and asked to be moved. We moved one room over which was fine. Then once in our new room another guest had been given the same keys to our room. And
Manager Response: Hi Michelle:  Thank you for taking the time to leave some feedback for us on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry you you felt the hotel is going downhill and I should let you know that we have a renovation in the works to dramatically improve the property.  Would you be able to share the associate you were in contact with during your check in time?

Summary: we are not looking for something fancy just a place for the kids and a place to sleep and it met our needs so for us it was perfect it has a pool gym restaurant gift shop and the employees were very attentive and helpful. the staff in the restaurant very nice and attentive
Manager Response: Hi 44eleazarz:  Thank you for your comments on TripAdvisor.  Our staff members are appreciative of your kind words about the service they provided to you and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I am required to travel for business and frequently stay at Radisson properties and have always been pleased.  I was able to use a significant amount of the Club Carlson points I have accumulated to bring my family on a vacation at this Radisson Suite.    I will start with the positive.  The hotel staff was very helpful, professional and prompt.  We checked in with Anthony who answered our questions regarding our multiple reservations as a result of using Carlson Points, helped with the shuttle times and signup, had good suggestions for activities and restaurants and was very friendly.  The breakfast staff was always attentive and helpful.  The shuttle drivers were always on time, very considerate, and drove carefully.  The property appears quite nice from the outside including
Manager Response: Hello O1302FWadamr:  Your review on TripAdvisor is very appreciated.  We're sorry you had issues with the sofabed and other conditions in the hotel, along with linen inconveniences.  Thank you for your kind remarks about our staff members and please know that we are in the planning stages for a renovation of our hotel.

Summary: The rooms were spacious, the front staff was friendly.  I had no issues or concerns during my stay here.  We used the shuttle to Disneyland.  Shuttle was always on time.  The fitness center was a little run down.  Overall my daughters  and I had a great time, and most definitely would book this hotel again!
Manager Response: Hi 545tiffanyw:  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit with us and appreciate your suggestion about the fitness center!

Summary: The hotel has great potential. Unique structure, great tile work, nice room layout.   Plus side....  Room layout Microwave and fridge  Small counter space with bar sink Clean fresh beds Nicely landscaped pool area Unique older building with a Spanish California flair that could be built upon with some renovation.   The downsides....  maintenance and cleanliness is sorely lacking.  Every couch and chair I saw, common areas and multiple rooms, needed to find a landfill. They were filthy and broken down. Not something I would sit on.   When they are too useless for a room they are stuck in a common area?  The carpets...worn, filthy, and just tired  The whole property was screaming for a cleaning staff to show it some love.   Since the breakfast was included in our room rate it was
Manager Response: Hello lneath:  We're sorry your recent stay in our hotel was not up to your standards.  Please know that a comprehensive renovation of the hotel is in the works and we hope that will allow you to return to the hotel in the future.

Summary: I never write reviews for hotels but I felt this hotel has un-rightly received poor ratings and since I had an excellent experience I felt I should share! We travel to Disneyland about 3 times a year and always stay right across the street... this time our primary reason for travel was softball and the hotel was chosen for us by a group service. I read the reviews and was horrified‚Ä¶ however I couldn‚Äôt have asked for nicer staff, clean facilities, and comfortable beds. The rooms were huge (true a little outdated but super clean), and all my request were honored by the hotel (top floor, extra pillows). When we arrived the pull out bed had no linens but I called the front desk and they brought up clean ones in under 5 minutes. We never took the shuttle but the drive to Disney was
Manager Response: Hi Alanam147:  We're so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay in our hotel!  It was great to read how our staff took good care of you and that your suite was in very good shape.  We hope your team fared well in the softball tournament!

Summary: We stayed at the radisson because we wanted a close spot to medieval times.  Hotel staff was nice.  The room was really nice. I'd say average, but the layout was so cool and so smart that it made it awesome.  We got the bottom of the line, most basic room and yet the layout made us feel like big spenders.  You walk into a living room with a pull out couch and arm chair. Nice tv, good lighting, and lots of storage.  There's a mini kitchen/wet bar with fridge and freezer, sink and counter,  coffee maker and supplies.  A cool little table and chairs you can easily use to eat a meal or play cards with 4 chairs.  Not cramped at all.  You then walk down a little hall that has the bathroom.  Basic bathroom but cool touches like the bathroom door was frosted glass. The bedroom had two
Manager Response: Hello 804joannaw:  We really appreciate your comprehensive review on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how much you enjoyed our hotel, its furnishings and close proximity to Medieval Times.  Please come back to visit us again very soon!

Summary: Great family hotel.  This is a hidden gem if you have kids. I have five kids and it suited our needs perfectly.  It is reasonably priced, clean and quaint.  It's a little older but that adds to it's charm.
Manager Response: Hi Shannon:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!

Summary: the hotel was nice and had two rooms so we didn't have to fight for the TV with the kids. Knotts Berry farm , Mid evil times , the wax museum and the pirate dinner is walking distance . also lots of restaurants near by
Manager Response: Hello Ramon:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay in our hotel and didn't have to fight over the TV channels!

Summary: Our room was a large suite with comfortable beds and a living room with a small kitchenette. Bedding and towels seemed clean, decent bathroom amenities provided.  But the room had a strong musty smell, very dirty-looking carpet and tired furniture. The sofa bed was stained, dirty and terribly worn out - I doubt it's any good for sleeping. Main room door was very thin and you could hear everything outside, with weird blinds that barely closed. Thankfully the bedroom has a second door that works quite well. I doubt it, but in case I got an upgrade or one of the better rooms as a Club Carlson Concierge, I'd be scared to see some of the worse rooms.  Breakfast buffet is OK with a few hot options. However, the cheap plastic plates and cutlery really spoiled it. Elevators only had a
Manager Response: Hi Karlis:  Thank you for your Club Carlson loyalty and for staying with us.  We're sorry our hotel did not meet your expectations and we will review the issues with the sofabed, elevators and dishes in the restaurant.  You should know that a comprehensive renovation of the hotel is in the planning stages right now!

Summary: Good Location, Walk to Knotts Berry Farm Anthony at the Check-In Desk is Great Beds are great Rooms could use a renovation, stained carpets, old furniture. Suites are two rooms/Separate Bedrooms Mini Fridge & Microwaves in room TV is flat screen, limited channels Fine Hotel if you can get discounted rates.   Would not pay more than $125.00 here. Shuttle only runs once a day to Knotts
Manager Response: Hello Rick:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback, especially about Anthony's service to you.  Please know that a comprehensive renovation is in the works for our property.

Summary Heading: Not worth the money for several reasons
Summary: 1. Slow barely functional internet. 2. Bio -hostile styrofoam coffee cups, spoons and dessert bowls. 3. Plastic plates and cheap cutlery 4. Spiderwebs and lazy cleaning 5. We got upgraded, but the carpet has dirtmarks and bumps on it. Should be changed.  6. Dirty windows, has not been cleaned for months. 7. Noisy, can hear traffic like I was sleeping outside - even with closed window. 8. Got cold and undercooked potatoes (tasted raw). Chef said: "some people like it this way, you know?" 9. Severely overpriced for what I got. I regret not spending my money elsewhere.
Manager Response: Hello L0stViking:  We're sorry that your recent stay in our hotel was not up to your expectations.  Your comments about the carpet, WiFi, plates/utensils, noise and breakfast food quality were disappointing to read about but will be reviewed for resolution.

Summary Heading: Nice location, large room, price ok, but needs real basic work
Summary: basic maintaince is missing - stained and cut/town bed sheets, light bulbs missing or burnt out, carpet on second floor main building is terrible shape, room service very slow, house keeping talking long breaks on the cell phone outside rooms, yard/trees need to be cleaned/ trimmed, etc. Again location is nice, rooms large, nice layout and design of the hotel... but it is falling apart... these problems have been here for years now (we come to this hotel each year for several years now).
Manager Response: Hello Kendall:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We appreciate you bringing the light bulb, carpeting and linen issues to our attention along with the notes about staff using their phones outside of the rooms.  Please accept our apologies for these inconveniences.

Summary: My family and I visited in November, 2016. We had read many bad reviews before we got here so we were a little nervous upon arrival. The room was clean and spacious. We had to ask for linens for the sofa bed which they delivered. They were stained so we asked for a second set. They offered us a free breakfast as compensation which we never received. After that all went well though we were a family of five and had to keep requesting more towels as only three would be available after each cleaning. We enjoyed the free shuttle to Disneyland. It was a little inconvenient to have to schedule your whole day before (departure and return time). But we had older kids so this wasn't a huge issue for us. The bus was clean and the drivers were friendly. We enjoyed the pool and hot tub. It
Manager Response: Hello Paula:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read how spacious you thought your suite was and that you were able to enjoy the pool and spa.  Next time please give our breakfast buffet a try!

Summary: I am so disappointed with this place. First upon check in, I felt disrespected by the front desk employees. I was so serious about asking them if the hotel will be affected by the power outage and they just made a joke out of it. Not even did they offer to call management to confirm. FAILED SERVICE ! Next on to my room, elevator did not work - almost got trapped inside. my room - there is a desk but NO CHAIR. How am I supposed to work. I have to improvised. I used the sofa chair as the chair for the desk. Not good for my back but it has to do. Carpet is full of stains. Musty smell. All in all I must say I am just disappointed and will not recommend this place. For the value, you can add a bit more and go to 2 other hotels close by.   Only reason I went to this hotel is to work
Manager Response: Hi Melba:  We're sorry you were inconvenienced by a recent power outage to your home.  It was unfortunate that you also had carpet and odor problems, along with not having a desk chair in your suite.

Summary: Prior to our stay, I read a bunch of negative reviews on Trip Advisor and was a bit worried.  I wanted to cancel, but I am glad we didn't.  The check in process was very smooth and the service was super friendly.  He upgraded us as I am an Carlson Elite Member and my room was HUGE for 2 people.  It even had a full size board room table.  I have to admit though, cleanliness could be improved.. it was fine for the most part, although the furniture is very worn out in the living room area and common areas but overall we were very satisfied with our stay.  We took return shuttles to Disneyland for 2 days and they were on time and easy to arrange.
Manager Response: Hi 1vancouvergirl:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review and your Club Carlson membership!  We're glad you enjoyed your spacious suites and timely shuttle service but regret the Housekeeping issues you encountered.

Summary: Each one of my wedding guests that stayed at this hotel had some type of problem with their stay.  From the cleaning lady handing my grandma a plunger to fix the toilet herself to having my fiance get ready in the same room as me on our wedding day because rooms were not ready or functional.  The list goes on.  The front desk was not accommodating and rude to some of my guests.  I was so embarrassed that I chose this hotel for my wedding weekend.
Manager Response: Hi Crysstyle88:  Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you encountered with your wedding party recently in our hotel.  It was unfortunate that you referenced the issues that occurred and we are looking into why things went so poorly with your group.

Summary: Where do I start. The floors were so dirty my 2 year olds feet was black. There was spiders in the pull out bed. The  couch was so bad we put a sheet on it just to sit on it. Holes in the walls. It smelled bad. I would not ever stay here again. Very dirty.
Manager Response: Hello Michael:  We're sorry you had carpet problems during your recent stay here, along with pests and sofabed issues.

Summary: Terrible wifi  Disney shuttle was non existent even when we signed up  Pull out couch was horrible.  The service at front counter was non existent. Someone told us shuttle was booked then 10 minutes later we signed up for a slot.
Manager Response: Hi K763MKkathleenw:  Please accept our apologies for the WiFi, shuttle and sofabed issues you recently encountered in our hotel.  We appreciate you passing this information on to us so we can improve our facility and services.

Summary: We had an opportunity to stay at this hotel on 26.09.16 - 28.09.2016. Rooms are very specious and comfortable. The food/breakfast was very good. The ambiance of the hotel is very good. The staff is friendly. Tourists from India may not very happy as health-facet is not provided in the rest room. Hence it is better to carry a mug along with them.
Manager Response: Hi gentleman492001:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor comments!  It was terrific to read that our staff, breakfast and atmosphere were all agreeable to you.  Please come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: This might be the shabbiest hotel I've ever stayed in. It obviously desperately needs upgrades and even upkeep. The room had a terrible musty smell that permeated our clothes (had to wash everything once we got home, even things we didn't take out of our suitcase). The carpets are frayed, ripped, and coming apart at the seams in the lobby and rooms. The cheapest of furniture was obviously purchased and so it is barely holding up (the sofa bed was shabby and we sunk down in and could feel the metal, not to mention the cushions didn't fit and so there were big gaps in the sofa). The vents on the walls in the lobby/courtyard were coming/hanging off and/or rusted. The phone outside of the elevator was hanging on by a thread (on all floors!). Just the lack of attention to keeping the
Manager Response: Hello Rachel:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor and received your troubling guest survey as well.  As mentioned earlier, it was unfortunate that you had carpet and odor issues in your suite but thank you for your kind remarks about our staff.

Summary Heading: Rode hard and put up wet...
Summary: Basically, this place, which we have stayed at several times in the past, is long past the time for a complete makeover.  Stained carpets and walls and not-fresh bathrooms are just a few of the things we noticed.  In addition, housekeeping was mediocre, with hand towels used for bath mats, TP holders that wouldn't hold rolls, empty kleenex dispensers for 2 days, mugs and glasses left dirty in the bar sink, non-working telephones (not a huge deal, but annoying), coffee and tea not replaced after using.  All things that I had to go to the front desk for to get resolved.  Customer service by the front desk and other staff =was= good, once they were informed of problems.  Radisson is =not= a brand we expect to look like this.
Manager Response: Hello Lyle:  We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor.  Please accept our apologies for the trouble with Housekeeping, and you should know that a comprehensive renovation is planned for our hotel.

Summary: i loved everything about this place the cleanness home feeling everything top to bottom. Hospitality at its finest. the bed pillows everything was so comfortable. the quietness. just a lovely place to stay ether with family or just alone time perfect place to be
Manager Response: Hello Jessica:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!

Summary: Checked into Hotel went to room key would not work, found door latch missing screws and loose, requested maintenance , that showed up 1 day later, had to kick door to open,lots of door and key issues with all of my families 4 rooms. Dirty carpets, leaky shower heads, poor room service. So bad I was Comped a day. I will never recommend a stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi hydrojohn4994:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're sorry for the key and maintenance issues you experienced and appreciate you bringing them to our attention.

Summary: Needs to be renovated and some definite tlc. main bed was comfortable, the pull out bed was worthless, seemed never replaced and just felt Springs. Lots of stains on the carpet, and buffet is not worth the price. The staff was very nice and helpful, also appreciated the shuttle to and from the parks. Whirlpool was comfortable and seemed to be kept clean.
Manager Response: Hello Cody:  We appreciate your commentary on TripAdvisor!  Your comments about our staff and shuttle service were great to read, but we're sorry you had problems with the sofabed.

Summary: Poor customer service and with attitude! Gotta love places that recite policy instead of trying to correct an issue you bring to their attention. If you get a king bed suite and need to use the puLloyd out sofa bed, insure there are sheets on it before you come home after a long day and try to sleep...we had none and our daughter fell asleep on a stained bare mattress...that was just one of a long line of issues with this place. It has really gone down hill fast.
Manager Response: Hi G1635BFmatthewp:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor.  It must have been frustrating to not have sheets available after a lengthy day out and we are sorry that occurred.  Our Housekeeping Department has been made aware of this in an effort to improve our overall facility and services.

Summary: Poor service, room keys did not work our entire 3 day stay, had to keep going to lobby for help. Not very clean hotel. Housekeeping services poor.   Yellow tape around poor area, not a good feel or look! Windows, sliders, very dirty. Carpet in room, stains. Staff unconcerned about any issues brought to their attention. One of the rooms didn't lock when you left, door could be pushed open.  No one was sent to repair it.
Manager Response: Hello Kathie:  We're sorry you had so many things go wrong during your stay here recently.  It's unfortunate that you had key issues along with Housekeeping and lock issues.

Summary: The Radisson at Buena Park is a great place to bring family. Walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm and numerous restaurants and stores nearby.  We had a special request regarding the hotel shuttle and an item left behind, the hotel manager was nice enough to accommodate our request. We really enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi after a long day in the park.
Manager Response: Hello Keith:  Thank you for your recent review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed our ideal location, shuttle service and pool area.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: too much money for the value
Summary: bathroom was dirty, bathroom door wouldn't close, toilet constantly ran, mattresses were hard not impressed for the price the front desk staff was friendly and helpful and the gift shop had a few things we needed for our stay. Won't stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello 595mindyn:  We're sorry you had issues with the bathroom during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: The hotel is attractive, clean and the location was perfect for our Disney/Knotts Berry Farm vacation.  However, the fitness center was an unsafe disaster:  half of the equipment didn't work and the weight set was an embarrassing and dangerous collection of mismatched plastic weights.
Manager Response: Hi Patrick:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor feedback and for your comment card that you completed.  I will definitely check in to your comments about the fitness center.  We recently had all of the equipment inspected and repaired, so your review concerns me.

Summary: Would have liked to give it a double thumbs up, location is great, rooms are clean.  Staff is very polite and professional. Overall property needs to be updated, and some TLC with the foliage outside could be a beautiful place to stay!
Manager Response: Hello Christine:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  Your kind words about our staff is very much appreciated.

Summary: The entire hotel and its surrounding landscape, hardscape and lobby appearance is filthy. The condition of the room furnishings and carpet was disgusting - completely worn out and something one would expect from a dive hotel that rents by the hour in a brothel section of a town.  The waitstaff at the front counter are simply stupid. Asked about the form for Gov tax exemption, the staff had no idea what I was talking about.  I could see the office behind the counter was a desheleved mess and was exactly like the rest of the hotel.  The restaurant was a mess...it had no patrons and no one to serve at the bar.  The entire hotel should be demo'd.  My report will be passed along - no other Fed Gov employees should risk their health by staying at or anywhere near this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi David:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're sorry you felt that the hotel had cleanliness issues along with troubles accommodating your tax exempt request.

Summary Heading: Dirty, cheap, motel quality and roaches
Summary: After check-in I go to shower and the bathroom did not look like it was cleaned, floor did not look mopped, woman's long hair on the floor and the tub (I'm a man with short hair) and ripped shower curtain. I later asked for a few more towels, it took about 30 minutes to receive them, I looked them over, one was dirty and the other had a booger. I then requested clean towels again this time it took over an hour to receive.Finding a roach on my last day was just what took it all. Room has very cheap quick fix repairs done instead of done the correct way. Cleanliness is not there. Very disappointed. Maintenance and housekeeping managers need to be replaced with more qualified personnel. This Radisson feels more like a cheap motel.
Manager Response: Hello asalazar2015:  Please accept our apologies for the Housekeeping and Maintenance issues you recently experienced in our hotel.  It must have been frustrating to see repair items that could have been done differently, along with having your towel request delayed.

Summary: The first thing I noticed was how many stains throughout the room there was. Not just on or two but more than a dozen large to medium stains (gross) Also the Duvet zipper was broken inside the duvet was a visibly stained and ripped blanket. What could've been unfortunately never was
Manager Response: Hi Bryan:  Please accept our apologies for the troubles recently with the duvet and other cleanliness issues you encountered.

Summary Heading: Great location and big spacious rooms
Summary: Easy to use for families. 2 queen beds with a separate living room was great to spread out. Pool is not heated, hot tub wasn't hot. Breakfast is not included but has a frig and micro to use. Target is 2 blocks away, easy for groceries. Great free shuttle to parks.
Manager Response: Hello Sarah:  We're sorry you had pool and spa issues during your recent stay here, but glad you found our location to be convenient.

Summary Heading: Knotts Berry Farm visit, stayed at Radisson Buena Park
Summary: I remember a time when this was the Embassy Suites Hotel. While I was growing up, my parents brought us every summer, it was a blast, we stayed at this hotel for several days. But now that it's a Radisson Hotel, things have changed for the worse!  I understand it is a franchise Hotel,  those that have managed this have really run this hotel into the ground. The location is ideal for those who want to visit Knotts berry farm, however just keep in mind that while we spent one night, the mechanism in the pull-out bed didn't work. We could pull out the bed but you couldnt put it back in. The smoke alarm was hanging from the ceiling it was not operational.  Entryway into the pool ( there were 3) two of those were roped off. Evidently the mechanism to scan and get into the pool was

It is unfortunate that you have decided not to return to our hotel.  While there have been many changes over the last 3 years of my management of the hotel, I am happy to report that our new owners are in the process of a comprehensive renovation of the facility.  Please also know that our hotel IS inspected by an authorized agent for Radisson twice per year.  We have been a proud member of the Radisson family for 10 years and hope for continued success.

Summary: We stayed here due to close proximityto Knotts Berry Farm. Decent hotel within walking distance and close restaurants. Room smelled a little but we're clean. Request for additional towels never arrived

Summary: Rooms need to be updated regarding sofa and carpet and the rooms smelled musty all the time,, beds were comfortable and the bathroom was clean.. Breakfast was included in our rate and it was very nice.. There was a good variety to choose from.. This is our second time staying and will stay again as it is in a great location for our needs
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed breakfast but regret the sofa, carpet and odor issues in your suite.

Summary: What happened to the Radisson? It used to be so nice but now it needs a major overhaul, renovation, and TLC. The suite smelled of mildew and my clothes reeked for days. The sofabed sheets were stained and worn. There was litter behind the sofabed and the carpets were stained.
Manager Response: Hi Di:  We're sorry you had an odor problem in your suite, along with sofabed troubles.

Summary: The pictures for this hotel are misleading.  Had nothing but problems with our stay.  The only good thing about this hotel was the location.  Would not recommend this hotel if you are wanting a nice quiet stay.  Uncomfortable beds and noisy lead to no much sleep the entire stay.  If the room hadn't been paid through Hotels.com, we would have left.
Manager Response: Hi mjleeiii:  We're sorry you had problems during your recent stay in our hotel, including beds that weren't comfy and noisy neighbors.

Summary: This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. my air broke and after calling the front desk 3 time someone finally showed up to look at it. he told me he would be back and never returned. I was also told the manger would contact me and they still haven't. I stay at a lot of hotels and this is by far the worst hotel I have ever stayed in.
Manager Response: Hi Joseph:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're glad that Carlson Customer Care was able to resolve the issues you had in our hotel recently.  Please accept our apologies for the chronic problems you had with the air conditioning in your suite.

Summary: I chose this location for convenience. Not a good hotel for business - the room had unreliable internet service. the bathroom had hairs on the wall tile and tub. The coffee maker did not work. I was also overcharged for incidentals and money not returned despite having received confirmation from the manager that this had been done. Called later in the week and the night staff informed that nothing had been done yet and this was a few days later. Made my business trip a very negative experience.
Manager Response: Hello Admir:  Please accept our apologies for the cleanliness, coffee maker and billing issues you recently endured during your recent stay in our hotel.
