Manager Response: Hello tracydG5410FH:  We're sorry you had trouble with the sofabed and odor problems in your suite when you were in our hotel recently.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, clean, but a little dated
Summary: The room is a suite, large with a sitting room and bedroom. It was clean and comfortable and good value. It is very well located for Knotts Berry farm if you are going there. However it is looking a little tired and dated, particularly the bathroom where the sink tap flowed very poorly. The lighting was somewhat random too, for instance the bedside lamps worked only occasionally !
Manager Response: Hi Ducksraider:  We're sorry you had troubles with the bathroom, bedside lamps and other lighting during your recent stay in our hotel.

Summary: When first looking at the hotel it looked decent. After walking around you begin to see how dirty it is. The walls, the elevators the floors. They tried to update it but really all it was was granite counter tops and maybe new bedding. The pull out sofa sleeper was not even useable. Room smelled awful. Old and musty. Everyone else's doors were propped open so I know it was not just us. Beds were decent, pool area was nice. The over all look of the resort was tropical looking with palm trees and a lot of green plants. I don't think I'd stay here again. Only plus was it was across the street from knots berry farm so we could walk over. Extremely over priced!!
Manager Response: Hello MrsJewell21:  Please accept our apologies for the sofabed, odor and cleanliness issues you recently experienced in our hotel.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel the first time in 2008. We have spent one or more nights here each time we have visited Callifornia (this was our 4th time). Unfortunately this probably was our last time. During our stays we have seen the hotel slowly falling apart. The hotel we fell in love with back in 08 is now an ordinary, run down hotel. You don't get your moneys worth anymore. Don't get me wrong. I'm usually not the one who complain about details like windows that dont open and closet-doors that fall of. If the room is clean and the staff are doing their best I'm happy. However, when you get stained linen I feel it's time to speak out. That is just disrespectfully.  It would be easy to blame the staff for all the issues with this hotel. The staff is doing their best. Unfortunately
Manager Response: Hello CaliforniaSon:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor along with your long time patronage.  You did read correctly that we have a renovation planned for later this year.  We hope you will stay tuned for further developments regarding this.

Summary: We visited the USA and stayed in some bad hotels, one being the Days Inn in Columbus Ohio, and some good.  It was a relief to finish our final night in one of the good ones.  We wanted to do the Medieval Times attraction and decided on the Radisson as it was right next door.  We were not disappointed.  We were immediately greeted by friendly, helpful staff and found our room to be clean.  We even found we were greeted by an oragami elephent made out of towels in our bathroom, which was a sweet touch.  Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi HauntedHorizons:  Thank you for your kind remarks about our hotel, friendly staff and ideal location!

Summary: Cool place Cool room Nice clean surroundings Angels game Rad eats in the area Anahiem is quite nice Very clean facilities  Nice staff and helpful Excellent view and cool areas to hang  If I could would do it again :-)
Manager Response: Hello 867emiliov:  We appreciate your wonderful review on TripAdvisor!  It was terrific to read how clean our hotel was and that you enjoyed our ideal location.

Summary: The carpet in the room was covered with many large dark stains. Sofa bed was disgusting filthy. Mattress on sofa bed had a huge stain on it.  Bathroom has a sliding door when I closed the door from inside I saw all kind of stuff on the door such as toothpaste , water stains... Swimming pool was very dirty and extreamly cold.  The breakfast Buffett was horrible. You could have a nice breakfast at IHOB with the amount they were charging .
Manager Response: Hello 306sepi:  Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you recently experienced in our hotel.  It was unfortunate to read about the cleanliness, pool and breakfast buffet issues you had.  Your feedback is important for us to be able to resolve this deficiencies.

Summary Heading: Excellent  hotel with polite friendly staff.
Summary: I stayed in room 342 with my teenage daughter from the 25th September  to 2nd October.  We arrived late after travelling  for over 24 hours and were greeted by friendly helpful reception staff. Our  suite was large with a living room, tv,  sofa ,chair,  dining table and chairs, kitchen area with microwave,  fridge freezer etc. Bathroom with lovely  toiletries  and plenty of towels . Our bedroom was 2 large double beds , tv etc. The suite was spotlessly  clean and every day the housekeeping  team were excellent in keeping our room serviced with towels , emptying bins and making up our beds etc. We had breakfast most days and found a good variety of choice.  I loved the scrambled eggs . We used the pool and we particularly  loved  the fact that you could use the pool upto 10pm
Manager Response: Hi leedsFrancesca:  Thank you so much for your great review on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted you and your daughter enjoyed your stay and were able to take advantage of our pool areas and ideal location.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: This hotel is centrally located near Disneyland and all kinds of great places to eat and shop. The staff is amazing, the customer service we receive is exceptional. For the price and location, this is a must stay hotel!
Manager Response: Hello Aaronaap:  WOW!  5 stars...we're grateful for that rating!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, great staff & U can walk to Knott's
Summary: We thought it would be nice to walk to a hotel room after a late night at Knott's Scary Farm. This beautiful hotel reminds me of a newer Mission Inn (in Riverside). Congrats to the architect! Our room had an extra room with an additional TV. I hope we stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Tom:  We're delighted you enjoyed your recent stay with us!  Comparing us to the Mission Inn is high praise indeed...thank you!

Summary: Good value for the price and location. Great staff, rooms are a little disappointing, but clean and comfy. The property is a little outdated, but there is plenty of parking and a pretty good location overall.
Manager Response: Hello Noreen:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're glad you enjoyed the price you paid and our location, but regret you had issues in your suite.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel on a business trip recently. The staff were very friendly including Sylvia, Rodolfo ands Juan. all in the restaurant/lounge area. The hotel is obviously dated and in dire need of a major facelift. Hours of amenities in elevators were inaccurate. The leadership and owners of this facility need to put their heads together to restore this property to at least a four star hotel. Right now, it is borderline two or three star. The potential for the Radisson Suites is  obvious. Listen to your staff and make the necessary change to lift your hotel out of mediocrity.  You can easily increase occupancy and at the same time profits with a modest investment. Also, listen to your guests. I probably will not stay here again. My visit confirmed other guest comments are
Manager Response: Hi Patommy:  Your TripAdvisor comments are very much appreciated!  Please know that we are in the planning stages for a renovation of the hotel to include the guest rooms, restaurant and lobby.  Stay tuned for the latest news about improving our hotel!

Summary: excellent hotel, the hotel staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel was very clean and neat. Staff greets me by name. The room service was wonderful a bit pricy but the restaurant was excellent. Staff at the gift shop were superb.
Manager Response: Hello Kristin:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!

Summary: This place is located well for getting about the area and despite being a little dated, is well worth a try.  Plenty of onsite parking.  Check in was quick, and I had previously emailed ahead about my reservation and this was remembered by the agent.    Was given top floor (4th) at the back of the building.  423 has a decent lounge with TV, sofa, fridge/sink, and large bedroom, comfy bed.    Dropped luggage and went to leave the room only to find the door wouldn't lock.  Called reception and maintenance came within 20mins, had to wait in an hour for them to replace the unit.  WIFI can be a little hit and miss, and this has been the case on all occasions.    I went to Knotts Scary Farm which is a 10min walk from here.  Very convenient.   15 min walk away is Buena Park downtown
Manager Response: Hello Darryl:  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted how much you enjoyed our hotel and the City of Buena Park.

Summary: the room was simple and clean, the front desk staff was very helpful, i had smal problem with the remote , and that was fixed fast, even recommending the place across the street , live music and drinks . thank you
Manager Response: Hi adolfoz936:  WOW!  5 stars...thank you!

Summary: It's a shame, I've always gone into bat for this place but I noticed the cracks this time, our sixth staying at Radisson Suites.   First off we got a room on the 2nd floor. Which was fine, until 1.30am when a family above us checked in. I have NEVER heard noise like it, and I've lived in apartments. Running, thumping, slamming...at 1.30am! I don't even understand how they were running so much, the rooms aren't THAT big. Rang reception who said they would send someone up but the noise went on periodically all night.   The next morning my friend went to reception to ask when this family would be leaving as we couldn't put up with the noise. Turns out they were staying the same length of time we were and had booked out 6 rooms above us. Six!! The staff didn't suggest anything until
Manager Response: Hello yellowtangelo:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  Your comments about the WiFi, linens and smoking concerns are greatly appreciated.  Additionally, we are sorry for the noisy neighbors you had upstairs from you.

Summary: We stayed at this property in December 2015.  The first room we were given the bed was so soft, they switched us immediately to a new room With a firmer mattress.  Next room had no issues.  2 room suite and, 2 beds in be roo a had a pull out sofa bed in the other room.  Both rooms had a tv and the small table and chairs to sit out.  Found no issue with the room and our carpet was quite clean.  Pool area was well kept.  Breakfast was good.  Free shuttle us to Disneyland and knotts berry was handy and always on time. The driver was very friendly. We had to use the wheelchair access each time on the bus, and it was never a hassle for the driver.
Manager Response: Hi Gabrielle:  It was great to read how satisfied you were with your recent stay with us and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was given my bill at the door in the morning and when I was charged on my card, they charged much more than the bill for some reason.  I have no idea of the reason for the amount charged since the bill did have an itemized list of charges.
Manager Response: Hello Jared:  We're happy to provide you list of itemized charges to ensure your bill is accurate.

Manager Response: Hi Adam:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback!

Summary Heading: In serious need of good cleaning and maintenance
Summary: The hotel looked amazing online, oh what pictures can do...  I booked 2 nights here thru a 3rd party site and was very excited. No biggie, we'll just use the one in our room.  When we entered our room it had a funny smell, not rank, just weird.  We noticed the carpets were stained and dirty looking but paid no attention to it as we quickly dropped off our luggage and left for the evening. When we returned later that evening and took off our shoes, the carpets felt strange, kinda like smooshy and damp.  Again, since it was late, we did not put much thought into it.  The next morning I got up to take a shower and when I hopped in
Manager Response: Hello Jason:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor review.  Please accept our apologies for the carpet and other issues you encountered during your recent stay here.  That feedback will help us improve our product and service.

Summary Heading: Awful place, not being kept up due to upcoming remodel
Summary: Please read my review.  If you are planning to stay here please think twice.  We booked our room through a third party hotel booking company.  Upon check in the first thing we noticed were all the opossums running around outside.  At first glance they look like rats, but the big ears lead us to search this online, and apparently they do have an issue of opossums in the area, not really the hotels fault for this one issue.   We entered our room, and while it was dated that wasn't the issue.  Near our bathroom door there were many drops of blood on the carpet, like as if someone had a bloody nose near the sink.  So I called the front desk to see about getting housekeeping out or a change of rooms.  I was told the hotel was sold out, so they would send housekeeping.  We waited for
Manager Response: Hello corinnalv:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're sorry you felt the hotel is not being kept up because of the renovation along with trouble with the pool.  I can assure you that all of our permits are in good order from the Orange County Health Authority related to any health concerns you may have.

Summary Heading: In genral it is a good hotel
Summary: Good hotel but it might need some  furniture such as  The curtain change.  I  commended for a big family since there is two bed  and there is a sofa that can turn into bed.  There is a microwave and a small fridge.
Manager Response: Hello 949abdullahz:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad your family enjoyed your stay in the hotel and were able to utilize the fridge and microwave.

Each room has its own TV and there's a hide-a-bed in the front room, so it will sleep up to 60 (if you get the room with 2 doubles).  The hotel is about a 10 minute walk from the main entrance to Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Hi Stephen:  We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor!  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your lodging needs near Knott's Berry Farm.

Summary: We love staying at the radisson suites!! Great room layout. Pull out sofa! Perfect for family of 5. 10min drive to Disney land. Tons of food places near by. Safe. Clean pool and even a gift shop. Friendly staff.

Summary: I had to leave the hotel   since we found the hotel in the worse condition I have ever been. The hotel is too dirty, carpets were not fixed in the floor and were totally unhealthy, mirrors and windows were totally dirty and we found trash bellow the bed (gatorade container). I asked for a different room and they said that the hotel was full and did not have any rooms

Summary Heading: Moldy smell.   Bugs inside room. Stains on sheets AND carpet.
Summary: The reviews were right:  this place is an absolute dump.  When we first walked into the room and the carpet had four distinct stains (unknown origin), we did not notice them as much due to the overpowering musty/moldy smell.  It gets better.  There was a spider that had taken up residence in the room and had quite a large web growing in the corner.  But the bug issues were not limited to a lone spider.  There were three pesky mesquitos that were in the room during our entire visit.  Best advice is to stay somewhere else.    As soon as we pulled back the sheets on one of the beds, we noticed a stain (unknown origin) on the bed sheets.  The other bed - it was a double room - had a hole in the sheets, so either bed had sub-optimal covering.  Since this place is so dismal, the
Manager Response: Hi LV_Lee:  We're sorry you did not enjoy staying in our hotel, aside from our complimentary shuttle service discussed.  Your comments about pests and carpets will be addressed by our Housekeeping and Maintenance departments for resolution.

Summary: I have stayed here many times over the years..this was the worst. The sofa was old and broken (literally had a handwritten note on it "broken", chair was stained and old, carpet wrinkled, lifting up, filthy, shower curtain torn in many places, phones inoperative. Mini kitchen area was fine, beds were comfy, bedroom furniture in good shape linens good, except for one torn towel left one day. Grounds were well kept, room appeared to be freshly painted. nice pictures on walls.  Replace carpet and living room furniture, and it would have been good. Now it feels nasty. Also refused to even attempt a check in at 1 pm, would not look to see if any rooms were ready. Service was friendly but not accommodating.
Manager Response: Hello worldtraveller9008:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback.  Please accept our apologies for not being able to check in at 1pm, along with the carpet and sofabed issues you encountered.

Summary Heading: Close enough to Disneyland; RIGHT next to Knotts
Summary: My friend and I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights for a visit to Disneyland and it worked great for us. Usually I like to stay within walking distance to Disneyland but I had Radisson points to use so this ended up working out just fine for us. The shuttle to Disneyland was always reliable and saved us money on parking! Knott's Berry Farm is SO close. We could actually see a roller coaster from our room so it would be perfect if you're planning to visit that park.   Our room was very spacious with a separate living room area from the bedroom, which was really nice. We had a microwave, small refrigerator and coffee maker, though the piece where you put the filter was missing and was never replaced (even after leaving a note) so we weren't able to use the coffee machine. The room
Manager Response: Hi Michaels017:  Thank you for using TripAdvisor to write a review about our hotel!  Please accept our apologies for the coffee maker troubles but were glad you were able to enjoy the breakfast and our ideal location.

Summary: This is the 2nd time we have stayed in this hotel.  The location is very good and the staff are very friendly and will do anything to assist you.  The hotel suites are spacious and are adequate, however the rooms are on a little damp due to the air conditioning being on all the time. The pool and the hot tub is good. Breakfast was good also.
Manager Response: Hello Julie:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!  It was great to read that our staff was helpful and you enjoyed our large suites along with the pool/spa/.  We're sorry about the dampness you experienced.

Summary: Extremely noisy.  Kids running all over until 10:30 p.m.  again, at 8 a.m.  hard getting sufficient towels by the pool.  But, housekeeping for the room was good, and the gift shop.  Pool area had a lot of pollen and leaves.
Manager Response: Hi William:  We're sorry you had noisy neighbors and towel issues during your recent stay with us.

Summary: The hotel has a great location to different family activities. We have been coming here for 3 years annually and we love it. The fact that we are a family of 6 and we can all stay in the same room is a plus. Not all hotels accomidate that size of a family.
Manager Response: Hello cynthiacN4137MB:  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: I will be staying there again. It is clean, convenient and pleasant. So many things to do right around the hotel and just staying on the grounds in very nice as well. Beautiful pool and area to rest outside.
Manager Response: Hi Michelle:  Thank you for your wonderful review on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary Heading: Not at all what we expected
Summary: I wouldn't recommended this hotel. Rooms were humid and smelled mildewy. Carpets are dirty. Couch in front room was dirty. Sheets were damp. Had to ask staff to change sheets on first night because sheets were stained. The screen on TV in front room looked weird. Also, they don't have Spanish channels so the grandparents couldn't watch their news while we were there. Would never stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello swttyerns10:  Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you recently experienced in our hotel.  We appreciate you sharing your concerns about the carpets, couch and linen issues in the suite.

Summary: The hotel staff at the front desk was extremely helpful and nice. The hotel appears to be older and needs of a few updates but it is nice hotel for the money.  It is in a great location for restaurants and Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Hi Cristi:  Thank your for staying in our hotel and your kind remarks about our staff.

Summary: I will give this hotel 4 Stars. The rooms are excellent. The way they are set up helps family rest. If children are tired they can go to bed while parents stay in the small living room. There is no extra charge for microwave which helps when you go out as a family.
Manager Response: Hello Alma:  Thank you so much for your kind remarks on TripAdvisor and we are glad your family enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: Grounds were unkept & room carpet was FILTHY!!!! Tried to order room service but was told there was no chief for cooking. Staff was vary nice but clean towels was a problem due to 2 of the dryers were not working. When a day went by without the asked for towels I went to the laundry and saw that there had been a dryer fire. When asked when it happened I was told it was over a year ago.  Property is VERY poorly taken care of.
Manager Response: Hi NobleSATX:  Please accept our apologies for the linen challenges you had here recently.  It's unfortunate that you found our hotel not to be suitable for your lodging needs.

The rooms were perfect for what we needed, but updated carpets and clean bed sheets would make the hotel more appealing for others. The WI-FI did not work and a few other guests voiced they experienced the same problem while we were on the elevator. We had to go down to the front desk every night to reactivate our hotel room cards because we were not able to enter our rooms when we would return for the day. Never once was there any acknowledgment or apology for the inconvenience.
Manager Response: Hello Serichanhtho K:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor feedback.  Please accept our apologies for the trouble you had with the WiFi and keys during your recent stay here.  Your feedback about the restaurant is appreciated as well.

Summary: Moderate distance from LAX. Moderately large facility. Nice indoor foliage which gives it a tropical appeal. However, facilities are in much need of updating. Rooms were moderately clean. Multiple issues with security. No cameras on floors. Consequently our room was robbed and the culprit could not be discovered. Multiple rear card key entry doors often ajar.
Manager Response: Hi NZTrips:  It's unfortunate that you are reporting that something was taken from your suite while you were a guest in our hotel.  We do appreciate your feedback about our location and suite size.

Summary: We booked this hotel as we were planning on doing some activities in the Orange County area. We could not have picked a better place to stay. The location is amazing right down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, next to Medieval Times, and only 10 minutes from Disneyland. The suite is wonderful and it's so nice to have the extra room. The hotel itself is beautiful with a tropical feel from all the palm trees and a nice pool area. We'll definitely stay here again and again when we're in Orange County!
Manager Response: Hello melon1026:  We certainly enjoyed reading your review on TripAdvisor!  Your comments about our location and spacious suites were definitely appreciated!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this awesome hotel. It was a lil more as far as the $$$ but it was worth it. We stayed in a room with one king size bed but it had like a living room with a nice couch and even a dining room table where we were able to eat dinner. The bathroom was beautiful . They have an outdoor pool . And they even have gates that you need ur card to access the hotel area, unless you go through the main lobby. The customer service by the front desk representatives was very professional. We will definitely be staying here again if we are ever in the area. It is also located right down the road from a waterpark/amusement park. An that famous restaurant where you can watch a play / performance is very close. I forgot the name of it.
Manager Response: Hi Tygemb:  We were so pleased to read your review on TripAdvisor!  It was great that you enjoyed our location and all of the amenities of the hotel.  We're not sure if you went to Medieval Times or Pirates but make sure to visit whichever one you didn't on your next trip!

Summary: The service was good and they were kind. My 8 yr old son had too many churros and junk food at Disney and the end result was not good. 2 in the morning they sent someone up to help and they were very understanding.
Manager Response: Hello rclarez:  We like churros as much as the next person but we're so sorry you had that trouble in the middle of the night.  Our staff was more than happy to assist regardless of the hour.  Please come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights with the family. The location was great as we walked to Medieval Time one night and Knotts Berry Farm the next day. The rooms were clean but the carpets were stained. They charged for the breakfast buffet which was more like an average hotel breakfast that you usually get for free. I would stay here again as the beds were soft, comfortable, and clean.
Manager Response: Hi Haskell9942:  Your feedback on TripAdvisor was appreciated.  We're glad you enjoyed our location and comfy beds, but sorry for the carpet trouble.

Summary: We were pleased with our room and overall service here. The staff was friendly. The price was in line with the other local hotels and appropriate for the type of room we stayed in. I liked all the palms and the overall look of the hotel. My family and I had a very restful and comfortable beds. The sleeper sofa came in handy. Location is within walking distance to Knotts Berry Farms and Medievel Times restaurant.  The only minor issue I saw as a few stains in the carpet.

As a place to be and travel around is very well located, 10 min from Disney, not far from Los Angeles and none of the trafic, there are good restaurants and outlets around I'd stay there again, but please FIX THE INTERNET
Manager Response: Hello Jaime:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're sorry about the sofabed and WiFi trouble, along with the sofabed problems.  Your comments about our location are appreciated!

In all of the years that we have stayed there, the value was more worth it when you had all you can eat breakfast buffet for your guest. Now it $11.95 for Adults and $6.95 for kids. We already paid almost $800.00 for just the room for three nights, and then we would have to pay around $52.00 a  day for breakfast. Not a great value for our family.

I had to wait over 30 minutes each night.  the third night I stopped bothering to call, just tired of waiting.  No towel racks so we couldn't re hang the towels each night.  And i mean NO TOWEL RACKS.  The thermostat would not hold the right temp, would go down 3 or 4 degrees each night. The pool was crowded with tons of kids and my husband and I could not relax in the hot tub due to it was not heated at all and the jets did not work. The rooms were ok smelt like old cigarettes and the carpet was lifting in multiple areas. The bar area could use a little TLC low on stock and the bartender was not friendly. The Hotel grounds could use a super good gardening service from top to bottom.
Manager Response: Hi Kristina:  We're sorry about the noise problems you had recently in our hotel along with the hot tub trouble.

The 3rd floor lobby to the elevators, carpet was filthy.   There was a cup that and napkin that sat outside one of the rooms a few doors down for over 24 hours.   I turned down the covers on the last day to ensure nothing was left and underneath the top cover were two yellow stains (did not appear to be urine) maybe juice???  I have to say for the friendly staff, amenities and convenient location we would love to stay again, however each stay is worse than the next.  This property is old and dated, but it does not have to be compromised due to lack of upkeep.   We will look for another place to
Manager Response: Hello Deanna:  Thank you for your recent TripAdvisor review. Summary Heading: Good value for money, great location just a little dated.
Summary: We stayed here from 4th to 18th July 2016  a family of 4 with two children aged 15 and 17  The staff are extremely friendly and always happy to help. The hotel is in a great location with plenty of restaurants and shops close by outback steak house, TGI Fridays, in and out Burger restaurant, Jack in the box Burger house, subway sandwich, an Indian restaurant next door and many many more! . Knott's Berry farm theme park and water park are within walking distance about 10 mins away and there is a free shuttle bus to Disney. Breakfast wasn't included in our stay, so we just planned to have breakfast in our suite..... it's equipped with two queen beds, TV free WiFi a table and chairs and sofa in the lounge / kitchen area. It has a small fridge freezer and a microwave oven.....
Manager Response: Hello HardyFamilyCleveland:  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!    It was great to read that our location was convenient for your family and that our staff was helpful.

Finally given the truth from another manager at midnight that there was no eta on a/c repair

Summary: I booked and stayed at the Radisson in May/June for 6 nights with my family. We arrived at 9am and were told our room would be ready at 11am, a number of hours before check in. PERFECT! The staff were super friendly too.  We drove to the shops, which are close enough to walk too. Our room/suite was perfect when we checked in, microwave, fridge, sink area, large sitting area with dining table and then huge bedroom with 2 queen size beds. Lots of storage, a great view out to the garden & pool from the sitting area.  The pool was great, there were towels and plenty of pool seats. The area is so nice, away from the road which is nice.  The rooms were clean, tidy and spacious. The free shuttle was perfect! Yes they have selected times, but so what, it's free. Catch a cab if you don't
Manager Response: Hi lethal77:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor review!  It was great to read that we were able to check you in early and that we delivered good service.  Please come back to visit us when your travels bring you to Buena Park.

Summary: This is the second time that me and my family have stayed here. .."family"-wife,kids, parents and sister.  We enjoy the hotel location as it is close to Knotts Berry Farm, Disneyland and Huntington Beach.  It's an hour drive to Hollywood and Universal Studios.  You are a block away from Buena Park Downtown which is a mall with lots of stores including Walmart.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this place to anyone traveling to SoCal.
Manager Response: Hello Frank:  We're glad your family enjoyed our ideal location during your recent stay with us!

Summary: We always stay here when visiting Disneyland. It's about a 15 min drive. Knots berry farm is right across the street. Good size, clean rooms. Housekeeping are good. The food at the restaurant is not bad. The only one complaint I have with this place is the parking. If you come in late parking might be hard to find. Other than that great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hi Hrodriguez19:  Thank you for sharing your nice comments on TripAdvisor.  We're glad you find our suites large and clean but we're sorry you had parking troubles recently.

The AC was broken our entire stay, it was 78 degrees in our room with 45% humidity outside. House keeping was extremely slow and took HOURS to get us extra towels. We purchased a room with pull out sofa beds and one room was missing it, so when we called to have it exchanged it never came!! Overall, -5 review for this hotel which is very upsetting because from the outside it seems like it would be well-kept and have higher customer service standards.

Summary: If you want to be in the middle of everything, stay here.  It is within walking distance from practically everything you could think of. Great place except for the fact that the A?C was not working when we went but I would definitely stay again as long as we have A/C during summer hot days.

You would expect that for these prices they could afford to update/

The shuttle, that we were so dependant on was far from acceptable... it would only take you to Disney until 1145.... and would not return you prior to that or drop you off past that time.. absolutely not acceptable. This hotel needs a serious update..... it is so far away from disney.... it is beside Knox Berry... do yourself the favour and stay on strip and pay the same... at least you will be within walking

We had a room on the next floor which was better even if we could still hear the digging. The room was ok for two days and clean but would not stay again. Breakfast was awful . Did not use the pool as busy out with friends.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel and the staff were great!

They are also happy to help organise theme park tickets.  There is a useful, well-stocked shop in reception and the pool area was very clean.   Overall we had a very relaxing stay. I would recommend the hotel as the staff really care about customer service, and are happy to go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable.
Manager Response: Hi holidayhappyy:  We were delighted to read about your enjoyable stay with us recently!  It was terrific to read about how helpful Anthony was, our clean pool area and quiet location.

This hotel offers a free shuttle service to

Manager Response: Hi Michael:  Please accept our apologies for the disappointing stay in our hotel recently.  It's unfortunate that you had issues with Housekeeping, room service and key trouble.

Summary Heading: Great suite, low price - completely unexpected value
Summary: Stayed here after New Year's this past year, and booked through Hotwire at around $50-$60 a night, if memory serves. The hotel is of modern style, though the elevators and some furniture could use updating.  The couch in our room was old and worn, though that is not to say it was dirty or anything like that - the rooms were clean, the appliances and fixtures modern, and the beds comfortable.  You couldn't beat the location, a mere walk away from Knott's Berry Farm, and with a wonderful Indian cuisine restaurant next door - Amaya - which was converted from the old Ripley's Believe It or Not museum.   Staff was friendly, and the location felt very clean and safe. Only
Manager Response: Hi Rafael:  Thank you for your feedback here on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed our location and comfortable beds, along with the cuisine at Amaya next door.

Summary: The hotel is in a really good condition, the suites is so huge witha separated living room and bed room. There are two flat screen TV, one in the living room and the other in the bed room. They have every thing you need microwave, refrigurator, hair dryer and a good sofa. The WIFI signal is very strong and stable through out the area. Speaking about a view in here, it is very nice indeed with the out door pool at the center of the hotel. The location is excellent, so close to shoping center, just 5-10 minute drive. This place just made you feel at home.
Manager Response: Hello Suchet:  We appreciate your wonderful review on TripAdvisor.com!  Your comments about our in-suite amenities and ideal location are helpful to other travelers making choices about where to stay in Buena Park.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Tired Hotel in Need of TLC
Summary: My room had stained and old furniture and a potentially harmful nail sticking out on the doorway. The hotel needs new everything. It's almost across the street from Knott's Berry Farm amusement park so it caters to busloads of teens and tourists; from the lobby you can faintly hear roller coaster riders screaming so a street-side room might be a little noisy. However, the bed was very comfortable and the staff genuinely helpful.
Manager Response: Hi ChicoPair:  We're glad you enjoyed the beds in our hotel but regret the noise issues you experienced from Knott's Berry Farm.  Your feedback about the condition of the suite is appreciated as well.

Summary Heading: If you need Wifi stay somewhere else!
Summary: We stayed 7 days and could get internet in our room once. Rooms were large and accommodated five people comfortably. Pool was a good size. Staff was pleasant and their text program for getting additional things like extra towels worked great. If you don't care about Internet and have a large family I would recommend
Manager Response: Hi Christina:  We're sorry you had problems with the WiFi during your recent stay with us.  Please know that we are looking into long term solutions for this issue and hope to have it resolved very soon.

Summary Heading: Great for family trip to knotts and beach
Summary: Our third year coming to stay at radisson while we go to Knotts and the beaches.  Staff is always friendly and eager to make us feel welcome.  Breakfast included with rate is decent,  but tacky with foam plays and plastic ware.  Would expect metal and ceramic for 200 plus a night.  Pool was heated this time,  which made it nice.
Manager Response: Hello Josephf404:  Thank you for once again choosing our hotel for your family vacation.  We're pleased you found our staff to be friendly and hospitable but regret your impressions about the breakfast service.

Summary: Average   Big change not  for the better from old Radisson group.  Not sure if under new ownership, but you have a lot of work to-do to get back where I can feel comfortable about staying or recommending your hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Rudolph:  Please know that we have an extensive renovation planned for later this year that should ensure that you return to our hotel!

Summary: Mold on bathroom shower wall. My child had an asthma attack due to the mold. The breakfast lacked quality and variety. Bath towels were not avaliable. Received small thin pool towels instead. Hotel operates at less then 50% capacity, but still does not allow early check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out and writing your review.  We appreciate your patronage and apologize for the dissatisfaction of your stay, in regards to the overall cleanliness of your room and quality of the breakfast offerings.  We will review the conditions of your room to make sure all rooms are up to standards.  Your feedback is very beneficial and will help us facilitate all necessary hotel improvements to ensure a positive guest experience.

Summary Heading: Stayed for Universal Studios Harry Potter World
Summary: This place was amazing. It's a bit older and looks like they are working on making it better, and the road work outside was a mess, but overall a fabulous place. I requested double beds, I got double beds. Elevators all over, pool got a bit crowded from a group of teenagers, but the pool was heated and warm even at night and man was the hot tub awesome! Big hotel room for the small price tag. Close to everything around! We went to the beach one day and took about a half hour to get there. The food was great and available late. The staff was very laid back and respectful. Had on site laundry. Tvs service a bit sketchy but had HBO so if I had stayed Sunday night I knew exactly where I'd be for game of thrones! Air conditioners need to be turned down a bunch or you'd get hot all
Manager Response: Hi elizabethabbyh:  Thank you so much for the great review on TripAdvisor!  We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we're sorry about the road construction out front.

Summary Heading: A great value close to Orange County Fun
Summary: This was the perfect stay for our family of 5.  Lots of room in the hotel, and having a door to shut between the living and sleeping areas was great!  The hotel lobby and courtyard were so beautiful, I felt like I was traveling internationally! It was so conveniently located to everything we needed (restaurants, food, the freeways), and across the street from Knott's (we watched their fireworks from our bedroom window). While it wasn't a luxury hotel, it was perfect for our family vacation.  The staff was so helpful and nice, the breakfast was fun for the kids, free parking, even a free shuttle to DL! We'll definitely stay here next time we're in the area.
Manager Response: Hi David:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and your family was satisfied.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Property with easy access to a lot of CA attractions!!
Summary: This property is very nice and has great courtyard/pool.  The rooms are good size with fridge, sink etc.  The service is not stellar by any means for the Radisson name.  But the people are nice and you cannot beat this location if you are going to Knotts/Disneyland/Movieland Wax Museum etc.  Shuttle is not always up and running so check that out before you book.  Overall my recent stay was good!
Manager Response: Hello Bobbie:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will return soon!

Summary: Definitely not the worst I've stayed in. At least staff was friendly and the location was convenient. Housekeeping forgot to replenish linens, left us with one towel.... Restaurant charges ridiculous amount for "continental" type breakfast buffet when an IHOP is within walking distance. Walls and floors are thin so you can hear every step and sound. Pool and jacuzzi were nasty. I did like the feel of being in the tropics though, landscaping was nice...if only that would have helped the kids above us from stomping around till 1240 am. Furniture in lobby and rooms were worn, and stained. Definitely could use a mini facelift! All things considered, it wasn't a terrible stay.
Manager Response: Hi Laura:  Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your recent stay in our hotel.  We're sorry the pool and spa did not exceed your expectations, and that you had noisy neighbors.

Summary: Spent 3 nights at the Radisson Buena Park over the memorial day weekend. In town visiting with family. Rooms were cleaned each day and the hotel room towels looked like they were brand new every day. None of those towels you sometimes see at hotels where the light can shine through them. Beds were solid in our room and did not leave our backs hurting in the morning. Each room has a seperate living room area with sofabed also. We were given breakfast free with our room which was evidently a special happenning right now. Decor in the room was not too dated. Only concerns were that the carpets in the room could be cleaned and seems that some of the electrical repair work in the room (on the lamp and one of the plugs) could have been done with a little more care.  The free breakfast
Manager Response: Hello Brian:  We enjoyed reading your review on TripAdvisor.  Please accept our apologies for the condition of the carpet in your suite, along with the electrical problems.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay otherwise.

Summary: Towels were scarce and sleeper sofas need to be replaced. Pool is nice though. And the front desk was helpful. It's a good value for larger parties and the rooms have a living room type area which is much better then just a room with two beds.
Manager Response: Hi Heather:  We're sorry about the towel situation but glad you enjoyed the pool and front desk staff.

Summary: This is excellent value for the money. For a family going to Knots Bury Farm this is a nice place to stay, location, nice breakfast and spacious rooms. I was on business, rooms are quite, no street noise, I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Hi Judy:  We're glad you were so pleased with your recent stay in our hotel...please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: This hotel is our favorite of all we have stayed at and the staff is very helpful and the bus drivers recognize us from previous visit. love this place and would recommend it to all visitors to california
Manager Response: Hello Tammy:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor review!  It was great to read about how happy you were with our staff members!

Summary: Carpets and curtains are stained.  The furniture is beyond able to be cleaned and needs to be replaced.  In need of some tlc for sure.  The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable though.  Great area with some great restaurants nearby
Manager Response: Hello TamiUT:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback.  It's unfortunate that you had carpet ad furniture issues but appreciate your kind words about our staff.

Summary: My family stayed here for a night, had 2 suites and were very happy from the moment we checked in.  We were accommodated in every request from beginning from the beginning of our stay all the way to check out.  Their grounds are very nice, neat and very clean, family friendly, very well kept.  All staff were constantly cleaning something or helping someone.  The restaurant was great and also accommodated any requests we had.  Not one bad apple in the bunch here as all employees walked around with a smile ready to help in any way they could.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Tyler:  5 stars is a terrific endorsement for our hotel!  We appreciate your comments about our friendly, helpful staff and your overall experience.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: The rooms are clean but the carpet is old and needs to be replaced.The drawers in the room kept sliding out and I had to keep pushing them back in. What I didn't like  is when I went to breakfast (included in the price of the hotel bilI)  waiter/host brought a bill that was not mine and  never came back to apologize. It's not bad but it needs a little TLC on the outside as well......
Manager Response: Hello Lisa:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're sorry about the carpet issue and breakfast bill mixup.

Summary: One of the best hotels in our trip. Location was great, very clean hotel and room, receptionist was awesome, you can park your car very close to your room. And finally good wifi! All our hotels had free wifi but it worked only 3 or 4 places.   And the room was very big!
Manager Response: Hi Jezetus:  We're glad you enjoyed our spacious suites and had good Housekeeping service.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: This is a very busy hotel with lots of kids and groups coming and going to and from the hotel. The staff appears to be overworked and not very concerned about what is taking place. Beds are firm and the rooms need to be updated, very old looking.
Manager Response: Hello Javier:  We're sorry you had shuttle trouble during your recent stay with us.  It was unfortunate that your beds weren't comfortable as well.

Summary: My family stayed here for our Disneyland trip. Maybe it's first impressions but not happy with this place. We got to the hotel around 8am and had scheduled a shuttle to the park for 830. Only to find out the driver doesn't even  work till 930. Talk about added stress. Luckily we had other family who could pick us up. When returned to check in later that night it was a hassle. Their machine wasn't working to issue us keys. We never got keys and had to have security open the doors for us. The room  however was decent. We had a suite. Very spacious. The shower drain was clogged, but other than that seemed clean. Air conditioning worked great. The breakfast was fine. Scrambled eggs, Pancakes, Toast,  Muffins, hashbrowns, and lots of juices and coffee. The breakfast staff was very
Manager Response: Hi Katarina:  We're sorry for the shuttle and lock problems you recently experienced in our hotel.  Thank you for your kind words about breakfast and our morning staff, along with our ideal location.

Summary: Shuttle to Disneyland was nice. Staff friendly. Comfortable beds.  Sign in window that there are new owners. They do not do the shuttle to Knotts as advertised and sounds like they're going to stop free breakfast - (didn't make it common knowledge that you could order an omelet), but at check in, was informed that we were lucky, that in May they were offering all guests free breakfast. Chose this over Embassy Suites because of shuttle to both DL & Knotts. Won't make that mistake again.
Manager Response: Hi Q769DSmaryc:  We're sorry you were disappointed with our hotel during your recent stay with us.

Summary: My dad and I camr in to visit family for 9 days.  This site was perfect for a long stay as the suite provided a great deal of room, a fridge, sink and a coffee maker. The pool and hot tub were clean and wonderful for my dad.  Internet service was great for me to keep in touch w/My family at home, as well as for work purposes.
Manager Response: Hello 46rickih:  We're so glad you enjoyed your recently lengthy stay with us!    Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights as part of our two week California vacation. The hotel is great for families as the bedrooms have a separate living room area with a TV and mini kitchenette. If you want to put the kids to bed and watch a movie you can!  When you are getting ready the kids will have an area to hang out and not be in your way. The hotel is next to Medieval Times and across the street from the Hollywood Wax Museum and KISS's new restaurant Rock and Brews. Knott's Berry Farm is less than 2 miles away and Disneyland is less than 10. The hotel has a nice courtyard area in the center of it with a fountain, trees, swimming pool and hot tub. An onsite restaurant is available, which looked great however there are SO many food options in the area we did not try it. The lobby
Manager Response: Hello Jennyjack:  Thank you so much for the great review on TripAdvisor and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Find somewhere else! Needs a complete overhaul!
Summary: I made this reservation with Club Carlson points. I was a bit concerned since the reviews were all over the board but I figured free was a good price. Well free wasn't good enough.   I had the sinking feeling we were not going to want to stay as we walked to our room. Things were dirty and in disrepair. The room was no better, lumpy comforters with stains on them. Curtains torn, stains on the furniture. I don't know if some rooms are better than others but I wouldn't take the risk. Luckily it wasn't late at night with no where to go. Thank you Hotwire for getting us out of there!
Manager Response: Hello Carol:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry you were disappointed with your recent stay with us.  Your comments about the Housekeeping issues are appreciated so we can resolve them.  Please know that we are in the process of planning an extensive renovation of our hotel very soon.

Summary: We had a terrible experience beginning with a smelly room.  Then there were not enough towels including face and hand towels. The room phone did not work when trying to call the front desk or housekeeping for help; we were forced to use our cell phones!
Manager Response: Hi Susie:  We're sorry you didn't have an enjoyable stay recently in our hotel.  Thank you for you letting us know about the room phone problems, linen issues and odor problems.

Summary Heading: Not what I  expected from Radisson
Summary: The room was not cleaned / vacuumed properly. There was no room service available during the time of my stay. Some fitness equipment was out of  order, when I mentioned it to the staff , they were already aware but there was no sign on the equipment. Using your room card to unlock the door took multiple attempts.
Manager Response: Hi Loni:  We were sorry to read about your lock troubles, Housekeeping issues and lack of room service.  Thank you for passing on the information about the fitness center-we will repair any non-working equipment.

Summary: I loved the grounds of this hotel with all of the beautiful plants it made it very cozy.  I was very impressed with all of the staff the front desk, housekeeping and shuttle drivers were all very friendly and efficient.  I would absolutely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Hello lv42day:  We're so pleased you enjoyed the landscaping in our hotel and appreciate the kind words about our staff members.

Summary: Nice enough and clean enough; rooms are a bit dated. Reserved 3 rooms but only 1 was ready at 3pm. Check in was further inconvenienced by one room's card reader having been replaced (or altered) and only one person at the front desk seemed to know about it. Took 3 tries to get a card that worked. Same room had a phone that didn't work. Second floor vending machines accept coins/cash but one wouldn't accept cash and the other one wouldn't work at all. I gave up on complaining after the card reader trouble- too tired to care anymore. On the bright side, the beds are very comfortable and the staff are friendly and courteous. Rooms were worth the price we got.
Manager Response: Hello 101Wanderer:  We're sorry your check in was delayed and there were technical problems with the keys and phones.  Thank you for pointing out that our hotel is a great value for the rates we charge.

Summary: They have the most wonderful staff. Always accommodating and helpful. Breakfast is just great. Clean rooms, they are suites! For the price, you cannot do better, even if you are staying at the Knot's Berry Hotel. This place is way better because I been there and done both. I have stayed at this Radisson 5 years in a row at about the same time with 2 night stays. It's great.
Manager Response: Hi Michael:  We're thankful you chose our hotel for your stay in the area and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Experience - Business and Family Trip
Summary: Pros: Check in was seamless and clerk helpful. Family enjoyed the pool and hot tub (although it could've been a little warmer - but that's how I like my hot tubs).  We were in close proximity to eating places and were able to walk to them. I was close to my convention AND Disneyland. The price was right. The separate bedroom and front room with fridge and microwave were great. Kids could watch their own TV in front room.  Cons: We went to Disneyland until 1 am and when we returned, the room had been cleaned and old towels taken, but no new towels were left. Being 1 am I didn't call hotel staff, and I had to use the hand towels to dry off early in the morning before my convention meetings so as not to wake my sleeping family.  The pillows are not that soft and I woke with a neck
Manager Response: Hello N7650VJkimberlyb:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're sorry you had problems with towel delivery during Housekeeping service but we're happy you found our location to be ideal!

Summary: The hotel is very nice. However, if you are not a fan of driving for a long time, then it's not ideal. Personally I didn't mind, so location was not a problem. But it did often take 1.5 hours to get to LA due to many many traffick accidents and bad traffic in general.
Manager Response: Hi Julie:  We're sorry you had so much driving in Southern California during your recent stay with us!

Summary: The property as a whole is beautiful and the rooms are very nice. The staff is friendly as well.  The room service should be open past 9pm since the surrounding eateries were closed.  The breakfast was terrible! I could let it slide if it were free, but to charge $12 for adults and $7 for children for stale, cold Eggo waffles, rubbery eggs, cheap sausages and bacon, tough potatoes, bland frozen pancakes, and watered down juices was ridiculous! For that price, one could have walked 3 minutes to Ihop and gotten a full, enjoyable breakfast. When I last stayed at this location it was under the Embassy Suites and the breakfast was amazing! Full breakfast omelet and pancake bar with a chef on site, and the breakfast was included in the cost of the room! Please change back!  Anthony
Manager Response: Hello mylove829:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and were treated well by staff.  Please accept our apologies for the breakfast that did not meet your expectations.

Summary: Your hotel will do down as the most friendly hotel we have ever stayed with.  Loved the location and the rooms nice and very spacious.  The internet was speedy and easy to access.  The hotel seemed very safe and the pool and spa were great.
Manager Response: Hi Diane:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor review!  It's great to have guests who rock like you!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our family always enjoys staying at this hotel whenever we're in Orange County.  It's a great central location in close proximity to theme parks and other family friendly entertainment.  The staff is always polite and the beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Rebecca:  Thank you for choosing our hotel when you are in Orange County.  We're glad your family enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: The worst experience ever in a hotel Room was very outdated and smelly Leaky AC vents, uneven carpet, dirty & bloody sheets, broken hardware, defective TV, cheap furniture. Wouldn't stay here for free. No maintenance done outside, multiple fallen palm tree branches blocking walkways. Extremely noisy neighbors all around at anytime. The view outside our window was 6 large charter buses parked and idling at the early hours of the morning. Car Club meets also outside our window revving motors and honking horns around 1am - 4am. Never coming back PERIOD. Not ever for free.
Manager Response: Hello Jordan:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you recently experienced in our hotel.  It's unfortunate you had noisy neighbors and Housekeeping issues.

Summary: Arrived late and left early. No food or sleep. Disappointed trip. Staff had nothing to offer for breakfast. Left at 5:45 hungry. Bottom floor by pool and noisy. This was our favorite place. Things have changed.
Manager Response: Hi tashajacquemoud:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're sorry our restaurant didn't open until 630am during your recent stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great family friendly hotel near knotts berry farm
Summary: Clean large rooms! Great location. Great for amusement prk visits, ample parking quiet rooms. I will definately stay here again when in the area! Staff were great and all needs were quickly addressed. Not the Ritz but who needs that anyways :) best Radisson I have stayed at in the US
Manager Response: Hi Tony834:  Thank you for the 5 stars on TripAdvisor!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was a very disappointing stay. I was surprised because every other Radisson has been a positive experience for me. The service here was average to above average, however the rooms were absolutely horrid. The carpets were very dirty and even appeared to contain mildew in certain areas. This in-turn caused a mildew smell in the room. There was water damage all over the place. It felt as though we were going to fall through the floor at times. I requested a room change, however my second room was hardly better than the first. I will never be staying at this Radisson location again, and I will not recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Hello Joshua:  We're sorry about your impressions of our hotel and the disappointment you experienced.  Your comments are appreciated in an effort to eliminate issues such as unclean carpets and water damage.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay except the sofa beds.
Summary: This hotel was a wonderful place to stay with great room features. The only downside was that their sofa beds are virtually unusable, so if you are booking this room planning on using that as a bed space for your family needs, I'd go elsewhere. My daughter wanted to sleep on the hard floor instead of the sofa bed, it was that bad. When asking the front desk staff for extra padding (which they don't have), they admitted that EVERYONE complains about that. Other than this, the rooms are nice and the living space and kitchen areas are great. We used the pool and hot tub as well which were nice.
Manager Response: Hello Michelle:  We enjoyed reading your TripAdvisor feedback.  Thank you for letting us know that you enjoyed your stay in our large suites, and we're sorry you had trouble with the sofabeds.

Summary: The location is great for doing family fun parks.  Knotts Berry Farm is directly across the street and Disney is 20 minutes away. There are also multiple restaurants at your fingertips and movie theatre is also minutes away. If the beach is calling, an easy half hour drive to Huntington Beach.   As for the hotel itself, the rooms are spacious mini suites with fridge & microwave.  They have a separate living/dining area and are clean and very comfortable. Public areas are also clean and maintained. Great location for family fun.
Manager Response: Hi warrenandlinda:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location convenient, along with being pleased with our facilities.

Summary: Disappointment and regrets over  booking 15 rooms for our son's wedding. The church ceremony was near by that's what made this hotel a good place to get together. Unfortunately the rooms were not made available to us.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write your review. We apologize for the situation with reservations.  Our goal is to not only meet the needs of each and every guest we serve, but to exceed your expectations to make your stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible.  We are currently taking the steps necessary to improve the quality of our services.

Summary: Plenty of entertainment options nearby. Highway is also close to the hotel. Nice pool area and lobby. Parking was not a problem and surrounding area seemed safe. Good option to enjoy with your family or alone.
Manager Response: Hi thomasgal82:  We are delighted you enjoyed your recent stay with us and found our location to be ideal.  Please come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: This place was dirty, expensive, heard rats in the ceiling at night. Gross all the way around. The phones in the room didn't work. You had to text the hotel if you had a question or needed something. Only 1 ice machine was working.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out and writing your review.  We appreciate your patronage and apologize for the dissatisfaction of your stay, in regards to the overall cleanliness and condition of your room and the hotel.  We will review the conditions of your room to make sure all guest rooms are up to standards.  Your feedback is very beneficial and will help us facilitate all necessary hotel improvements to ensure a positive guest experience.

Summary: We stayed here to go to Knott's Berry Farm.  Overall the room was great.  Mattress's were hard and sofa bed mattress was very uncomfortable with springs poking through.  The shutters in the from of the room gave a bungalow feel to the room.
Manager Response: Hello D7340UQanthonym:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We are sorry for the mattress trouble you experienced but glad you enjoyed your stay otherwise.

Summary Heading: Family of 6 stayed in a Suite
Summary: Our 3 Grand kids ages 5,11,12 were treated with the Up-most warm Hospitality that I wasn't expecting !! The Staff was very Sincere & Attentive to all of their Questions.They truly enjoyed our 3 night stay here and loved this Hotel. Very conveniently located to all the attractions & very Spacious and Comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Hello E3640VGdianeb:  Our staff is happy that your grandkids had a great time here!  We appreciate your kind remarks about our employees and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good central place to stay for Disneyland parks
Summary: Just checked out of the Raddisson suites after spending two weeks here.  It is brilliant as you have more than just a hotel room, to have extra space was fab, I would definitely recommend to family and friends as an excellent base.  You have excellent daily room service and a lovely swimming pool.  You also have lots of places in walking distance, including a cinema, places to eat, a Walmart and Target as well as being only 10 minutes drive from Disneyland.  I also liked that the Radisson has a complimentary shuttle to Disneyland so if you don't want to drive, this is perfect.  Thanks to all housekeeping and reception staff for making our stay so pleasant, always had a friendly smile for us, a hello and some made us feel like we had known them for years.  Thanks, definitely
Manager Response: Hi Teri-Jane H:  We're glad you were able to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle and found our location to be convenient.  It was great to read your kind remarks about our staff members too!

Summary: We have stayed here 3 times but it's gone terribly down hill. Our room was disgustingly dirty. They had electrical issues so the lights flickered all night long. The phone didn't work. The pull out mattress was unmade and had a huge soaked through blood stain on it. The elevator had garbage on the floor. It was truly a pig pen resort.
Manager Response: Hi 28chelsym:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We apologize for the Housekeeping and Maintenance issues you experienced during your recent stay with us.

Summary: We stayed here using points so limited expectations.  The good - parking was free and available and shaded in parts. The pool and hot tub were both of sufficient size and temperature. The room a good size.  The average - service left a bit to be desired, not really what was expected. The breakfast was adequate but plastic cutlery - really?  Overall we were reasonably satisfied and would probably use again.
Manager Response: Hello robertgproctor:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and noted our free parking and pool area.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Room was nice just a stain on chair and puddle of water on the carpet, but it might of been because of the pool. Overall quiet and comfortable stay. Pool is very nice and atmosphere around is great a lot of green.
Manager Response: Hello joashl2016:  We're so glad you enjoyed our pool area and suites!

Summary Heading: Spacious Rooms within walking distance to Knotts
Summary: Enjoyed our stay at the Radisson Buena Park this past weekend.  Its a very nice hotel that you can easily walk with children to Knott's, Medieval Times, or the Pirate Show.  Parking is free with plenty of spaces.  Also a great place with bigger families because the rooms are suites so there are beds for up to 6.
Manager Response: Hi John:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad you enjoyed our spacious suites and ideal location.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Beddings were dirty.  They cleaned the room but the sheets were replaced with a dirty/oily stain sheets. Sofa bed should be replaced with newer ones. It was really dirty. The bed was really uncomfortable. Faucets are hard to control the water flow. No complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello 320joanp:  We're sorry you had Housekeeping and plumbing issues during your recent stay with us.  It's unfortunate that you did not enjoy your stay.

Summary: The suite room is very big and closely to KNOTT BERRY FARM . The price is very excellent too. I would give this hotel 5 stars, but customers service  are bad at communicating to the guests when handling power outage went completely blackout at night time. No security at night, no backup power to turn on the hotel lights, and no giving any credit back to the guest while the hotel At false in an emergency blackout for power outage building.
Manager Response: Hello Dennisvietle:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry you were affected by the power outage that was not caused by the hotel.  We appreciate your understanding in this matter.

Summary: The Radisson Suites at Buena Park is Beautiful property, great location, with an awesome staff! Very clean and comfortable. Me and my kids loved it. Everything from the pool and hot tub, to the workout and restaurant. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hello W4940AEmichaela:  Thank you so much for your review on TripAdvisor!  It was terrific to read about how much you enjoyed your stay, including our pool area and friendly staff!

Summary Heading: Great suites at a great value
Summary: Rooms are great, spacious, clean and organized. Close to many of the visitor areas and parks. Located in a  very nice quiet and safe neighborghood, made me forget for a minute that i was in Los Angeles
Manager Response: Hi robertjnochez:  Thank you so much for your TripAdvisor review and we are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: Don't stay here.  You will regret it.  Walls and ceilings so thin you think the people next to you are in the same room.  Room smelled.  Showerhead horrible. When I called the front desk I was left on hold indefinitely.
Manager Response: Hello Tanja:  We're sorry you had noisy neighbors and plumbing issues during your recent stay with us.

Summary Heading: hotel recommendation: book your room through hotel
Summary: When I booked the hotel I made sure that I picked the choice "two full beds". However when I arrived at the hotel I was told that the only room left had a king size bed plus a pull-out sofa. The sofa was so uncomfortable that I stayed awake until the morning. The person at the front desk explained the situation as follows: "This is what happens when one books through a third party such as hotels.com. Had you booked the room directly from the hotel this would not have happened."
Manager Response: Hi Turgay:  We're sorry you had bedding problems during your recent stay with us.    Please be assured that we are attempting to resolve this type of issue from happening in the future.

Summary: Hotel is in need of a major facelift. Room carpeting stretched and worn, ceiling plaster coming loose, grounds very unkept.  Loud party in the courtyard until 1100pm on Friday impacting all hotel guests...lots of families with young children inconvenienced.
Manager Response: Hi Sallie:  We're sorry you were disturbed during your recent visit with us!

Summary: It's not worth what they charge. Rooms are dirty, mold in bathroom, water damage visible on wall and carpet. Room service took forever, food was not warm, and not worth the money paid for. They had a church band playing music in the event room which is right between all rooms until 10pm. You could not only hear the music you could feel it.
Manager Response: Hi phillipm971:  Please accept our apologies for the Housekeeping issues, along with room service and noise problems.

Summary: Tried to stay close to Disneyland. This was the only place that was available. U get what u paid for. Broken door blinds and broken handle in bath. Room is a little muggie. Elevator would work when it wanted to... it was an OK stay.
Manager Response: Hi Araceli:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor review.  Your feedback is valuable for us to make improvements to our facility-namely blinds repair, elevator service and bath plumbing.

Summary: I have to say my experience at the RADDISON has been a good experience and I will recommend it to friends and family as a matter of fact I have recommend it to friends and family and they told me their experience at the hotel was a good experience as well I am very pleased with this hotel and its employees once again thanks everyone for their care and good hospitality I appreciate everyone at the RADDISON
Manager Response: Hi Gerardo:  Thank you so much for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and appreciate you recommending us to other friends and family.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Good location but not a great hotel.
Summary: 10 minutes from Disney and a short drive to shops and restaurants. However the room cleanliness was not great and we could hear the footsteps if the people above us. Room was spacious but drab. WiFi reception was very poor.
Manager Response: Hi Tipptrader:  We're sorry we didn't exceed your expectations during your recent stay with us.  Your comments about Housekeeping, noise and the WiFi reception are appreciated-we are sorry for the inconvenience experienced.

Summary: The overall experience was great.  Large rooms.  Nice heated pool and spa.  Front desk staff, Anthony, was great.  We spent several days at Disney and used the shuttle.  Wonderful.  Rooms are a little dated and housekeeping was just okay.  Walls and ceiling are thin, so you can hear everything.  Would stay here again though.  Great location.
Manager Response: Hello Michael S C:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed our large rooms and pool area.  We will pass on your kind remarks about Anthony and appreciate your comments about the walls and housekeeping service/

Summary: Excellent price for the room. Would have preferred queen beds instead of double beds. Skipped breakfast after the first morning. Overall the room was nice for our vacation, spent minimal time in the room.
Manager Response: Hi John F. G:  It was great to read about your enjoyable stay in our hotel!  We hope you can visit us again very soon.

Summary: Great Appearance and exceptional staff. Walking distance to knotts and several eating places. 20 minutes to Disney. Just a few minutes to some shopping. 1 Minute from the interstate. Felt like a nice safe area.
Manager Response: Hello Josh402:  We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback!  It sounds like you enjoyed our location and friendly staff, along with feeling safe.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: This has been one of the favorite hotels of my friends and mine. Every time we come to California we stay here because the service is excellent and the hotel is wonderful.  We love it a lot and will continue to stay here as long as we make this road trip.
Manager Response: Hi Marc L:  We're so glad you enjoyed your road trip and stay in our hotel.  Your loyalty is very much appreciated along with your kind remarks about our staff.

Summary: Carpet and couches in room look 20 years old and not clean.  Bathroom was clean but very out of date.  Luckily the beds looked fresh.  Restaurant was ok for buffet breakfast but didn't make me really excited to eat there for any meal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We regret to hear of your dissatisfaction with your room.  Your feedback about your room as well as the breakfast buffet will be shared with our housekeeping and restaurant staff to ensure all guest rooms and breakfast are up to Radisson Hotels standards.

Summary: We would stay here again in a heart beat.  Thanks for making it such a pleasant experience from start to finish.  Compared to the previous night stay at a local theme park hotel, this was outstanding.  We were actually able to sleep comfortably in a clean, inviting suite, so we stayed an extra day!
Manager Response: Hi Tina R:  We appreciate your kind remarks and hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Great location and staff, terrible furnishings
Summary: The location was great for us, walking distance to Knotts. The staff were very nice, and the beds, while small, were comfortable. Having a two room suite was also nice.  The carpet, furnishings and $12/person breakfast was all TERRIBLE. You pick this place for the location.
Manager Response: Hello meyerca:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're glad you found our location desirable and sorry that you had trouble with the carpet, furnishings and breakfast.

Summary: Excellent hotel with amazing view and friendly service, stay away from the breakfast though, it's decent but not worth the $12 per person. The parking is expansive and the pool is clean. Very much enjoyed the scenery.
Manager Response: Hi jettd2016:  We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor and are glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  It's great to read that you were pleased with the parking and our pool too.

Summary: We booked a one night stay on our way from AZ to Long Beach for a cruise. The staff was very friendly and helpful, and brought a crib for our baby right away. The rooms are beautiful suites with a living room and bedroom, and great value for the money. It's located right next to Medieval Times. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hi c_amanda_leigh:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us, particularly our spacious suites and helpful staff.  We hope you enjoyed your cruise!

Summary Heading: Good stay for a great price
Summary: We were here for one night in Feb. We arrived later in the evening and left for a cruise the next morning so we were not here long. However, we were pleasantly surprised for the price we paid.  This is definitely an older place that could use some maintenance. You could see some old stains on the carpet and the tub had a leak, but our linens were clean and the bed was comfortable. I also liked the Spanish details in the courtyard and room. The french doors to the room were nice, though my husband didn't care for them just for security purposes. They locked and it's not like you could push them open, but those type of doors are not the most secure.  The minimal interaction we had with the staff was good. They were friendly and helpful.   We have a favorite hotel to stay at when
Manager Response: Hello Mikayla73:  Thank you for staying with us before your cruise out of Long Beach.  We appreciate your kind words about our hotel and the suggestions you made/  Please come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Buena Park Radisson Hotel for 2 nights. Our Hotel room looked pretty old, but it was clean and in good shape. We could hear the guests from the hotel room from above walking around and the other guests were pretty noise (a High school Basketball Team stayed there as well, we couldnt sleep at night) The breakfast was great. Overall it was a nice stay and we would come back.
Manager Response: Hi Roman P:  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us, aside from the noise issue you encountered.  Thanks for sharing that you had a good breakfast with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Perfect location for Pirate's Dinner Adventure! We walked and it was nice. Hotel upper floors are like rainforest...very pretty with foliage. Room service was nice...guacamole and chips were excellent.
Manager Response: Hello terrycX5450YS:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're glad you enjoyed our ideal location and our restaurant!
