Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Radisson Buena Park from March 8 - 10, 2016 and I can say that it was a complete waste of the $300 I was charged for the 2 nights that we spent there.  After checking in we were given our room keys and when we entered the room, we found that the sink was torn apart, tools and plumbing supplies were strewn about, as if the repair person just got up and left the job. We spoke to the front desk and they were very helpful and apologetic and we were given a new room - but it didn't help.  Later when we were getting ready for bed, we discovered some weird brown stains on the sheets. So once again we went down to the front desk and showed them the sheet - again they were apologetic and courteous but very slow. They said that housekeeping would bring up
Manager Response: Hi dp801435:  On behalf of the entire staff, we're sorry you had an unpleasant stay with us recently.  We have reviewed your comments with our Maintenance and Housekeeping teams to ensure that the types of inconveniences you encountered are the exception rather than the rule.

Summary: We stayed in the suite with 2 double beds which was perfect for my family of 5. The sofa bed isn't very comfy. The room was very clean but it is time for some new carpet. Walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm and Medieval Times is right next door. Rock and Brews across the street is awesome. Great hotel for the price we paid, will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello 633jenniferu:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us aside from the sofabed and carpet issues.  It's great you were able to have a good time at Rock & Brews across the street from us.

Summary Heading: Great stay for the price. Id come here again
Summary: Love this place. It's a great stay for the price and you get your money's worth. Rooms are nice and having a living room area was a big bonus. Outside of the room service issue. I enjoyed my stay very much.
Manager Response: Hello andremN1609TK:  We're sorry you had a room service issue but glad you enjoyed your stay otherwise.

Summary: This Buena Park Radisson was a pleasure to stay in. The room was clean, the bathroom was fine, the shower stayed warm, the microwave worked well, the fridge was excellent, the place was fairly quiet. There were some repairs that were done that were a little odd, but didn't dectract from overall experience or use. The Hotel's courtyard layout shuts out the noise from the street and enhances the security of the stay. The landscaping was nice. The pool was a little cold, but it was the last bit of February so that wasn't a really big deal. I have stayed here before and can say that the quality has stayed the same.
Manager Response: Hi Matthew M:  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We're so glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us and were able to use our pool area even though it was a bit cold for your liking.  It's great that you felt the setting was quiet and we hope you could truly relax!

Summary: Literally walking distance from Knott's Berry farm. Nice restaurants and cafes also 1-2 blocks away. Overall we were very pleased with the facilities. The pool area is very nice and looks like a lot of fun for the kids. Friendly staff at the lobby, which was ample and welcoming. We'd definitively come back.
Manager Response: Hello CarlosVent:  We appreciate your kind remarks on TripAdvisor.  It was terrific to read that you enjoyed the pool and that our staff was friendly.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: The rooms are very spacious, always clean and quiet. We've stayed here numerous times and have been pleased every time. The beds are comfortable. You do have to look past the sofa...each one I've experienced is not very comfortable and looks haggard. Other than that no complaints...very happy with this hotel
Manager Response: Hi Victoria R:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed our spacious suites and had a great experience.  Your comment about the sofa is appreciated too-we are working on that situation and hope to have a solution soon.

Summary: The accommodations were wonderful. There was plenty of room. Like a mini apartment. Close to everything. The staff was awesome! The grounds were pretty and private. The food was great. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Tim D:  Thank you so much for the TripAdvisor review!  We're so glad you enjoyed having plenty of room in the hotel.  It's great to read about how our staff treated you along with being satisfied with our food offerings.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was my daughters first to Disneyland and the location of the hotel made our experience even better, Knottsberry farm is across the street, medieval times is next door and the beach was only about 20 min away. Overall  served us perfectly! We were very happy and we will probably stay here again if the resort is still out of bugget.
Manager Response: Hello 947juant:  Thank you for your recent review on TripAdvisor!  We're so glad your daughter's first trip to Disney was memorable and we are proud we could be a part of it.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: This hotel was FILTHY and we were terribly disappointed. Dirty carpets, stained and saggy furniture, leaky faucets, sticky surfaces, etc. Laundry facilities were unusable. Would not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Carl86ll:  Please accept our apologies for your disappointing stay with us.  We will address the carpet, furniture and plumbing issues you raised.  Thank you for letting us know about these items.

Summary: just a quick overnight stay but the hotel staff was friendly and efficient at check in.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Came to Buena Park for a cheer competition but the designated team hotel didn't have two room suites.  This hotel was recommended by team hotel staff.  We were completely satisfied and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Dina:  We're so glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  It was great to read that your room was clean and our staff was friendly.  We hope the cheer competition was successful!

Summary Heading: Hacienda hotel with a tropical garden and pool which compensates for the bit worn suites, free parking and Wifi
Summary: not much to add to other reviews - we enjoyed the tropical garden with pool and jacuzzi and the vicinity of shopping malls, restaurants and theme parks.  I am not sure anymore 100% but when I booked it I found parking fees on their own website ($10/day) but somehow they disapeared again.   Note that during weekends it can be noisy due to running around kids and drunk party people (also smoking in hallways was forbidden some guys just don't care)  Good place with excellent value (expedia special offer) - we'll come back!
Manager Response: Hi Joe1968:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your information about parking fees being on websites-we will definitely investigate that since it's free here.  We're sorry you had some noisy neighbors during your stay with us but hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great HOTEL, comfy beds, room size large, friendly staff.
Summary: Loved this hotel, whish I would have stayed there for a few more days instead of staying in a Disneyland Resort that was NOT comfy, size was small, reception was ok, parking horrible. This was an excellent hotel for the comfort and money.
Manager Response: Hello LMV209:  We're sorry you had parking problems while you were with us but ecstatic that you enjoyed your stay otherwise.  Our room size really is spacious and we try to offer great value to our guests.

Summary: Had a wonderful stay, house keeping was excellent all except for one day.  Great shuttle service to Disneyland.  Breakfast buffet was better than most hotels.  This is the second time we have stayed at this location and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Master2th:  We're glad you had a wonderful stay and thank you for leaving us some feedback.  Our shuttle service is very handy and we try to provide a variety of breakfast choices.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I chose this hotel for my honeymoon night as I got married 2/28 and needed to go away for one night before going on our honeymoon getaway.  I recommend this Hotel as its on a great location, it's near many restaurants and amusement locations.
Manager Response: Hello Maricela:  Congratulations on your recent marriage and thank you for celebrating in our hotel!  We're glad you enjoyed the location and wish you the best of luck in your new life!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for a family trip
Summary: The hotel was very nice, clean and the room was big.  The price was awesome.  The pool was clean and the room was very clean.  Close to Knott's Berry Farm we just walked there.  McDonald's is right across the street.
Manager Response: Hello Jodym829:  Thank you for using TripAdvisor to leave some feedback for us!  We're glad you found the property to be clean and our location convenient.  Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Extremely disappointed/hotel quality is no longer what it use to be
Summary: Worse hotel stay I've had. I use to stay here all the time when going to Disneyland annually but I will never stay again. The room was dirty, huge stain in living room carpet, oily substance on headboard of bed and on comforter, hair in tub and the buffet use to be included with your stay, NOT NOW. I wouldn't eat in they now anyways because it was dirty in the restaurant. This hotel use to be AWESOME but now it is horrible. Truly disappointed because I use to stay here a lot and loved it!
Manager Response: Hi Jennieb634:  It's unfortunate that we've lost you as a previous guest.    On behalf of the staff, please accept our apologies for the Housekeeping issues you encountered.  Your comments have been forwarded to Housekeeping to ensure that these types of occurrences are avoided in the future.

Summary: Room was very clean and comfortable. Close to our event. Free Wifi and no parking fee is a huge plus. Check in process was not so great as there was only 1 person working and trying to manage many things.
Manager Response: Hello Kathy:  Thank you for review on TripAdvisor!  We're sorry you had trouble at check in but otherwise enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: great place to stay on a budget
Summary: The room was nice, fridge, microwave and little kitchenette came in very handy. Bathroom was a bit dated but fine. Nice location, close to everything. Shuttle to disney was great. Staff were awesome. Bed was amazing!
Manager Response: Hello Tamm37:  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  We're glad you liked our amenities such as the fridge and microwave along with the shuttle service.  We appreciate your kind words about our staff...and the comfy beds!

Summary Heading: Great Value Close to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: We had a lovely, large suite at a great price. Excellent for winding down after visiting Knotts Berry Farm (which is a ten minute walk down the road). Absolutely no complaints what so ever about this location, would highly recommend it. If you enjoy beer, check out Rock n' Brew across the street; they have some great selections on tap (and their food ain't bad either).
Manager Response: Hi Grizinator:  Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor!  We're glad you enjoyed good value in our large suites close by Knott's Berry Farm.  Buena Park is very lucky to have a Rock n Brews location in our city...it's been a hit for so many of our guests!

Summary: Hotel need to be totally refurbushed its very dirty And smelly carpets is moldy and your cloths stinks same as hole room air condition is not working properly ! I have been there in 3 months regularly and at 10 different rooms all have same dirty carpets and smell mold ! Staff cleaners breakfast location is number one ! Thanks willy Arnesen
Manager Response: Hello Willy:  We're sorry that you have had carpet issues during your recent stays with us.  Thank you for your kind remarks about our Housekeeping employees and the location of breakfast.

Summary Heading: Good Staff , Old Broken Down Room
Summary: Room size is nice but it seems to be older and needs repair as our room had a broken back door and busted/ leaky shower . Pool was also closed so that was a bummer as my family was looking forward to a swim on the hot days . The restaurant was excellent, big portions, wonderful food .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're sorry that the pool was closed along with having some maintenance issues in your suite.  Your kind remarks about the portions in our restaurant are appreciated!

Summary: Not a bad place to stay if you want to be near to the parks. The room was clean and fairly comfortable. It's a family of 3 to 4 fairly well.  The neighborhood leaves a lot to be desired though and the hotel could use some freshening up
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving some feedback for us on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry you didn't like our neighborhood but glad you enjoyed our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great Value Midweek Stay Location for Cheap Visits to LA
Summary: We were looking for a hotel in the Los Angeles area for three nights midweek. Most hotels across the general area was coming in at about ¬£200/$300 a night. We got an exceptionally good price at Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.   We knew that there would be a lot of Uber journeys to locations we wanted to visit across the city, but LA is so spread out that this would be the case no matter where we stayed.  As a guide, LAX to the hotel was about $45 in an Uber. $40 from the hotel to Hollywood and $20 to Long Beach. The journeys were long due to slow traffic but we got to speak to locals and got some great advice as well.  There is a lot to also do and see near the hotel itself with Knotts Berry Farm, Titanic Artifacts and Bodies right next door.  We were a little anxious about
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review on TripAdvisor!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you got a good deal on your suite.  It was great to read about all of your adventures to Long Beach and Hollywood along with your opinions about our property.  Please consider returning to see us the next time you are in Buena Park.

Summary: Everything excellent!! Pool, hot tub ,nice atrium, safe, Except now you have to pay extra for the great breakfast , close to Disney, beach, Knots , outlets, and about an hour to Hollywood my kids and wife love this trip !!! Every year üòéüåäüëçüëå
Manager Response: Hi Marvolous:  We appreciate your patronage to our hotel over the years to our hotel!  It's great that you enjoyed the pool, hot tub and that you felt safe.  We're glad you were close to Hollywood too!  See you soon!

Summary: The Hotel is very good! it is very comfortable, and there are a lot of facilities close to the Hotel, such as Walmart, shopping centers, gas stations, restaurants, etc.  As well, the rooms are very nice.
Manager Response: Hello Jorge:  Thank you so much for your review on TripAdvisor!  We're glad you enjoyed our hotel and the nearby facilities.  Additionally, we appreciate your kind remarks about our suites!

Summary: Very close to Knott's, we were able to walk everywhere. The rooms were nice and big. Pool and grounds are beautiful. Friendly staff. The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms are very nicely done.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your polite review on TripAdvisor!

Summary: Happy with accom and landscaping. Location good. Older suites but lovely in their own way with nice art work and were very clean, comfortable and practical. Felt very much like home. Excellent staff responses made the stay very positive. On site food was good, fast and reasonably priced. Ask for room delivery b'fast request card if you are interested. They have it available at reception but was not in room or otherwise referred to. Options were varied and interesting at a good price. Beyond the usual hotel offerings.  Hotel should make available inside the rooms for guest info and use.
Manager Response: Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Sanitation and housekeeping need to be a priority, Our room was dirty with torn and stained towels and linen. We had to pressure management to clean it up. Burglars stole valuables from our car in their parking lot.No cameras in the front for security.  Management keeps apologizing for poor conditions but doesn't act on complaints. Go look at on-line reviews. We won't be back!
Manager Response: We're sorry our hotel did not exceed your expectations!

Summary Heading: There are not enough positive things to say
Summary: The front desk staff was wonderful & helpful when we arrived a few minutes early for check in. It had been a long day & I was desperately seeking a nap. They had a room ready for us in less than 10 minutes. The rooms are gorgeous, large and can easily accommodate 6 people in a comfortable manner. The two of us relaxed, one watching TV in the sitting room & I took that nap. The beds are comfy, the shower & accoutrements are amazing. The location was perfect, as we attended a convention in L.A. We walked to Knott's in 15 minutes and enjoyed Medieval Times, which is just next door. It was quiet at night, with people swimming outside our door (in February!). Check out was smooth. I also want to mention we had covered parking just outside our suite. I would love to stay here any time
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!    We really enjoyed reading this fantastic review!

Summary: Nice hotel overall. The room was clean. The internet connection was very good. The staff was very helpful with fast check-in and check-out. However, the breakfast was a disappointment and not to the standard of Raddison. One could feel as if one is eating chemical compounds. The bread and cake were stale. Otherwise, it was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about our staff and internet speed.

Summary Heading: Nice property but now not run very well!
Summary: Beautiful hotel but not run well at all!  I will simply attach the letter I am sending the hotel in regards to my stay.  See below:  I wanted to take this opportunity to give you some feedback in regards to my stay at your hotel on December 29th-31st,  2015.  It started out by not being able to access our hotel room with our key card (we were told that the closest elevator was broken so this was quite a long walk back to the lobby.  Come to find out later that night that the elevator closest to the room was not out of service).  The young man who had helped us previously was busy so a young lady took our key card and did something with it and told us that it would work now.  We went back to that room and the key card did work‚Ä¶.but to our amazement, upon opening the door, there
Manager Response: On behalf of the staff of our hotel, we're sorry for the numerous inconveniences you experienced recently.  We look forward to receiving your letter and corresponding with you directly.  Your review is very much appreciated.

Summary Heading: good, but needs to be cleaner
Summary: Good service, very comfortable bed, easy check in. Gray, possibly dirty tub. Mold in the shower grout, Carpet was vacuumed, but dirty. location was great. Room was large. This review wants 200 words, but I have nothing else to say so I am killing time with all these words.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor.

Summary Heading: Good value for a great room
Summary: I took my daughter to disneyland for her 16th birthday, and was pleasantly surprised by this hotel.  It was a large, clean room, with all a microwave and small fridge.  The pool area and jucuzzi were very nice.
Manager Response: We're so glad you and your daughter enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: We really enjoyed it here. Only a 10min shuttle ride to Disneyland (free shuttle from the Hotel) which left at several different times throughout the day. Only a 5min walk to food outlets and Walmart. The hotel was clean, very friendly staff and the pool was very well maintained.  On our first day to Disneyland, i left my wallet on the shuttle bus. I rang the hotel who called the bus driver and very promptly, he returned with my wallet. Great service and the driver received a very healthy tip :-)
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your kind remarks about our shuttle driver!

Summary Heading: Good family hotel with good rooms
Summary: We found the hotel to be really well located if you would like to visit the Disneyland and knots barry farm. it is conviniently located to a lot of places to eat asn well connectd to highways. We also went to Artasia which is a place with of indian food and delicacies.
Manager Response: We appreciate the 5 stars!

Summary Heading: Good location and nice courtyard garden
Summary: Minutes from the 91 Freeway and whithin walking distance of Knott's Berry Farm park, this hotel could use some updating. The sheets and blankets were thread bare in some spots and my daughter had some holes in her blanket. The location and layout was great for our family with a rental car. The hotel has a free shuttle to Disneyland and an onsite restaurant and lounge. Being back in SoCal, my family opted to eat at our favorite places rather than stay local so I cannot review the food. The hotel is right next to Medieval Times and a Pirate themed dinner spot. If you want to go cheap McDonald's Burger King and IHOP are nearby as is a Target and Wal Mart on Beach Blvd. the unit contains a decent little fridge and microwave if you want to bring or buy your own stuff.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind review!

Summary: My room was in the opposite side of the street, 2nd floor. So I consider it as a quiet room. It was a big room, divided in 2 parts. One with a double bed and other with a sofa-bed. Kids complained about the sofa bed (12y boy and 9 y girl) - it was not really confortable.  Room has an small coffee maker, fridge  and microwave oven. Since we didnt had breakfast on our contract, we have used these appliances. Hotel is not one of the cleanest we saw, but was not a issue for us.
Manager Response: We're sorry you were inconvenienced by the sofabed!

Summary: Friendly front end staff and house keeping, rooms were spacious and clean. Right next to a ton of places to eat and things to do. Noise was minimal despite being sold out for the night and fairly close to a busy street.Slept like a baby, I loved it!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your kind remarks about our hotel on TripAdvisor!

Summary: The room is nice and clean. There is beautiful big  garden and nice swimming pool and Jacuzzi. Internet is available and fast. The only negative points is that the thermostat was not easy to control even with following the instructions. Also, if yo go out after 13.pm your room may not be cleaned for the day. The breakfast buffet  has few choices but acceptable. the Location is walking distance from different restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for leaving us some great comments on TripAdvisor!

Summary Heading: Text us if you need anything!
Summary: This was a terrible hotel. When I returned to my room after going out for the day after my first night there, my room had not been cleaned. When I went down to the front desk to advise them of the situation, the front desk agent told me that the room had been marked down as serviced. He was, however, helpful in getting some fresh towels sent up from the laundry right away. The room could not be cleaned at that time because there was no housekeeper on duty. The shuttle service was advantageous, but never departed the hotel on time and the bus was extremely rickety. It would be helpful for people using the shuttle to reach places other than Disneyland to have service more times throughout the day. I was in town for the NAMM show at the Anaheim Convention Center. Calls to the front
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us some feedback on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry about the Housekeeping problem you encountered during your stay and your comments have been forwarded to that department to review procedures.  You'll be happy to know that a renovation of our hotel is planned for this year.

Summary Heading: Nice enough for a place to crash
Summary: My husband and I wanted a trip away to relax... This hotel is across the street from Rock & Brews (highly recommend), a block away from Knott's, and next to Medieval Times.  The plumbing was atrocious, but the room was clean.
Manager Response: We're glad you chose our hotel!

Summary: Stayed here for the weekend and by the reviews I was really hesitant but the price you can't beat. The location is great. I am not fond of the rooms being exposed to the outside I like the room doors actually in doors. The living furniture needed to updated; it was a bit dirty and stained. The bed was comfy. The thermostat was kind of confusing to work. I didn't like that the lights automatically turns off so when I was charging my phone when the light turned off so did my charger. The bathroom was clean and most of the towels. Not sure if I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor!

Summary: From the moment we checked in our experience was a great one. Danielle was lovely and very friendly she even let us choose which room we wanted. This was the largest room we have stayed in during our 8 weeks in America. You had a separate lounge, kitchenette and a large bedroom with a second tv. The furnishings are a little stained and I noticed that even though the towels had been washed they still had stains. The carpets were also heavily stained. It didn't bother us at all for the price and space you got the benefits outweighed little things. The only real downside we found was there was no internet, it was there but unusable and when you need it for business it is a problem. Saying that I would stay again.
Manager Response: WOW-what a great review!  Thanks for your kind remarks, particularly about Danielle!

Summary: Love this hotel. Great ambiance. Nice courtyard and pool area. Have stayed here before. Great customer service. A couple of complaints though...I stayed in room 314 and the room above me was partying all night. Lot's of "stomping and noise". Called the front desk at 2:30 a.m. No answer. Called room 414 (the noisy room) and no answer. Packed up and left at 3:30 a.m. Called from home at 5:30 a.m. Live in Ontario...first time no answer. Ten minutes later, called again and Hector answered and said he would look into it. I appreciate his concern and making sure the guest experience is good, but the partyers were too loud at 2:30 a.m. I will be back for a week's getaway next month. BTW, the Floral restaurant has great food and the room service is awesome! I am a Club Carlson member
Manager Response: We're awfully sorry that you had noisy neighbors during your recent stay with us!

Summary Heading: Large room, Close to Knott's, other average hotel
Summary: Stayed one night only in a superior room on Xmas eve. Room was at the back of the hotel in 4th floor. It was large, extremely quiet and view to Medieval Times parking. Hotel grounds and lobby is nice, however even the superior rooms needs improvement. There were  stains in lamp shades, sofa as well as paints were peeling off from the bathroom doors. Check-in process took a long time (almost 30 mins) as only person was working in the reception. However, the worst part was the breakfast. It was included in our room rate but probably one of the worst paid breakfast we had in any hotel. There were many items in breakfast but the quality was terrible for all of them.
Manager Response: Your feedback is very appreciated...thank you for sharing!

Summary Heading: Good hotel for a theme park stay!
Summary: This hotel is right across the street and a little down from Knott's Berry Farm. It is an easy walk to the front gates so there is no need to pay for parking here. They also offer a free shuttle to Disneyland which we used a couple of times. This and the room size are the biggest selling points to this hotel.   The rooms were a great size for families. We had two queen size beds plus a separate room with a pull out sofa. I liked the fact that there was a door between the bedroom and the living room area with the sleeper sofa. That would allow parents with small children to put their kids to bed early and then stay up later to watch tv or something without waking them.   There is a kitchenette with a small table, fridge, microwave and sink. I think there was also a coffee maker.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your remarks here on TripAdvisor!

Summary: Avoid this hotel at all costs. On the first day the toilet flooded in the bathroom, we called front desk (through emergency number as they do not answer other calls), they sent a staff to inspect the flood, all he did was throw lots of bath towels & said " i leave you to It" and walked off. We were left with a flooded bathroom, a toilet out of action & lots of wet bathroom towels. the next day we called housekeeping to clean the flood, we are going out & will be back in a few hours. To our horror upon out return nothing was cleaned. I called the reception to Complain, they sent a unhappy member of staff to clean the room (mainly the flooded bathroom), she had the door wife open & kept leaving to Talk to her fellow collegues...within that time i catched a cold & became ill. I
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for your unpleasant stay with us.  It's unfortunate that you had Housekeeping issues while you were here and we have passed on your remarks to that department in an effort to improve our facilities and service.

Summary: Rooms need an upgrade.  Restaurant / bar needs a MUCH larger menu and better / longer hours.  Restaurant service should be all day -- not  current minimal hours.  Front desk staff was excellent.  Cleaning staff was very good.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review on TripAdvisor!

Summary: The hotel  is right off the main  street it a little dangerous to try to cross over due to the high volume of traffic. The hotel it self is beautiful  looking through the double doors is a beautiful stone Choi fountain leading into the pool area. There is plenty of seating around the pool or whether your inside the pool area. The glass elevators allows one to see the inner courtyard which is rich with vegetation.  You are transposed  when you enter through the double doors. The rooms are spacious with two sections one in which you have a table with chairs so you can entertain and the other for sleeping. There is a door that separates the two areas with a sliding bathroom door that locks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind remarks!

Summary: Situated just down the street from Knott's Berry Farm, the Radisson Suites offers a comfortable stay for families seeking and affordable get away.  The rooms are clean and bright (although showing their age and cheaply furnished).  I would not, recommend this hotel for a business traveler seeking anything more than a place to lay his/her head.  There is an insight restaurant, which likely does a good breakfast business, but for dinner, I was the only patron, the menu was limited, and the meal quality poor.  Had I not been dog-tired, I would have ventured to one of  many off-site restaurants that do line the street.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor!

Summary: Large Room, Free Parking, Wi-Fi works and the Pool and Whirlpool are very clean. Knott's Berry Farm just down the street. Shopping and places to eat nearby. Safe and secure area. Attractions are with in walking distance to hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind remarks and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Quality and service at best poor
Summary: Quality and service at best poor.  bulb burned out, holes in bed sheets, requested wake up call but never received any call.  Had to call, request for robe, vs. should already be in the room, problem with screen door lock,   heated pool (broke e.g. no heating) etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for using TripAdvisor to let us know about your recent stay with us.  We're sorry about the cleanliness and maintenance issues you experienced.

Summary: Dates: 18th - 21st Dec 2015   On a holiday with tour group and stayed in this hotel for our last 3 nights before heading home. The rooms are big with a living room. However, it is not sound proof and was quite disappointing because we cannot have a good rest. We were staying on L3 and there's higher level above us so we were interrupted by their footsteps and the furnitures in the room is quite worn out with the cardboard drawer keep opening itself. The housekeeping isn't up to expectation, first time without clearing out the rubbish in the room then 2nd time bathroom rug was removed but not replaced. Breakfast served without much range and the food doesn't taste good too. It is still considered as convenience, at least can walk to the nearby walmart and some shopping streets
Manager Response: Thank you for using TripAdvisor to leave us feedback about your recent stay with us.  We're sorry about the noise problem you encountered and your disappointment about the breakfast offerings.

Summary Heading: Weekend to Knotts Berry Farm with two teenage girls
Summary: Quick trip to Knotts Berry Farm with my two teenage daughters.  Was a little concerned about staying here due to the reviews about the rooms being dirty.  On arrival I was put in a business class room for no extra charge.  Found the room to be clean.  Remembering some of the reviews about the sofa-bed being dirty that was the first thing I checked before unpacking.  Found it to be clean and no issues.  The public areas are clean and the center area where the pool is was very nice.  Great place to stay if going to KBF.
Manager Response: Thank you for using TripAdvisor for the commentary you left for us.  We're glad you enjoyed the Business Class upgrade and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Should not have the name Radisson representing it.
Summary: This hotel is run down. It needs some major remodeling. It's trying to  show a "rustic" theme as an excuse for being so dirty. I can't emphasize enough how DIRTY it is. The carpets in the room are disastrous. I will admit the room was big enough for the 6 of us. But for the 6 we only had 3 towels. We had to keep asking at the front desk for extra. And we had to go downstairs to ask since the phone didn't work. The wifi is slow. You can hear everything the people the floor above you are doing. I wouldn't recommend this hotel. Especially at the price they are asking. The televisions were out of date and most channels didn't work. Other than that the staff was friendly and the location was excellent. Those are the only positives.
Manager Response: We appreciate your positive comments about our staff and location.  You'll be happy to know that a major renovation of our hotel is planned this year and we are sorry you felt that our facility was not clean.

Summary: The hotel is very close to many activities. The rooms are big and cozy with a small kitchenette. Suitable for families travelling with kids. It has a nice gift shop where you can buy also necessary items that you need.
Manager Response: We appreciate your TripAdvisor feedback!

Summary: Room was dirty.  Couch was ripped and stained and springs poking through.  Had to ask staff for more bedding (for the sofa)  multiple times.  Doors barely locked. Carpets had more ripples and then one could imagine. Wi-if sucked!!
Manager Response: TripAdvisor is a great forum for guest feedback and we thank you for using it.  Please accept our regrets for the cleanliness issues you encountered when you were with us recently.  Your comments about the carpet, couch and door locks have been forwarded to the appropriate departments for resolution.

Summary: Hotel is great.... clean rooms,  friendly staff and hotel location is 20 to 30 minute drive to several beaches, walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm and hotel provides free shuttle service to and from Disney....
Manager Response: We're happy you were please with your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Knott's New Years Day Family Trip
Summary: We love staying here when we visit Knott's.  We get a poolside room, and it's perfect for our family of four.   There is a separate good size bedroom with two double beds, tv and closet.  The living area has a pullout couch, tv, sink, microwave, and fridge.  The grounds are lush and green and give a feeling of privacy.  Yes, it's an older hotel, and could use updating, but for the price, you can't beat it. The rooms are clean, the linens on the beds are clean, and the staff is friendly and efficient.   It's an easy walk to Knott's, plenty of dining options also within walking distance, and parking is free.  We'll be back next year!
Manager Response: Happy New Year and thank you for being such a thoughtful reviewer on TripAdvisor.

Summary: stay here if you are going to Knotts with the family.  great location.  close to restaurants and very short walk.  would recommend.  They were very accommodating when TV didn't work and quickly switched our rooms.  my only complaint was that the carpets were not well taken care of. Needed clean or replaced.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are happy to report we plan to install new carpeting this year!

Summary: Good location, staff was friendly, the room had everything we needed. This was the second time we stayed here. We were going to Knotts for New Years eve and didn't want to drive. The hotel is an easy walk to Knotts, and has a good set up for us and 2 kids.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice comments.

Summary: The pool heater had not been working for 2 weeks.  Our grand kids look forward to swimming in December and they couldn't do that.  The carpet by the baseboards  in the rooms were dirty.  When checking out the manager and clerk spoke to each other in Spanish and I only speak English.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very comfortable suites for large families!
Summary: We visited Disneyland and as a Carlson Club member I chose Radisson because the suites are very convenient for my family. I have 4 kids and we had a perfect sleep time. The size of the room and living room are very good
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our 3rd stay here at the Radisson, and again, it lived up to our expectations.  We arrived after a long drive, delayed by construction and traffic (shocker).  Once we got there, we were just ready to unwind and relax.  We were greeted by a friendly outgoing staff member (I wish I could remember his name).  He made the check in policy so easy, we were on our way to our room within 5 minutes.  As always, the rooms were clean and spacious.  The beds were comfortable.  Being a family of 5 it is difficult to find a great hotel at a great price, and that is what we have found here.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Overnight stay on way to Disneyland
Summary: Very nice hotel room was clean beds comfy staff was great would stay again received a very good price to stay there was pleasantly surprised and how nice the facility was will definitely come back parking was free
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel looks like it came straight out of 'Melrose Place' the TV show. Very nice hotel rooms with a separate seating area. The rooms have motion sensor lights inside that you can turn off. Very comfortable beds too!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our third time to this hotel in six months. Walking distance to knotts berry farms. Short driving distance to california adventure and disneyland . Lots of places to eat close by. The room is an actual suite with a couch bed in one room and two double beds in other room. TV in each room. Only drawback is no free breakfast anymore . Otherwise will definatly stay here again. Very happy with service .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay, walking distance to Knotts, good looking rooms but may need a little TLC. Buffet prices/food good, right next door the Medival Times. We would definitely stay again, we purchased year passes to Knotts and now have a place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms nice but no perks (I am a gold member), the weather keep us from enjoying hotels facilities but they all seemed nice.  The rooms are clean, bathroom also very clean but the over all felling still left me so so ( like something is missing). I had two rooms and there was 8 of us and every one like the rooms and the court yard but they said the same thing there is just something missing.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible Hotel do not waste your money and you value your family
Summary: I wanted give you a rundown of my recent stay on at the Radisson Buena Park We checked in and got our room and started to unpack. I pulled out the sofa sleeper And it was terrible the cushions were really dirty and the mattress had stains all over it.I thought there was no way I was going to let my daughter sleep on this bed. We then proceededTo pull back the sheets on our be and there was blood stains on the sheet and comforter And one of the pillow cases was filthy. I went down to the desk and asked for a new room He then gave me a key to a new room I checked it out on the way back our room and As soon as I walked it boom the smell was pretty bad almost a pet/ammonia smell. I walked Back to the front desk and told him ‚Äúthat one is worse than the one we are in ‚Äúhe told me sorry
Manager Response: Thank you for using TripAdvisor to make us aware of your recent stay in our hotel.  Please accept our apologies for the odor and Housekeeping issues that you experienced.  Your feedback helps us take steps to ensure that those sorts of occurrences are rare and aren't repeated.  We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel did not replenish daily coffee supplies, the bathtub faucet was leaky and loud, and the thermostat didn't work properly. In addition my co-worker ate the restaurant downstairs and they burnt her steak and Brussel sprouts. When she told them about about they didn't take anything off the check or re-do her meal.
Manager Response: We're sorry that your needs weren't met during your recent stay in our hotel.  Thank you for letting us know about the leaky faucet and that your coffee supplies weren't replenished.  Your comments about the burnt food have also been brought to the attention of the Food & Beverage Manager in an attempt to improve our product and facilities.

Summary: Very dirty. Poor housekeeping standards. Found a roach in our bathroom. Needless, to say, we picked all of our luggage up off of the floor. Very close to Knotts Berry Farm if that's what you're looking for ...
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us good feedback regarding your recent stay in our hotel.  We're sorry for the pest problems, along with substandard Housekeeping services.  Your comments are appreciated as we attempt to improve our facilities and services.

Summary: I have always had great stays here!! I'm a member of Club Carlson so I receive points for stays. This property has a wonderful breakfast that I receive as a member. The manager comes by our table & makes sure we are happy. The rooms are suites with refrigerator & microwave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of the hotel is perfect. The room setup is good it has a living room for the kids and a separate room. Can't complain at all. The swimming pool was awesome and the hot tub was a nice treat
Manager Response: none

Summary: Kindness from the moment we entered the lobby!  Clean, spacious.  Plants and trees so nice, pool and jacuzzi so clean.  Poor turn out for Thanksgiving dinner and they almost closed down, but stayed open last minute for us! Had just spent the day at Knott's.  We thought "Oh, no...it's gonna be a crap shot!"  It was FANTASTIC homemade food!  The Chef was amazing and manager so gracious and welcoming. Seriously, we both cook and the food was Fantastic!  Rooms were up to date modern and super clean and spacious!  Just Happy all around! Beds and comforter so comfy!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was disgusting.  When I walked in I found an odor bomb that had been released and it couldn't have done much because the room still smelled horrible. The sheets were stained.  The headboard looked like it never gets cleaned, I could easily see splashes of God only knows what.  There was mold in the bathroom and the bathroom door had a lot of old filth covering it.  The carpet had countless stains as well as the furniture.  I had to use an extra blanket to cover the couch because I didn't want my 3 year old sitting on it otherwise.  The owner CLEARLY doesn't care about this place.  My family will not be returning.  Do yourself a favor and stay away!
Manager Response: TripAdvisor is a great forum for reviews and we thank you for leaving one for us.  The hotel is now under new ownership, and we will be unveiling plans for our renovation in the very near future.  We hope you will return to see the improvements we make in our suites including the carpets, sofabeds and bathrooms.

Summary: This hotel USED to be great, now it is need of renovations. The beds are hard and uncomfortable, the rooms are dirty with stained carpets, dirty lights and outdated tvs. The pool was broken, the hottub disgusting and the grounds unkept. The staff was not very attentive either. I would definately recommend staying somewhere else-- anywhere else.
Manager Response: We appreciate your TripAdvisor review of your recent stay in our hotel.  You should be happy to know that we are planning a renovation of the property in an effort to improve our facility.  Please accept our apologies for the carpet condition, along with the landscaping and pool concerns you had.

Summary Heading: Great Value for a great Stay...
Summary: This hotel is very close to freeway and amusement parks. Very clean; each suite had two rooms which were nice for my family. small bathroom but very doable.We will definitely be back when in the area. (we have season passes to Disneyland). so very soon. The only disappointment was that there is no free continental breakfast anymore.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel will take as long as 40 rings to answer its own phone (for a guest!). Be prepared to request a final bill from three different managers before you get one.  This is a former Embassy Suites property, which was "modernized," in a tasteless fashion, by Radisson.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  We are sorry you had trouble getting a final copy of your bill, along with contacting our Front Desk.  Please stay tuned for exciting new renovation changes coming our way.

Summary: Hotel is in great location to parks,  nice staff, but is really showing wear and tear.   We had a super large group staying above us that shook room with loud noise from 9 to midnight.   Staff all very helpful and nice.  This location a gold mine.  Radisson, you should invest in a remodel on a regular basis.  That time is now.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I been coming to this specific hotel for the past several years and we have been watching it go downhill. It seems to be getting worse and worse and dirtier and dirtier I have read the reviews that people just about the staff but we have seen the complete opposite. We usually reserve between 3 to 4 rooms a trip and stay 3 to 5 nights. Around 5 times a yr.  We have been offered free brfst buffet every time upon arrival, (we were just here in Aug) upon arrival we were told no brfst offered. The inconsistency is very hard for large groups to plan their time away when figuring in hotel stays. Now for the ground Our sink is literally falling out of the granite,the roof looks like it could fall in from the roon above us at any momenr, awful stained carpets,tvs are hard
Manager Response: Thank you for your lengthy review on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry that you feel the hotel is continuing to decline in product and service.  The hotel is now under new ownership, and there are terrific plans for the future of our property.  We hope you will continue to utilize our facility.

Summary: The front desk went above and beyond the call of Duty. My reservation said it had a king size bed but when I went to check in there wasn't one. Because of whom I made the reservations thru.... they told me it's never as what it seems the customersame are told. The hotel was full so I took the other room. As soon as there was a cancellation I got a call and was moved into the correct reserved room, instead of them just rebooting the room and leaving me where I was. Great customer service for making that happen.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved the spacious rooms and convenient location.  BUT, You ask us to conserve and reuse the towels and we would if only you had a place to hang them..  No Towel racks means towels go on the floor and that does not conserve energy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a clean and roomy place located conveniently close to Knott's Farm. Staff is extremely friendly and accommodating. Although our late room service order showed up  a bit on the cold side, every interaction was pleasant. Our room had a separate living area complete with a microwave, mini cooler, small dining table and sleeper couch which was quite beneficial when traveling with kids.
Manager Response: none

Summary: still  poorly run , badly maintained and operated , had to chase after towels on a daily basis , loud partys until very late , buses parked over many car spaces , lucky to get a space late in the evening   its like they simply do not care
Manager Response: We're sorry that you weren't satisfied during your most recent stay with us.  Please know that we truly do care and take your feedback very seriously.  We will take steps to ensure that parties are discouraged, linens are replaced and parking is readily available.

Summary: A pleasant stay at the Radisson Buena Park. Highly recommend staying here. You must go say hi to Anthony. He is amazing! Our son can't stop talking about the friend (Anthony) he made at the Radisson. Great customer service! Can't wait to go back!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for the best price
Summary: if you would like to have clean rooms great customer service and a good breakfast every morning then this is the place for you. The employees here make you feel like you're at home. I definitely recommend this place to anybody for the price and comfort and home away from home!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pictures are much nicer than actual rooms, carpets dirty, couches in suites and lobby look like a bunch of college kids owed them. Rooms have a little musty smell. Staff is great, friendly, courteous and professional.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really liked the size of my room, lots of space. The bed was comfortable, and plenty of pillows. I slept well each night. There was plenty of counter space in the bathroom for all of my toiletries. The shower water stayed hot for my long showers. The only thing I have to complain about is the lights seem to be on a motion detector timer, and went off after about 10 minutes. I could never figure out how to keep the lights on for long. The morning I was checking out, I couldn't get my A/C to work. There were stray cats all over the parking lot. The courtyard grounds seemed dirty with trash here and there. My room was clean though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: While I was checking in I read a little sign taped to the check in desk saying that the hotel is under new management. I have seen mixed reviews, with some people saying that the hotel is terrible and some people saying it is lovely. I think it could use some improvements, but for the price and the location I was very satisfied. Perhaps the new management has something to do with it, perhaps it was always like this. I don't know if it applies to all rooms, but there is now a hot, free breakfast service. There is also a free disneyland bus service. There is a hotel pool and spa. Yes, the carpets need to be replaced. Yes, the sleeper sofa is old. But, the bed is comfortable, the water is hot. They make the beds and replace the towels. The price is reasonable considering the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this property for three nights. It is in a great location for visiting Knott's or Disneyland. It is an older property, and it is showing wear.  The rooms are spacious and beds are comfortable. Each room has a small microwave and mini refrigerator. However, the rooms are in need of a thorough cleaning and new bedding/linens.  Our bed linens were old, stained and had holes in them.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I like the fact that the hotel is walking distance from Knott's Berry Farm. Parking at  the hotel was free which is also a big plus. Breakfast buffet was good and filling. The hotel was clean and the beds were pretty comfortable. Definitely a good stay and I would recommend this hotel  to anyone who doesn't want the crowding that you would experience at the Knott's Berry Farm hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Radisson has all of the amenities at a fair price and the staff are more than pleasant. The rooms are clean, well stocked and comfy! We were in the hotel for two nights and we were able to take advantage of the internet, pool and hot tub. We were greeted by staff each and every time we saw them and both check in and out were more than simple!
Manager Response: none

Summary: AWESOME hotel.  I've been staying here for years whenever I am in LA. TROPICAL FEEL as soon as you enter. rooms have living and bed room. GREAT showers. STAY POOLSIDE (I like these rooms best). On site shop in case you forgot anything. NICE STAFF!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice that every room was a suite. First time I ever woke up without a back ache! Carpet, sleeper sofa and upholstery needs to be replaced. Disneyland shuttle was very convenient and easy to just call and let them know we wanted to be picked up at a different time than we expected.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms have a separate bedroom great for entertaining or just watching tv while someone else is sleeping. The breakfast was hot and lots to choose from the people that cleared the table of our used dishes were friendly and fast. The pool area was very tropical. We will stay here again. We stayed here to go to Knotsberry farm haunted night. So close we could walk, and lots of other types of restaurant with in walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we come to visit every October we stay here! We really like the location. Staff is always friendly and helpful. The hotel is also great for staying w/our family. There is a lot of places near by to eat and is just down the way from the freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel overall needs to be updated.  Rooms are clean and staff is very welcoming and friendly.  I would stay here again without hesitation. Good location to freeway as we were going to Disneyland.  Plenty of parking which is free.  Buffet breakfast has a little bit of everything and the eggs, bacon, pancakes/waffles/french toast were never cold.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Resturant hours were not, according to what was posted. It said pancakes and open servicer  until 10pm. But I ordered in the resturant for room service and I was told to leave because it was closed and it opens at 4pm on a Friday. This was not posted nor told to me.  The bed's are very firm and I wanted soft. This could have been made aware before I rented the room. Therefore it wasn't a good night sleep.  The location was good and the outdoors courtyard was definitely great. The suit was nice but u expected a bathrobe and it was unavailabl . I asked for one and it was only for the business class rooms. I'm on vacation and I'm not allowed to have a robe?  That's not fare. I would even pay extra for one.  Not enough towels in the room. But the front desk service was very nice.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind remarks on TripAdvisor!  Thank you for your recent stay with us, and we are sorry that the restaurant was closed during a part of it.  It's unfortunate that a bathrobe wasn't available to you in a standard suite.

Summary Heading: Hotel Room VERY DIRTY could use a good cleaning...
Summary: The Hotel entrance and customer service was great!!!  Once in the room it was a different experience... The first thing we were greeted with once we opened the door to our room was the stained, dirty wore out carpet. As we navigated through the room to our beds I noticed the duvet covers had a dirty hand print on them as well as the pillow covers. The dirtiness doesn't stop there once at the bathroom I noticed the un-cleaned bathtub with moldy substance around the perimeter of the tub. We also noticed heavy dust around doors, blinds and carpet edges.  I think management needs to have a serious talking with the cleaning crew/ maids and make sure that they spend a little more time cleaning as I felt like I needed a rubber suit to even step into the room. I honestly felt like I
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay with us and are sorry that we did not meet your expectations.  Your comments about the carpet issues, along with bathroom concerns are regrettable and we will certainly pass them on to our Housekeeping department.  Thank you for the kind remarks about our staff.

Summary: Pool not heated  Spa/whirlpool broken carpet stained/dirty missing fire extinguishers, safety problems We requested that they recycle/reuse towels - did not waiting water, resources.  breakfast on paper plates...
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on TripAdvisor.  We're sorry that you were inconvenienced by the restoration of our whirlpool.  We will review the safety concerns you passed along as well.

Summary: Staff is always pleasant and accommodating. Any time I visit the Buena Park area, I make it a point to stay here since I have always had a comfortable stay. Staff is on top of their customer service. The gift shop attendant should take lessons however she is not part of Raddison.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall it was a nice day had a problem with the AC leaking and the carpets were a little dirty but everything else worked out it was a comfortable stay thank you when the area was perfect everything was nearby Knotts Berry Farm with a cross the street so that ended up working out
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wish I would have trusted my instinct on this one!
Summary: We just got back after spending 10 days there.  Would not go back.  Before we left I was hesitant after reading the reviews but decided I didnt want to hassle with changing our Hotel.  Huge mistake.  Upon checking in I asked the staff at the front desk where the closest Gas Station was.  His response.  "I see you have a smart phone.  Use google!"  Upon checking into the room it wasnt bad but defenitly nothing great.  We had to other families in other rooms and there rooms smelled horrible.  Moldy and like mildew is the best way to describe it.  Through out the week we ran into problem after problem.  The toilet clogged once or twice a day the entire time.  After mentioning this to the staff there solution was to throw the toilet paper in the trash can.  Are you kidding me?  The
Manager Response: On behalf of the entire staff, thank you for your comprehensive review on TripAdvisor.  Your comments are very much appreciated in an effort for us to improve our product and services.  We are sorry you had trouble with Housekeeping, and shuttle issues. Summary: Stayed in the hotel for few nights early August. Overall, we had less than par experience during our entire stay. To start with, had to wait at the reception for an hour in the middle of the night to check in. Key cards were not working due to a system failure. Rooms are old but OK, but house keeping is pretty bad. They take their own time  not only to clean the room, but even to provide a towel. Entire property is in need of renovation. Not worth the money.
Manager Response: Although you stayed with us quite some time ago, it's apparent that we left an impression on you that we don't feel good about.  We're sorry that you had key trouble and Housekeeping issues while you were a guest of the hotel, and hope that you might visit us again in the future.

Summary: Rooms were filthy, and furniture old and stained, along with the carpet! Staff could not find pre paid reservation upon arrival.  The lobby was less than inviting with the old stained furniture! If I was not staying with a group and had not pre paid, I would have left!
Manager Response: Hello Thomas:  We appreciate the time you took to make us aware of some of the inconveniences you experienced recently at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  On behalf of the entire team, we're sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  Having problems at check in certainly does not get your stay off to a good start, followed by a lobby that doesn't appear inviting.  The issues in your suite, such as furniture and carpet concerns, have been relayed to our Housekeeping and Engineering departments for resolution.

Summary: Hotel in bad need of renovation and filtering system needs to be revamped.  Our team had several rooms and all complained about condition of there rooms. We had a cleaner room than others.  We did not know how to operate A/C as there were no instructions and another friend had to show us.  We did not open the baloncy window as the outside was filthy with dirt and spider webs.  The mattresses sucked and we felt like we were sleeping on an air mattress.
Manager Response: We value the feedback that you shared here on TripAdvisor.  On behalf of the entire team, we apologize for the odor problem along with the challenges of the air conditioning system.

Summary: Very good location, good service, the room was great -  spacious and clean however the outside looked like it needed refreshing.  For a family holiday this would be the perfect place as breakfasts were include, there was a nice pool and spa pool and the location is good.  There was only one shuttle bus to Knotts Berry farm though - but it is in walking distance to the hotel.  Overall it was a good place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel has it all for families and groups -- the rooms all have separate living areas, fridge, etc.  The hotel is enclosed with a sort of tropical feel.  The breakfast is a buffet with many options and fresh fruit.  Fun for everyone. Beds were quite comfy too!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The toilet broke during the night, the bathroom door wouldn't close, it was an extreme struggle to get in the front door.  This was a terrible hotel.  I would never stay there again.  We told the manager and he said he would give us 20% off our bill when we checked out and charged us full price.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out and writing your review.  We are sorry you were not satisfied with the accommodations of your room.  We will discuss the conditions of your room with our staff to ensure all guest rooms are up to standards.

Summary Heading: Decent rooms, but housekeeping is lax
Summary: We had to pay extra for breakfast, but the host kindly charged us for 2 kids instead of 3. The gift shop was open when we needed them most and staff was kind. Front desk was very helpful. Housekeeping only left us 3 wash clothes the day we checked in. We called them daily and asked for 5 of them. Most days took 2 phone calls as we would receive bath towels or hand towels each time. Bud Light with an expiration date of May 2014 was found in our mini fridge. Thank goodness our young kids are not the adventurous type to have gotten into that! Black hair was often found on bath towels. Our sheets were changed daily as we requested and we were given extra shampoo and conditioner as we requested each day also. The beds made my husband and I roll into eachother as they sank in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: We hung our menu request on the doorknob for breakfast room service the night before. Our request never got picked up. We waited for about half hour after our requested time, when we realized, nobody picked up our menu request.  I called to have the order picked up. The guy said he would waive the service charge. When he brought the food, he mentioned the service charge could not be waived. On top of that, he mentioned an additional gratuity could be added, even thought it was already added to the bill.  The hotel needs remodeling.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know what happened with your room service order recently.  We're very sorry your order did not get picked up properly and that there was confusion with the service charge.

Summary: The rooms are in need of updating but if you aren't too picky the place is fine. They have a decent breakfast buffet and the overall property is nice. There is ample parking as well. The down side was there seemed to be a lot of smokers when we were there. Pool was excellent too especially for the kids...
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Buena Park Radisson Inn.  This was a family reunion and they did everything they could to make our stay a good one.  The hotel restaurant staff was especially friendly and the breakfast buffet is one of the best we have experienced.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Someone's Been Sleeping in my Bed
Summary: The first room we were given had been used by someone.  There was a bag of wet towels on the floor and garbage with a note that said, "Forgive Me Yolanda."  Per the card on the table, Yolanda was the housekeeper for the room.  One bed was unmade, shower used and window open.  Really spooked us!
Manager Response: Hi Mary:  We are very sorry for that episode while you were in our hotel.  We are still investigating the details of your incident, and hope to provide some answers.    Your concerns for our employee is very much appreciated.

Summary Heading: Perfect family accommodation for Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: we had stayed here many times several years back, and stayed again this year - we will definitely keep coming back - great suites which can accommodate 2 adults and up to 4 kids with ease, great buffet breakfast (included in some room rates), and a huge pool and jacuzzi.  free parking and an easy walk to Knotts Berry Farm - there is a hotel shuttle to Disneyland -  the perfect place to base yourself for a Disnet holiday, and Buena Park has a great mall and lots of other attractions along Beach Blvd.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were a little apprehensive after reading some reviews, but we actually thoroughly enjoyed our stay it had everything we needed and was handy to everything.  The staff were very helpful and the breakfast buffet was great.  It is a little dated, but all that aside the rooms were cleaned each day and we found them very comfortable.  We are definitely going to stay there next year when we go.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Learn What to Expect from Radisson...
Summary: Service, rooms and experience has continued to dwindle every time I stay at the Radisson. We had to switch rooms twice to find a room that was not subpar to other "comparable" hotels in the same price range. Concerning water damage, smell of mildew, broken sleep number bed, and a broken pull out couch to name a few... The location was great, staff was ok, price was good, but you are always playing the lottery with Radisson, no continuity and no guarantee. Thankfully the hotel had enough open rooms available allowing us to move, otherwise it could have been a very annoying trip.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the disappointments you experienced during your stay. We have noted your complaints regarding the condition of our hotel, and we are making the changes necessary to ensure that the quality of our facility is kept up to the highest standard. We thank you for your time, and hope you get the chance to stay with us again so we get the opportunity to restore your faith in Radisson hotels.

Summary: I was a little concerned after reading recent reviews but found the stay to be a pleasant experience. The hotel is a bit dated but is clean and well run. The courtyard is a nice refuge from the surrounding area. Also, I found the staff to be helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Except for St. Louis, the worst experience ever!
Summary: My wife and I booked our room in advance and thought that it was a great deal because of the included breakfasts and the kid friendly atmosphere.  We arrived late on our first night with very tired kids.  We were checked in and went to our room.  We opened the door on another guest who was coming out of the bathroom!  Someone was in our room.  We went back to the front desk and informed the attendant that there was someone already occupying the room.  He apologized and gave us two free drink coupons for the bar.  We were checked into another room.  We went to that room and found that the carpet was soaking wet just about everywhere.  We went back to the front desk and told the night manager that there was a problem with some sort of leak that should probably be investigated
Manager Response: Hi Jacqueline:  Thanks for using TripAdvisor to make us aware of the challenges you had during your recent stay with us.  We're very sorry that you encountered too many room moves-that makes for a tough start to any arrival.  It sounds like we ultimately got you in suitable accommodations and made an adjustment for the inconvenience you experienced.  We appreciate hearing the kind remarks about Brenda and our Housekeeping team.

Summary: Housekeeping staff & management could use some better training.  Ended up with a fridge full of food that was unrefrigerated for 24+ hours because housekeeping unplugged fridge because it was broken.  Ray in maintenance was awesome. Shuttle to Disney was convenient. Breakfast was good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I don't want a lot of competition for times that I want to stay at this hotel; however, this hotel is so awesome, it deserves to be recognized.    This hotel was chosen for us the first time through Hotels.  We fell in love with this hotel and the most comfortable beds.  Not to mention the awesome staff, the great service, roomy rooms/suites, etc.  We now select this hotel and go directly to it whenever we go to Buena Park.  The service from Louis, the bartender, and Brenda, in the restaurant, are out of this world great.  Location is great too.  We just walked to the dinner shows, Knotts, and the waterpark.  Did I mention the staff and service were great?!  Honestly, I cannot express enough how much I enjoy this hotel.  The only construction feedback I could give is the fact
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful place to stay, walking distance to Knott's, reasonably priced and rooms are great for familes or groups - separate bedroom from living room with microwave & fridge. Very clean & beds are very comfortable with lots of pillows.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at this hotel two weeks ago, due to the location for Medieval TImes, and the pictures on the website.  And it is a nice looking hotel, with an attractive lobby, and a pretty pool (with safety gate) and fountain sitting area.  We were very pleased when we got to the hotel - the noise level at night was good, and there was enough parking. The trouble began when we got ready for bed...As the adult with a group of teens, I opted to take the couch, and leave them the double beds to share (be advised, unlike most hotels which offer a King or 2 Queens, this offers 2 Doubles - quite a bit smaller).  I know couch beds are not the best, but I thought it would at least be usable.  The mattress resembled a tortilla, thin, hard and distorted and slid off the bed as soon as we tried to
Manager Response: Hello Lisa:  First of all, thank you for your kind words about Brenda.  I will make sure to pass them on to her when I see her tomorrow morning.  I'm awfully sorry about the lack of comfort with the sofabed.  You should know that they are part of renovation that is planned for later this year.  They will be replaced, but that doesn't make up for what happened during your stay with us.

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel eight or nine years ago, when it was in Embassy Suites. It was a fine hotel then. After two trips to the lobby and one phone call, a maintenance man came to the room about 10:00 PM and unplugged and
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to leave feedback here on TripAdvisor about your recent stay in our hotel.  It's unfortunate that you elected to change hotels during your visit to Buena Park, and we're sorry that you found problems with the suite.  We're glad that Maintenance was able to assist with the Sleep Number beds and apologize for that inconvenience.

Summary: Great location for Buena Park attractions, and nice to have the roominess of a suite.  Internet speed and reliability lacking, decor a bit dated, but overall comfortable.  I wouldn't recommend the breakfast unless it's included in your rate... passable, but not worth the charge.  Overall, well worthwhile as a place to sleep between visiting the local attractions.

But that's only till 10pm, and by the time we turned off the lights, it was dead silent. I like the spaciousness of the room. It is separated into living and bedroom with a door. It has a mini fridge and useable microwave. In this hot summer, the "chilly" cold a/c is a welcome. It is so cold that we have to switch it off at night as the blanket is rather thin. And I loved the bath products the use, "Rituals", the shampoo feels amazing with its menthol effect, and the bath soap has this scrub beads effect. It is almost like a spa. And the property is beautiful with its lush landscaping, it is

It was always full with kids and the last place we felt like unwinding after a busy day.

It is much bettter hotel housekeeper migt check the conditiond and take necessary action before costomer comes to hotel room.

Summary Heading: Reasonable hotel (at least for what we could see...)

After having spoken to the front desk management I decided to maintain our booking. At our arrival, we found a hotel situated in a very nice "old hacienda" with a very patio and swimming pool. The place felt quite relaxing with all the tropical vegetation shading the patio. There is no doubt that this place has the potential to achieve a higher hotel class, just by its building. We were checked in a  room

Summary: Overall great value for the money -- only real areas of opportunity were in house keeping.  Front desk and food service were outstanding for the money.  Check in and check out was very easy and efficient.  I would recommend this hotel for those going to Knotts or Disneyland.  Walking distance to Knotts and Disney just down the street.  Plenty of fun restaurants within walking distance .  I booked 2 rooms for a total of 8 people kids and adults.  Like I said good value for the money.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here to be close to Knotts berry farm. Hotel is a bit run down. The room on first glance appears clean. The first impression wa the musty smell. Even after having the air condition running for a few hours it never went away. There is mildew in the bathroom. The only thing the hotel has going for it is the size of the rooms and the location. Staff is not friendly and blow you off when issues are brought to their attention including the night shift supervisor and the manager.
Manager Response: We're sorry that our staff didn't seem to acknowledge your concerns while you were with us recently.  Thanks for letting us know about room odor and the mildew in the bathroom.  Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Alex at the front desk was so great!! After a long drive room 236 was so accommodating to our big family. Two rooms, two bathrooms with plenty of space for everyone!! A great value! The free breakfast was really crowded but it was FREE!

When they came to clean our room, they took the dirty towels and never replaced with new and they rinsed out our dirty glasses not leaving clean ones... yes lipstick and coffee... the remote control in bedroom didn't work.  the cable didn't work the first day.  The first night we were laying in bed watching cartoons with our young Grandkids and they had a surge due to a power outage and somehow porn came on the channel (I know this was not a result of the hotel.... but still part of our terrible experience of the hotel)  the pool towels were out and the dirty towel bins were full.

Summary: this is a regular place my friends and I stay pretty much on a yearly basis,  its close to a lot of restaurants and knots berry farm. the facilities are clean and tidy and the pool is fantastic with the deep end being 8 feet,   I cant really fault the place its reasonable for cost and the staff are friendly.

Manager Response: TripAdvisor is a great forum for feedback, and we appreciate you taking the time to make us aware of some of the challenges you recently encountered. Housekeeping staff is terrible. Took all the dirty towels...but did not stock in clean towels to replace the dirty ones taken from the room. Took off the empty toilet roll.....but did not replace w/a new roll?  Did not re-stock used up coffee - or give clean glasses.  I guess I expected more from a Radiisson Hotel.

The Trip Advisor reports on most hotel properties within walking distance of Disneyland are atrocious, so we figured we might do better going a bit further away. The Radisson seemed like as good a choice as any.  First the problems...we had hit or miss luck with our room keys getting in and out of the room, the pool gate, and the gate to the courtyard area from the parking lot. Took 5-7 tries EVERY TIME to gain entry.  The motion sensors controlling the electricity in the room drove us crazy...we were sitting in bed reading and the bedside table lights just went off. Summary: Great place, great breakfast, rooms. If you are going to disney calif√≥rnia think about it. And also it came with free transportation to park. The rates versus what they delivery is fair. Nice place for relax.

Summary: first time staying here. rated the hotel Very Good only because it was a quiet stay and was able to get sleep. short staffed in the front office, one clerk a little moody, printer not working, floor in room a little dingy, breakfast package cheap but you get what you pay for. the rest of the staff were excellent and very friendly. the kids enjoyed the pool.

Also the air was a nightmare--the room was either stuffy hot or freezing cold--but so muggy inside even cold you were a clammy cold.    The location is convenient, walking distance to Knotts, restaurants, and a few other attractions.  Disney is a traffic-clogged mess though from here, and the hotel's shuttle times didn't work for us.    The few positives are easier to mention that the many negatives--good internet, the kids enjoyed the pool, the tvs and linens had been upgraded (but reception was poor), and we didn't have a problem with parking.  But the negatives far out-weight the few positives, and I wouldn't stay
