We appreciate you sharing all of the wonderful details about our property that make us a comfortable and convenient choice for travelers visiting the Anaheim/Buena Park area.   We appreciate your feedback and look forward to the next opportunity to deliver another great experience to you and your family!  Warmest Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Pick up the dirty dishes already!!!
Summary: We stayed here before and wanted to love this place! I try to choose my hotels with value and comfort in mind. The selling features for me at this hotel is the free breakfast, free shuttle, onsite restaurant with managers reception and pool. I paid $110 night on hotels.com.  First, the dirty dishes laying on the floor in the walkways, in vending room, on the gas grill, in pool area (pool was even closed and locked up with dirty dishes on the tables??) really shows me that the staff is lazy and does not care!!! These dirty dishes remained here for the 3 days we stayed at the hotel! The vending room stunk of rotting food with roaches crawling on the plates. I finally called and asked the night manager why they don't send someone to pick up the dishes...she informed me that there
Manager Response: Hello Widad2,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review concerning your recent stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  I am personally very embarrassed in regards to the dirty dish issue and please accept my sincere apologies as there is no excuse that I can offer for the shortcomings which you experienced.  I want to assure you that your experience is certainly not typical of the quality of service and hospitality we offer our guests and corrective steps have been taken, as a result of your comments, to preclude a recurrence to future guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us and again I do apologize that your experience with the dirty dishes was the memory that you were left with of our property.   Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We just returned from a 2-night stay, we are a family of four: 2 adults and 2 children, age 11 and 9.  We spent one day at Disney and one day at Knotts Soak City.  I had a room reserved at the Courtyard across the street, but cancelled after seeing the prices offered here at Radisson, which was significantly less. I read the reviews before booking, so I knew what to expect before coming here.  We are Marriott loyal and we usually stay at Marriott properties, but the price Radisson was offering was too good to justify paying double just to gain Marriott points.  I noticed some minor things that other reviewers had mentioned, but overall our stay here was very good, more like 3 1/2 stars!  Pros:  Price/Value, Location to Disney (10min); location to Knotts (<2 min.); free hot
Manager Response: Hello ELD702,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and  that you felt you got a great value during your recent stay, that you enjoyed the hotel, amenities, location, and service.  Again, thank you for your review and for choosing the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We look forward to having you as our guest again and hope to see you in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Another good stay at the Radisson
Summary: Our second time staying here and we still love the value for money. The suites sleep up to six people, which for our group of four was perfect. The location being so close to heaps of shops and restaurants is great.  The ONLY niggle, and I say this without trying to sound like a holier-than-thou singleton, is that this place is extremely family friendly. Perhaps too much so. Apparently the pool was meant to close at 10pm but it was commonplace to see (and hear!) kids still in there past 11pm. The staff didn't really want to put a lid on screaming/running/annoying kids (this is the parents job but kids running around the halls past 10pm is ridiculous. The security guy I saw walking around turned a blind eye to it). We tolerated it as we were only there four days...I guess if
Manager Response: Hello Yellowtangelo,  We appreciate you once again making us your choice in Buena Park accommodations while visiting the U.S. Thank you for your great comments, recommendation of our property and sharing your tips with other travelers.   Please note that I have informed the security guard that the pool does indeed close at 10pm and that there shouldn't be anyone in the pool or the pool area after10pm. Please accept my apologies for the distractions that took place.  We look forward to having you as our guest again and hope to see you in the near future when your travels bring you back to the U.S.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We were pleased with everything about this hotel.  Check in was a breeze.  The staff was very helpful and knowledgable.  My family and I will definitely stay there again.  I loved the size of the room.  It allowed for pivacy and comfort for my daughter and I since we were traveling with my sons.  We were able to use the bedroom while they stayed in the living area. The free breakfast in the morning was a life saver.  The kids thought it was the best and never wanted to leave.
Manager Response: Dear Trinabobeanna,  Thank you very much for your recommendation of our hotel to other travelers. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great stay! Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. We appreciate your excellent ratings, compliments about our wonderful staff and hot breakfast buffet.   One way I always judge if the family vacation was a success is by how my kids feel when it is time to leave and if they don't want to leave then that means I made the correct choice when it came to the hotel that we stayed in and it sounds like your children really enjoyed their stay which means that you made the right choice in choosing us.  :)  I do hope that you and your children were able to enjoy the pool.  Again, thank you for staying with us. We are very pleased that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities. Thank you for your review and we hope you will be back to visit again soon.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Great atmosphere, super pool/hit tub - rooms just ok.
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times, spanning back over 6 years ago before it was a Radisson but an Embassy Suites. The atmosphere is great, the atrium style is super neat with the pool and hot tub being a very nice way to cool down after the commute through Los Angeles to get into Buena Park. The rooms need some TLC however, they are starting to show their age and  are bringing my 4 point rating down from a 5 point rating. First, it needs to be said that the "Sleep Number Beds" they advertise is not completely correct. What they fail to state is that the sleep number beds are only in the rooms that hold a queen or king bed, the family suites with the two doubles do not have the special beds. When I mentioned this to the desk clerk upon check out, she mentioned that the the
Manager Response: Greetings Allison R,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we continually exceed your expectations.   As for the sleep number beds, our front desk agent was correct, we have phased them out and I hope that upon your next stay with us that you will find the new beds to be more to your liking.  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon and we do greatly appreciate your loyalty to us.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: This hotel is located on Beach Blvd. just down the street of Knott's Berry Farm.  Before it became a Radisson Suites, it was an Embassy Suites.  All hotel rooms have a livingroom and separate sleeping quarters.  There is a nice microwave and fridge in the livingroom area, but the furniture (couch and chairs) have seen better days.  The beds were clean and comfortable.  The landscaping is very lush and pretty.  My kids enjoyed the nice pool, although it did get very crowded at times.  The free breakfast was pretty good with some hot options such as eggs and bacon made to order. We took the shuttle bus to Disneyland one day, but I wouldn't recommend it.  The shuttle was very late picking us up for return to the hotel and we were stuck waiting in the hot sun until he arrived. Very
Manager Response: Hello SCaligrl_12,  Thank you very much for your kind review of Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to inform fellow travelers about your experience. I am so pleased that you found the service, amenities, and complimentary breakfast to your liking. We look forward to your return.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: It worked, but we'd choose someplace else next time
Summary: We stayed here because we were able to book two rooms for free for the week with points.  It is obvious this was probably a great hotel in the 80s.  The hotel was very dated, and not particularly clean.  There were lots of smokers, and although smoking is not allowed inside the outdoor corridors mean you have to walk past smokers.  There are full ashtrays at every elevator opening... and lots of smokers hanging out near the entrance to the restaurant.  We didn't use the pool, but it did look clean and well maintained.  The rooms were okay and passably clean.  The carpets certainly need to be cleaned, and there need to be updates to the furniture.  We had two rooms and in both the tables were damaged and warped.  The sofas were threadbare and had strings hanging off of them.
Manager Response: Dear Oregonfamilytravel,  We are sorry to hear that we were not able to provide you with the quality of services our hotel prides itself on. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customers experience.   I have addressed these issues you mentioned with our housekeeping and kitchen managers and these concerns will be taken care of. Thank you again for your feedback as this is the only way we can insure our customer service levels are where they should be. We do hope you will consider staying with us again.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: First I feel the need to state that this is an older property; if you are looking for new or completely updated this will not be the place for you to stay.  However, this hotel is pretty well maintained and I would say that some upgrades have been made to the bathrooms and room decor fairly recently.  The pool is very clean, with plenty of seating around the pool and pool towels are plentiful; at 10 pm sharp every night a security guard closes the pool.  The grounds are nice with lots of plants and trees but could be a little cleaner.  We were able to check in a little earlier than the 3 pm check in time.  Carpet in our rooms was not spotless but not filthy, either.  Bathroom apeared to be clean, no issues there.  Kitchen area was clean as well. Housekeeping could use a little
Manager Response: Hello Lovecali,  It was an honor having you as a guest of Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. Thank you for your positive review and for taking the time to let fellow travelers know of the hotel service as well as the various accommodations and amenities offered.  I am pleased to learn that your overall experience was such a positive one. We do pride ourselves on our beautiful hotel grounds and glad to hear you really enjoyed them. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights with my daugher who's visting from Alaska with her two children 5 & 6  years old.    We stayied in the suite which was nice. It had a sofa sleepe which my daughter said  was  horribly unfomfortable, since her 6 year old took over the bed in the other room she slept on that with her 5 year old.   Our bed was supposed to be a sleep number bed and it was not working properly apparently.  After we got back at 1130pm who wanted to change rooms with 2 tired little ones?   We had one night left and rushed off to Disneyland for day 2, our fault we forgot to mention the horrible beds. We slept in the bed again and was just awful.   When we checked out I told the clerk that bed did not adjust at all, she said it was an air bed and it must have been broken. She
Manager Response: Dear Summervilla157,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  I was sorry to read that we failed to meet your expectations in regards to the sleep number and sofa beds. Please accept my apologies for your disappointment in the quality of the sleep number and sofa bed sleeper.   I am happy to announce that we have been replacing the sleep number beds with regular mattresses as we have discovered that the sleep number beds were not designed with hotels in mind in regards to the quantity of use by hotel guests.  We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to inform fellow travelers about your experience. I am pleased that you found the suite and complimentary breakfast to your liking.  If your travels do bring you to the Buena Park again, please contact me directly via e-mail to make your reservations and I will be more then happy to extend a greatly discounted rate to you.     Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing dennis@radissonsuitesbp.com

Summary Heading: A pleasant surprise for Disneyland visit!
Summary: This hotel is down the street from Knott's Berry Farm and a short drive to Disneyland. For the very reasonable price, you get a lot for your money.  The spacious suite rooms have a living room area and bedroom and two tvs so it is great for a family with teens.  The property is a pretty southwestern theme.  The complimentary breakfast is very good, particularly the omelets!
Manager Response: Dear Jenpin,  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! We realize you have a choice of hotels when visiting the Buena Park area, and appreciate that you choose the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  Warmest Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We (Family: 2 grown ups- 2 kids) stayed here for 14 nights pre-paid via our travel agency in Norway and I must say it was one of the most dissapointing stays I have had so far. I had really expected a little more form a Radisson Hotel.   After travelling for approx. 22 hours we finally arrived totally exhausted at the front desk and where greeted by the clerk who - uppon seeing our reservation stated: "hmmm...there seems to be a problem with your booking...I will have to call the manager."  He then proceeded to call the manager on the phone and said something in the form of "Hi it's XX, the people who had booked for 14 nights .... they actually came - and are standing here now. Which room should we give them?" ..... Not exactly the best first impression!  We did get a room
Manager Response: Dear Vespadirk, Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at the Radisson Suites Buena Park.  I'm very sorry that your stay was not up to your expectations, especially your interactions with our Staff and cleanliness of your guest suite.  We take our guest's responses very seriously and will immediately address each aspect of your concerns.   We pride ourselves in providing the best service and accommodations in Buena Park and our TripAdvisor ranking is a reflection of that.  Your feedback is appreciated and will use them to help improve the quality of our service and operations.   Sincerely, Jamie Chang Director of Operations

Summary: Stayed here 10 days while on our annual SoCal trip. We usually stay on Disney property, so we had no idea what to expect. Very clean, well maintained oasis - reminiscent of hotels in Central America. Good free full breakfast each morning. Love the omelets.(the staff does need to work on maintaining order in the dining room-it was like eating in a poorly managed kindergarten)  The hotel housekeeping staff are top notch - and we were very impressed by the hard-working maintenance department. We would most definitely stay here again. Our only big issues were the lack of respect that the other guests had for others. Kids running on the walkways until after midnight, yelling and howling, jumping on furniture in the rooms - it was really bad one night - the front desk tried to tell us
Manager Response: Hi Loriel13,  We are very excited to hear that you enjoyed our hotel during your annual So Cal vacation (wow, I do wish I could travel for 10 days!!!) ! Thank you for your detailed, compliments and for sharing your experience with other travelers.   I am very sorry to hear that you did have some negative experiences during your stay with us. We do value the comments and feedback of all of our guests to ensure we can make The Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park the best place to stay.  I have noted your comments and these matters will be discussed and addressed with all of our management team! We take pride in our hotel, customer service, and attention to details to ensure our guest have the best experience here, so again your comments will be addressed.   I do hope that on your next visit to the So Cal area, that you will give us another chance to prove that we can do better.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We have stayed many times at the Radisson Suites Hotel in Buena Park and I would return again.  It's an especially good deal when you have several people in the room.  Because you can put two people in the living room on the sofa bed and two in the bedroom, it's much more comfortable and private than a regular hotel room. Add to that the microwave, refrigerator, table large enough to seat 4 people for a meal, and it's a great hotel rooom for a week or more! There is also a pool, jacuzzi, exercise room, and laundry room.  The exercise room used to be very hot and stuffy, but they have air conditioning now and have improved the look of the room.  Free breakfast and free parking too!
Manager Response: Hi Kay012.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! We realize you have a choice of hotels when visiting the Buena Park area, and appreciate that you have chosen the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park to host your family during your trips to the Anaheim/Buena Park and Orange County.  Again, thank you for your patronage. We look forward to the next opportunity of delivering a memorable experience for you and your family. Thank you for your review and we hope you will be back to visit again soon.  Warmest Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Great hotel - free parking, cooked to order breakfast, walk to Knotts
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in July.  We got a great deal on the hotel and loved every minute of it.  The cooked to order breakfast was wonderful.  We took the shuttle bus to Knotts in the morning and then walked back to the hotel each evening.  It is a very short walk from the hotel to Knotts.  The pool is great and there are plenty of towels.  The hotel is also right next to Medieval Times (short walk).  The beds were very comfortable and the suite was nice size.  If you are staying in Buena Park, put this hotel at the top of your list!
Manager Response: Hi Mlo4,  Thank you for choosing the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park! We are so pleased that you enjoyed not only our amenities (glad that you enjoyed the pool), but also our convenient location to nearby attractions and restaurants.   Another great feature of the free shuttle (aside from saving parking $) - avoiding the long, long lines at the parking structure and the tram to actually get into the park! We love making your vacations enjoyable, affordable and easy. Looking forward to your next visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area and I do hope that you choose to let us be your host again.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: This is a fantastic hotel. It is clean and has an awesome continental breakfast.  Pool area is very nice.  The hotel has a Mexico all inclusive feel.  Managers special from 5:30-7:30 Mondays thru Thursdays are great - complementary drinks and appetizers.
Manager Response: Hello Ktpunton,  I would like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We are very happy to hear that you really enjoyed your stay with us.   We are very proud of our hotel grounds (they always remind me of my vacations to resorts in Mexico and the Dominican Republic) and we take great pride in keeping them looking their best. I am glad that you also enjoyed the full cook to order breakfast buffet. We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next stay in Buena Park.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Hotel is not extravagant but it is a great place to stay if you are planning to see Disneyland (about 10 minutes away) or Knotts (down the road).  Parking was free and around the hotel so it was easy to get to our room.  Check in staff was friendly and helpful.  Free breakfast was just right with cook to order eggs, bacon & sausage, and the usual offerings.  We have stayed at a few places closer to Disneyland but seems to me that when you stay a little farther away, you can get a much better deal (hotel cost, free parking/breakfast, etc.). We would not hesitate to stay at the Raddisson Buena Park again.
Manager Response: Greetings Melissa M.:  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we continually exceed your expectations. As you stated, we are indeed a great alternative to staying at hotels in the Anaheim area.   Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Please contact us directly for any of your future reservation needs as we do greatly appreciate your loyalty to us.  Best Regards, Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel to stay at if you visit attractions nearby
Summary: We stayed here a few months back when we visited Medieval Times.  We knew we'd have a few cocktails at the show so we decided to stay the night somewhere in the area.  Our friend that we went with recommended we stay here and I am glad we did.  We walked only 2 blocks from the hotel to the show, had a great time at the show, then walked back to the hotel.    The room was very nice and spacious.  We fit 3 adults and 2 small kids comfortably in the suite.  There was a living room with a pull out sofa, a bar/sink area, table and TV, then there was a separate room with two double beds and another TV.  I slept great!   Free breakfast in the morning was AMAZING! Best free breakfast I have ever had at a hotel.  There was an omelette staticn, as well as a buffet area with fruit, hash
Manager Response: Hi Emmam731,  Thank you very much for your recommendation of our hotel to other travelers. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great stay! Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.   Also, as a military veteran myself (proudly served in the U.S. Army 84-87) I am very partial to my fellow military brothers and sisters and if you visit the MWR office at any of the Navy bases in San Diego, you will find a flyer for a very special rate at my hotel for active duty, military retirees and veterans of the armed forces (please let your military firends know). If you can't find the flyer, please contact me (dennis@radissonsuitesbp.com) and I can forward one to you. A active or retiree ID or DD214 will need to be presented at check in in order to obain the discount.  I appreciate your excellent ratings and compliments on our customer service. It truly is our pleasure to assist our guests in any way we can. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Buena Park.   Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: I booked this hotel through Hotwire and it was great!  The rooms are all two rooms, and not tiny rooms either. The beds regular beds were perfect. The breakfast was hot and cooked to order. The pool is beautiful.  There is a shuttle to and from Disneyland.  We already booked this hotel for our October trip and booked a room for my parents as well.  I look forward to going back!
Manager Response: Hi Jends123,  Thank you for writing your review on your recent stay with us at our Buena Park hotel. I appreciate your comments about our property which helps other travelers when deciding on  hotel accomadations when visiting the Anaheim/Buena Park area.   I am glad you enjoyed our roomy suites, complimentary roundtrip shuttle service to Disneyland and our complimentary cook to order breakfast buffet. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back on your next visit in October to Buena Park and our hotel.   Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We stayed for a week at this hotel and it had been a wonderful experience.  Free breakfast included is definitely a bonus.  Kris at the front desk has been exceptional with all our needs.  Unfortunately the guests above our room weren't very considerate and and banging on the floor during the night.  Get a upper level room if you can.
Manager Response: Hi 1015286969,  Thank you for staying with us and giving us your feedback by completing the review on our property. We apologize for and appreciate your patience and understanding regarding the inconvenience of not so quiet neighboring guests.   We hope that all that you enjoyed with us, including our friendly and helpful customer service, will bring you back to our Buena Park hotel in the future. I wil be sure to let Kris and his manager know that you appreciate his help.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Stayed here three days in June with my two daughters 15 and 9 year old. Nice hotel very close to Knott's Berry Farm, an easy walk 7 - 10 minutes depending on traffic lights. About a 15 minutes car ride to Disneyland depending on traffic. Hotel provides breakfast buffet style scrambled eggs, waffles, pancakes, fruit, muffins, milk, juice etc. For a few extra dollars tip the guys in the back sun room and they will make you a omelette of your choice. Pool area was  nice however very overrun with kids of all ages. My girls loved it but I choose to sit out on the side rather than get kicked in the the head by kids jumping in off the sides of the pool. No lifeguard on duty to keep kids in line too bad since most of the parents were too tuned out to bother watching their children. Best
Manager Response: Hi Mimic11,  Thank you for choosing the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park! We are so pleased that you enjoyed not only our amenities, but also convenient location to the nearby attractions.   I am not sure if you took advantage of it, but we do offer a free shuttle service to the Disneyland Resort, which aside from saving parking fee's, you can also avoid the long, long lines at the parking structure and the tram to actually get into the park!   We love making your vacations enjoyable, affordable and easy. Looking forward to your next visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We ended up in this hotel by chance. We were supposed to be driving to Vegas but decided to just stay in LA and relax before the flight home.  I booked last minute through a third party site and got a fantastic rate. We arrived earlier than normal check in, but our room was ready and we also got an upgraded room, which is unheard of when booking through 3rd party sites. We were on the top floor in the back corner of the hotel so free from traffic noise.  There are multiple lifts all over the hotel to assist to get around, but first thing in the morning it can be quite slow to get anywhere as the cleaning staff use them to get around also.  The room was fantastic and well cleaned; we had lounge area with a sofa bed, dining room and kitchen area and then a separate bedroom with
Manager Response: Greetings Canberramujer,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we continually exceed your expectations.   I noted the issues that you weren't pleased with (darn sleep number beds which we will be replacing soon) and I do apologize on behalf of the housekeepers that were being rude to you, that is totally unexcusable and thank you for brining it up to the management team.  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Please contact us directly for any of your future reservation needs as we do greatly appreciate your loyalty to us.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We stayed at the Radisson for eight nights in May and loved it!  The grounds and surroundings were gorgeous, the rooms were fantastic for the price, and the staff were very friendly and helpful.  Perfect walking distance to shopping mall and restaurants, and a hop skip and a jump from Disneyland.  The free buffet breakfast wasn't amazing but still a nice start to the day!  We would absolutely stay again if we should return to the states!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Radisson for two nights during our USA holiday.  We were booked here for three nights, however found out at check-in that we were unable to get a late check-out (even if we paid for it).  This meant that we had to leave a day early as we have a baby and needed somewhere for her to sleep before our late flight.   When I booked the room in October 2011 I requested a crib for our daughter, on arrival in our room the crib was not there.  I rang the front desk to ask where the crib was and they said they had to ‚Äúfind one‚Äù.  This took nearly an hour and when it was finally delivered by a very grumpy man it was in terrible condition with a ripped mattress and wheels that were nearly falling off!  Every time our daughter moved in the crib it would rock and squeak and
Manager Response: Hi TimJewel,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review concerning your recent stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  I was sorry to read that we failed to meet your expectations in several areas.   On one note, I would like to address the issue that you had with the crib. I do apologize about a crib not being placed in your room per your request when you made your reservation, however, due to the limited number of cribs that we have on property, we do not guarantee cribs to our guests since our other guests might be using them and leaving us without any cribs in inventory.   Please accept my apologies for your disappointment in the quality of our guest rooms and the noise level.   Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: If you're looking to take in the tourist attractions in OC, this place works great as a home base.  We recently spent 3 nights there to attend a special show in LA and to get in a quick trip to Disneyland and the new Cars Land attractions at California Adventure. Having been to the Disneyland resort area several times, we appreciated NOT staying in the tourist slum surrounding it.  With its shuttle service, the Radisson Buena Park is a fantastic alternative. A real bonus- this hotel is so close to Knott's Berry Farm and Soak City, we ended up walking there more than once, mainly to enjoy the shops and the famous Chicken Dinner restaurant.  A few steps away is the Pirate Adventure Dinner Show place as well as Medieval Times.  The room set up- perfect. Our teenage son claimed the
Manager Response: Hi SanyaPortland_OR,  I would like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We are very happy to hear that you really enjoyed your stay with us.   We are very proud of our hotel grounds and take great pride in keeping them looking their best (one of the features that I personally love about our hotel).  I am glad to hear that you took advantage of some fo the amenities that our hotel offers and that you truly enjoyed our location.   We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next visit to Buena Park and I do apologize that we didn't meet your expectations for breakfast.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Stayed here with my mother and sister in February. We had a nice stay and really only found a few flaws with the hotel. Really the biggest one is the sleep number beds. Everywhere I have ever stayed that had these beds has been the same, these beds suck! They are in fact sleep-able but just barely.  There were a couple of people using the hotel to have parties. It was only noisy until about 10.   Every member of the staff was super nice. Anything we requested was brought up within minutes. The breakfast was chaotic one day but otherwise it was a great added value. We were happy to have that everyday and it saved us a ton. We ate at the indian restaurant next door one night and it was pretty tasty. The maid service was really good every day. Overall this is a great budget saving
Manager Response: Greetings Midwest Escapee,   I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we continually exceed your expectations.   I completely understand about the sleep number beds and I do apologize that they did not meet your expectations. I can't wait for us to get rid of them.   Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon. As the old saying goes, better late then never!!! Summary: Very nice hotel located near Knotts Berry Farm.  Restuarants and Freeway nearby.  Plenty of parking.  The hotel layout is very nice with a well-tended courtyard/pool area in the center of the hotel.  We had 2 rooms on the front side of the building, over the store/lobby area.  I was afraid it might be loud since we were near the road, but we did not have any noise issues from road.  Occasionally you would hear someone going by the room door as they are french doors with glass, but it was not disruptive.     Our rooms were large with couch and table area, tv and mini-bar in this same room.  Large bathroom, king bed with tv in separate room.  Very clean.  Sleep number bed was comfortable, and they had plenty of pillows!   Only ate breakfast one day, but it seemed adequate with
Manager Response: Hello Twowisekids,  Thank you for writing your review on your recent stay with us at our Buena Park hotel. Summary: Less expensive than hotels on Disneyland strip, cleaner and better service. Free shuttle, free breakfast and good service. Would definitely stay again.

I agree with other reviews that the carpets need replacing and the breakfast being chaotic. Would not pick this hotel again.

Summary: We stayed here for the second time back in December.  Our room was actually only 4 doors down from our previous room. Everything was clean and in good working condition. The sleep number bed in this room worked better than the last but that may be because we knew how to work it this time. Everyone was very friendly and very helpful.  We stayed near the laundry area and office but it was not noisy by any means.  Our only complaint this time was that there was an event (wedding reception or reunion) happening in their room above the restaurant on Saturday night. So there were several kids running around screaming until past 11pm. Not sure if this was really the hotels fault or not though.  Other than that we had another excellent stay at this property and will definitely stay here
Manager Response: Hello Bill M,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. Summary Heading: Relaxing place away from Disneyland Traffic
Summary: Upon arriving the building itself from the outside looks a little on the older side and I did not know what to expect. As we entered the lobby I was pleasantly surprised by the  old spanish home architecture. The lush green landscaping was true to the online photos. It was a change from the usual places we stay on Harbor Blvd where most likely there will be a traffic jam of Disneyland visitors. The room was not as large as some 1 bedrooms I have stayed in but it met our needs. The furniture was nothing extraordinary but it did its job. A sleeper sofa with a table and chairs and a sink in the living area was a room of its own for my children. The sink area doubled as a vanity. A good room, free breakfast and a free shuttle to and from Disneyland pretty much sums up why we made
Manager Response: Hello Ronniegirl55,  We are pleased that you enjoyed our old spanish home architecture, the lush green landscaping that are true to our online photos, your guest suite, free cook to order breakfast buffet and complimentary shuttle to and from Disneyland, we are concerned about some of the service issues you experienced during your stay.   You traveled a long way to relax and enjoy a very special occasion that was your birthday. We sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations‚Ä¶.. which is certainly our goal. Summary Heading: Good for family a bit old furniture and room
Summary: We stayed one night on our way to visit LA. The hotel is very close to Knott Berry Farm park. Close to a mall and other food places. Room is ok. The sleep number device is broken but I do not use it any way. Furniture and carpet are old, compared with other Radissons I stayed. The free breakfast is good but too many people during weekend. The hotel feels like an extended stay place with centered garden and pool. Overall it is ok but not anything fancy. I used Carlson points to stay so I am not sure if the value of the hotel is good or not with running price.
Manager Response: Hello SJMtravel,  Thank you for staying with us and giving us your feedback by completing the review on our property. We apologize for failing to exceed your expectations regarding our furniture, carpet and number bed.   We hope that whatever you did enjoy about your stay with us, will bring you back to our Buena Park hotel in the future. Thank you for being a Club Carlson Rewards member.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Breakfast Is FREE!!! What Do You Expect From It ????
Summary: Breakfast was chaotic! Especially at the "Distribution Station" for fried eggs, sausages and bacon! Each guest is entitled only 2 pieces of bacon and 2 pieces of small-fingered-sized sauages. You want more, give the "cook-in-charge" a tip and you will get more and definitely an "SUNNY egg"! Otherwise prepare to wait for at least 20minutes to get the LIMITED amount of bacon and sauages in a plate which will be thrown onto the counter without any sunny smile. The breakfast is FREE, maybe thats the reason...???
Manager Response: Hello GK,  I am very sorry to hear that your stay was not so pleasant this past time at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park! We do value the comments and feedback of all of our guests to ensure we can make The Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park the best place to stay.   We have noted your comments about our complimentary breakfast buffet and I am happy to announce that all breakfast meats are now available on the main buffet line which means that you no longer have to settle for the cook giving you only two peices of bacon or sausages. As for the length of time it took for your cook to order eggs/omelettes, it all depends on how busy the order line is as it can indeed take a little longer to cook your eggs when guest occupancy is high. The buffet breakfast is free because we want to give you a better value for your hard earned dollar.  Here is a little hint to help make the time go by just a little faster while you are waiting for your cook to order eggs. Put your egg order in first before you go to the buffet line, this which will help keep you busy and kill a little time until your eggs are ready.      We realize you have a choice of hotels when visiting the Buena Park area, and appreciate that you choose the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  Warm regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay with small kids!!
Summary: One of the best hotels I've ever stayed in!  fantastic  free buffet breakfast every morning!  Beautiful courtyard and pool!The only thing i think they can improve on is the furniture in the sitting area in the rooms, they were just a bit outdated.  Other than that, everything was wonderful!

Summary: We (2 adults) stayed here at the end of January for some family business. I had stayed here once before a few months ago and was really impressed with the comfort for the price.  It is definitely not a luxury hotel, however, the staff is VERY friendly and helpful, the beds are comfortable (once you figure out the "sleep number" that's best), and the bedroom and sitting areas are very spacious.  The bathroom is a little small and the room had a slight "musty" smell.  The free breakfast was good, but the floor was very sticky.  We only ate there twice. Make sure to ask for a room in the back building where it is very quiet.  We had no real issues.  It is very close to the 91 Freeway and the 22 Freeway.  Real close to Knott's and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Luvsmickey,  We appreciate you making us your choice in Buena Park accommodations. Thank you for your great comments, recommendation of our property and sharing your tips with other travelers.  We hope that your travels bring you back to the Buena Park to stay with us again soon! Summary: We (2 adults, 1 teenager) stayed at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park in January 2012, and we were pleasantly surprised. Our suite (1 bedroom with two queen beds) was really large, with sizeable sitting area and mini-kitchenette at the front with a solid door through to the bedroom which meant the two areas could be separated without a noise problem. There's a TV in the bedroom and the sitting room so you don't have to make a difficult choice. Decor is low-key and nice, everything was clean and the beds very comfortable. Staff are helpful and friendly.  It's a short walk to Knots Berry Farm, which was great fun - nice weather and no crowds this time year (so you can go 'round again on your favourite rides), and there's a really nice Korean restaurant on the opposite side of

Summary: Friendly staff and great location for Knott's Berry Farms. The rooms have a separate bedroom and sitting area, bar section with a microwave and coffee making facilities. Breakfast is included, delicious, made to order eggs and plenty of other choices. Free parking. Pool and heated spa.

Summary Heading: Not sure I would stay again, learned a few things though.
Summary: Let me mention the good things: great location to knotts; as a family of four we loved the two room suite which allowed us to put the kids to bed but stay up to watch tv til we were ready to sleep.    The negatives: the pool is open until 10pm!  And we had a room on the third floor overlooking the Pool.  The doors to every room are French doors that do not have any sound insulation.  The walls don't seem to have any insulation either.  It seemed like we could hear every footstep in the room above us.  The beds in the bedroom were very comfy but the pull out couch in the living room is a back breaker.  Our plan to put the kids in each of the beds in the bedroom and us sleep on the pullout was foiled.  Night two my husband decided it was more comfortable to sleep on the removable

Summary: It seems like this is an old hotel. The lobby was not inticing. There is a gift shop inside. There are many restaurants close by and the hotel is right next to Medieval Times dinner show. The parking is free. The front desk was welcoming and all the staff are friendly and helpful. The room is big and there is a mini-refrigerator and microwave oven which is a plus for our child's milk. We don't have to bring in a portable cooler. There are two sleep number double beds that we played with. Some roller coasters from Knotts can be seen from our room. The proximity of the hotel and Knotts is about 10 minutes by foot. Because it's so close by we didn't utilize their shuttle service. Then came Sunday morning, 9 a.m. We went to the restaurant to have breakfast and it was a total chaos.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here four nights and thought it was great.  My husband and I had 3 kids ages 10, 4 & 3.  We were so happy at how big the room was & the fact that there were 2 tvs.  It gave us the ability to spread out and we didn't have the "cooped up" feeling.  The kids enjoyed the pool (which is in the courtyard and could be seen from our front door) and there were only a few other kids or adults at any given time.  We had a corner room and really could not hear much noise from outside or the neighboring rooms.   We did stay in Jan, so it is the off season and Knott's was absolutely dead, which we thought was great because we didn't have to stand in any lines and the kids got to ride to their hearts content.  The walk to Knott's was less than 10 minutes, I would say closer to 5.  I

The property is well looked after and is set around a centre tropical pool area.  I asked for a high floor away from the roadside and got exactly that.  However I also asked for a non-smoking room, which I received although it stunk of smoke.  I hope the previous guest was fined!  It was however a very quiet, spacious room which was very well equipped.  Did not experience any problems with the sleep number beds which other guests mentioned.  The complimentary breakfast is good too.  Cereal, fruit, toast, and hot items including egg, potatoes and an option to have either an omelette of fried eggs where you can

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights via a tour group. We didn't have any high expectations of the hotel since it was booked by the tour we joined. But this ended up being one of the best hotels that I have ever stayed in. Our room was located on the 3rd floor facing the pool. We didn't have much noise issues despite facing the pool with some kids playing around till 10pm. We could hear the fountain in our room as well. But as others have mentioned, the living room and bedroom are completely separated. So the noise coming from the pool and the fountain could easily be screened out if you close the door between the living room and bedroom.  The unit was larger than expected with plenty of room to put our luggages. Our unit has 2 double beds, which were amazingly comfortable. We

They have a Managers Reception in the evenings during the week and a free large buffet breakfast in the morning.  We were looking forward to trying out their Sleep Number Bed, but unfortunately our bed must not have been working properly and we had a horrible night sleep.  We set the bed to what we thought was a  comfortable number but it wasn't long before the bed "deflated" with the mattress becoming very lumpy and uncomfortable.  My husband

Summary: Sadly, we only stayed one night here.  If we knew it was so great, we would have stayed longer.  We chose the hotel because of proximity to Knotts Berry Farm which was literally a 10 minute walk up the road, but they provide a courtesy bus to drop you off and pick you up again.  The rooms were huge, clean and considerably quiet.  We arrived late and opted to get room service (holding our breath for cost/quality).  We were blown away by the quality, size and cost.  This would have been nearly the best meal we had eaten after 8 days in LA/Vegas. The staff were very helpful all round especially with organising transfers back to LA/Hollywood on a shuttle.  The breakfast provided was great - full cooked buffet breakfast along with a chef making eggs/omeletes to order.  As said, wish
Manager Response: Dear Speegal,  We are ecstatic to hear that you enjoyed your night with us! Summary Heading: This is really a great hotel
Summary: We stayed at the Radisson Buena Park in early December. It was absolutely wonderful. The room was clean and comfortable. It had a microwave, sink in the living room, 2 TV's and a fridge with a small freezer which came in handy for ice cream. The free breakfast was terrific - buffet and made to order omelets and eggs. The breakfast alone saved me about $20-30 a day. They also have free drinks (beer, wine and hard liquor)  and snacks on M-Th 5:30-7:30. The shuttle to Disneyland was very convenient and they adjust the schedule to the events at the park. The staff was great at every level - the customer service really stood out. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello 510Jay,  We appreciate you making us your choice in Buena Park accommodations while visiting the Orange County area. Thank you for your comments, the recommendation of our property and sharing your tips with other travelers (great advice on putting your omelette or cook to order egg order in first). We do hope that your travels bring you back to Buena Park and that you will stay  with us again.  Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales and Marketing

Summary: I was impressed at quality if this hotel/suites. Our room had a living room area as well as a bedroom and the quality of the furnishing were top notch. The location is idea being so close to Knotts Berry Farm and other entertainment attractions and it is a short drive to Disneyland as well. The free breakfast was great as you could get freshly made omelets made to order and I had some of the best bacon here also. My friends from Chicago and Kentucky were equally impress at the quality of this hotel. The hotel staff was great and very helpful during my stay. I hope to get back here soon!
Manager Response: Greetings Ochump,  Thank you for staying with us. We are very pleased that you enjoyed our accommodations, amenities and location. Thank you for your review and we hope you will be back to visit again soon.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales and Marketing

Summary: We stayed here from Nov 27-Dec 3. We were a family of 3 adults and 2 children and will definitely come back to this hotel for every Disneyland trip! It was great to have a separate living room with a wet bar, microwave, fridge, table & chairs, and a sofa. Especially with kids! The sleep number beds were very comfortable and it was nice to have a tv in each room so that we didn't have to watch what the kids were watching. The complimentary breakfast each morning was a real money saver for us as we were so full once we got to Disney that we ate less there. They had a buffet set up which they alternated every day and you could also go into the next room and have an omelet made to your liking (which were really good by the way). They also had a great selection of drinks to choose

Summary: I felt really spoiled when I stayed at this hotel. I was traveling with a group of friends down to San Diego and we stayed overnight in this Radisson because of the nearby attractions (the hotel is right next to Medieval Times - what a great experience). When we got into our room, we were immediately impressed by the flat-screen TV in the spacious living room area which featured two couches. We made our way into the bedroom to find another flat-screen TV and two Sleep Number beds. This was my first and only time ever sleeping on one of these beds, and I am a convert. The hotel has a beautiful pool with tropical palm trees that make for a nice view from the room. Another nice feature of the room is when my traveling companions were ready for bed, they could close the bedroom door

Summary: Just returned from my 4 night stay at the Radisson Suites. The room was average. It was nice to have a small refrigerator and coffee maker in the room. The suite allowed our adult son to sleep on the sofa sleeper. The sleeping conditions were adequate. They had nice pillows and quilts. We asked for a quiet room away from the elevators and the staff accommodated us with a upper floor room in the back. The bathroom was clean.  We used the hot tub and it was very nice. The free breakfast was a blessing. The food was great with eggs cooked the way you wanted. Sausage and bacon also available. Plus cereals,  pancakes, fruit, fried potatoes and juices serves buffet style. I would go back with average expectations. The location and price were what helped make the Radisson our Hotel

The room was dingy and never really seemed to warm up. Please do not plan to have your kids sleep on a pullout in this hotel. It's torture.  My boys, who are usually oblivious to the softness of a bed, came in to our room and said they couldn't sleep because the bed was too 'springy'. Let me assure you that we will use your feedback to help us to improve the restaurant and hope that on your next visit to Buena Park, you will give us another chance to prove that we can do better.  Thank you for recommending our hotel as a good family base when visiting Disneyland but we do want our guests to expect more from us and we do strive to meet all expectations.   Again, thank you for your review and we will do better in our restaurant and hotel.  Sincerely,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales

Summary: Our family of four stayed for 8 nights in early August 2011.  It was great! We checked in at 10:30pm and were worried that we weren't going to get a smoke-free room, but we were lucky our request was granted!  Fast check-in, friendly staff, clean and spacious room!    Our suite had double beds, mini fridge/freezer, microwave, coffee maker, sofa sleeper, 2 flat screen tvs, hair dryer, and a safe.  Everything in our suite was great.  The only thing that we felt was missing were towel hooks in the bathroom.  There weren't any.  We had to hang our towels from the vanity mirror near the door.    Free breakfast was great.  The restaurant staff was wonderful and we left a tip each day.  We didn't get to go to the free happy hour in the evenings nor did we get a chance to use the pool
Manager Response: Dear Manafan,  Thank you for choosing the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park to be a part of your family  vacation to Buena Park, California. We thank you very much for such flattering compliments on our accommodations, customer service and location.   Next time please do take a little time out to enjoy our managers reception (happy hour), the pool and jacuzzi but since it seems that you and your family were busy with excursions to Disneyland, Soak City, San Diego Zoo, Newport Beach and the Balboa Pier, I can understand your not having the time to do so.   I will let my GM know about the towel hook problem and maybe we can have those added to the bathrooms.   It was our sincere pleasure to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us during your vacation. Again, thank you for your patronage as we know that you had plenty of hotel choices in Buena Park that you could have chosen and you selected us. We look forward to the next opportunity of delivering a memorable experience for you and your family.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales

Summary: Unfourtionally we had a room at the end of the open hall and facing the street. Room was okay except the bathroom. SO small. No vanity to put your stuff. Breakfast was good, pool area is super and the location to all sorts of stuff was terrific. suppose to have a sleep number bed...there was no control in the room for the bed. One side super hard, other...well it was soft.
Manager Response: Hi Saltriverrafter,  Though we are pleased that you enjoyed the pool, your guest room and breakfast, we would like to apologize for the size of the bathroom, the lack of a vanity on which to place your belongings and the missing remote for yoru sleep number bed. I do hope that you notified the front desk regarding the missing remote so we could replace it and if not, please feel free to contact me directly with your room number so I can make sure that it has been replaced.   You traveled a long way to relax and enjoyed your vacation. I again sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations in regards to your bathroom and sleep number bed‚Ä¶.. which is certainly our goal. Let us assure you that we will use your feedback to help us to improve and hope that on your next visit, you will give us another chance to prove that we can do better.  Thank you for your review and in sharing your stay here with us while visiting Buena Park.   Warm regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We were visiting a college with our son and decided to stay overnight last minute.  We made a reservation through Hotwire and discovered that the hotel given to us was the Radisson Suites Hotel in Buena Park.  We were pleasantly surprise upon check in...the lobby was airy, mediterranean style with high ceiling. Our suite was very clean, modern and spacious (plenty of room!)...nice ammenities.  Beds were comfortable as well. The added surprise was the delicious hot breakfast served in the morning.  Cooked to order breakfast...nice touch.  We took our breakfast outside and sat near the tropical pool.  The sun was shining, the pool sparkled blue, the eggs were freshly cooked with side of bacon and the cup of coffee was hot...Ahh, what a great way to start the day!  We just found
Manager Response: Dear Brisfam,  We're so happy to hear that everything was perfect for you and your family during your recent stay with us!  Congratulations to you and your son on being accepted by his college, I know that you are very proud of him.   We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary cook to order full American breakfast buffet,  that you enjoyed your breakfast by the pool and that the weather cooperated.     Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for giving us your valued feedback. We are honored to be your hotel choice in Buena Park and are delighted that you will definitely be back to stay with us again!  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales

Summary: Checkin was quick and smooth. The hotel was excellent, very good for families. Nice rooms and nice beds, impressed with the seperate room for dining and sleeping and the flat screens in both.  Staff did a great job with cleaning the rooms if u wanted them to. Close to knotts berry farm (litterally just a walk down the road) and frequent shuttles to disney land. Would be good to have a couple more shuttle times to knotts berry and the mall (for those who have young ones as it seems a bit far for them).  Really enjoyed the complimentary daily buffet breakfast and complimentary snacks too! that was a bonus, especially for the kids. The staff were friendly and worked very hard thru the busy times...thumbs up for them as it got real busy in the restaurant area. One thing id probably
Manager Response: Hello Tino3,  We appreciate you making us your choice in Buena Park accommodations while visiting the U.S. Thank you for your great comments, recommendation of our property and sharing your tips with other travelers. We hope that your travels bring you back to the U.S. to stay with us again soon!  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We got a suite and our son slept in the front room on the sleeper sofa.  There was a door separating from there to the bedroom.  We had to share the bathroom, but otherwise there was privacy.  Room was clean, all amenities, Sleep Number Bed, helpful staff and great breakfast.  Pool was comfortably heated.  Recommend if you need quiet ask for the suites on the second level away from the street.  We were right off a busy street so there was some noise, but the hotel has good windows. We stayed overnight, they held our baggage the next day while we went to Disneyland in their free shuttle.   Walking distance of various restaurants and Knott's Berry Farm
Manager Response: Dear Lmcathy,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we met your expectations.   Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Please contact us directly for any of your future reservation needs as we do greatly appreciate your loyalty to us.  Best Regards, Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: It may be aged but VERY clean.
Summary: I stayed in room 216. It was nice. Very clean but dated. In the 1980's it must of been a premeir hotel. It's still looks like it. While I was there, they were repainting the doors & every morning there were people cleaning. Our maid was thoughtful enough to bring me extra coffee and bags for trash. Make sure to tip your maid, they appreciate the thoughtfulness. The pool was a bit of paradise and if you float to the middle and look up into the blue sky with palm trees all around you, for a moment it's the most pleasant part of my trip. The breakfast buffet is what it is FREE! And if you don't mind a crowd it's fine. Knots Berry Farm is across the steet & Disneyland is about 10 min away. LA/Hollywood is only a 20 mile drive away but with traffic it will take about an hour.  THE
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay 4 years ago and it was nice, thank goodness this time was  for only one night. If we had transporation and didn't have 12 pieces luggage and two kids, I would of check out immediately!!. Believe me this place is nasty, the room smells so bad smells like mold and musky, AC does not work, sad part the motel personal is aware of this. My kids wanted to sit on the room couch is was so dirty and ugly we had to put a blanket over it, the carpet don't even take your shoes off.  We paid 160.00 this room is not worth it. Please don't waste your money.

Let me assure you that we will use your feedback to help us to improve our suites and hope that on your next visit to Buena Park, you will give us another chance to prove that we can do better.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: This is our 2nd time staying at this property. The rooms are larger with the pull out sofa and separate bedroom. Breakfast is included and they will cook omelets/eggs to order. They have free shuttle to Knott's Berry Farm which can save you cost of parking and since it's only across the street we chose to walk back to the hotel for an afternoon rest. The staff was friendly and helpful. and also, not far from beaches, 13 miles to Huntington!
Manager Response: Kdee22,  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and that you decided to stay with us once again during your visit to Buena Park! We realize that you have a choice of hotels when visiting the Buena Park area, and appreciate that you once again choose the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your suite, the breakfast, the free shuttle to Knott's Berry Farm and were able to spend some time at our wonderful beaches.   From our staff, I want to say thank you for staying with us once again and please feel free to stay with us again next time you visit Buena Park.  Warm regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We stayed at the Radisson Suites for 13 days and really enjoyed staying there.  The staff are very friendly and will help you with anything you require.  The suite was very roomy, clean and modern. The beds were very comfy, could not complain at all.  Every morning we went to the restaurant and had the free breakfast which was very nice too.  A couple of times we had dinner, even though we were the only people eating there the staff very efficient preparing the meals. There is also a happy hour with free drinks and snacks - what more could you want.  Over all the hotel is a great place to stay and would recommend to anyone especially families.
Manager Response: Hi Swift22,  I would like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We are very happy to hear that you really enjoyed your stay with us. We are very proud of our suites and and take great pride in keeping them looking their best.   We are glad that you enjoyed both the complimentary cook to order breakfast and managers reception (happy hour) and are proud to provide such services to our guests. We want you to feel comfortable when you stay with us, even more so when you are away from home for 13 days.   I will share your comments with our staff, as we like to acknowledge them on a job well done. We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next stay in Buena Park.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We were coming to the LA area for the typical Disney, sightseeing adventure.  Let me start by saying we were not disappointed in this hotel at all!  The two room suites are great for familys, it is like getting two rooms for the price of one.  We stayed for 9 nights, so we had ample time to make a fair assessment of this hotel.  The room is as advertised.  Fridge, microwave, wet bar, two flat screen tv's and fold out sofa that my kids loved.  The free breakfast  is a full buffet with made to order eggs and omlets.  The staff in the dining area does an outstanding job of keeping up with the crowd that hits them at breakfast.  The managers reception and happy hour that they offer is also full of freebies, drinks and food.  As far as the pool area, the pool is heated which my
Manager Response: Hi Marksfamilyhouse,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we met and exceed your expectations.   Thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon. I can assure you that my General Manager will read your review as will all of our staff , their supervisors and please be aware that your kind words do mean alot to all of us here.   Please contact us directly for any of your future reservation needs as we do greatly appreciate your loyalty to us.  Best Regards, Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We decided to stay hear because of the easy access to Knotts Berry Farm, Disneyland, Medieval Times and Hollywood. The room was clean and spacious.Beds were comfortable; our room had a sleep number bed. The room included a microwave, fridge and coffee maker.  All were clean and in working order.  We were on the bottom floor which was a little noisy because of the pool, but nothing that we had to complain about. The pool was small so it always seemed to be crowded, so going to the pool or hot tub was something we could not do. But the Gym was empty so I was able to work out. There was lots of parking, so that is not a problem if you drive and parking was free anything free is always a plus. Breakfast is served every morning which includes some hot foods as well as cereal, fruit

We are so pleased that you enjoyed not only our amenities, but also our convenient location to nearby attractions.    A few great features of the free shuttle (aside from saving parking $) - avoiding the long, long lines at the parking structure and the tram to actually get into the park but that doesn't help if we let you down with a lack of shuttle runs to Knotts Berry Farm. I will address this concern with my General Manager and see if we could provide more frequent shuttle runs to Knott's !    Regarding your experience with the lack of staff at breakfast time,  I do apologize for this and we are working on trying to correct this issue. We love making your family vacation an enjoyable, affordable and easy one and we are looking forward to your next visit to the Buena Park area. Summary Heading: Great location. Would stay here again.
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  It was centrally located to everything we wanted to do.  The hotel is a little dated but very well kept and clean.  The breakfast was great in the morning with lots of selections.  The staff was very accomodating at the desk and in the restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Lovestotravel064,  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! We realize you have a choice of hotels when visiting the Buena Park, and we greatly appreciate that you choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  I will let our staff know how much you appreciated their service and your kind words will mean a lot to them.     If traveling to the area again, we would love for you to stay with us.   Warm Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We stayed here to be close to Knott's Berry Farm and Soak City for my daughter's 6th birthday.  The room was a pleasant surprise, like a one bedroom apartment.  Albeit, a small apartment.  We had a couch, table with 4 chairs, small fridge and microwave.  The room was very clean.  One knock would be the carpet was loose in a lot of places and needed to be stretched as someone could have easily tripped on it.  The second knock would be the sleep number mattress only worked on one of the two beds.  The free breakfast was great, but plan on there being a lot of people down there, kind of a free for all type of thing.  The pool was clean and everybody had a good time down there.  There was wifi that work sporadically in our room.  I'm not sure if it was because are room was in the
Manager Response: Dear Da_Osos,  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. we know that you had many hotel options and it means alot that you made the decision to stay with us during your trip to Buena Park. We always strive to provide our valued guests with warm and welcoming experiences and I am glad that we met your expectations.   I have noted your concerns with the carpet and the sleep number mattress and I have forwarded your conerns to our maintenance supervisor and hopefully those concerns wil be corrected.  As for the wifi, I am happy to announce that we will soon be updating our internet and wifi service and that the service should improve greatly once this is done.   On behalf of the staff at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park, I thank you very much for taking the time to write this positive review about your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Please contact us directly for any of your future reservation needs as we do greatly appreciate your choosig to stay with us.  Best Regards, Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because the location was convenient. The check inn and lobby was great. However, when we entered our room it smelt of a musty odor. The carpets looked like they had not been cleaned in AGES. On the mirror, was a smudge mark of where someone had obviously placed their nose or face on the mirror. The bathtub had sand in it; right by the drain, (Sand? We're in Buena Park, not Oceanside!) the shower also had multiple visible hairs in it. The toilet was obscene, stains and everything! We called the front desk, and we were moved to a new room, which was better. But, you could still smell the musty odor and the a/c didn't work. I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,   I am very sorry to hear that your stay was not so pleasant this past time at the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park! We have noted your comments and these matters have been discussed and addressed with all of our management team!   We take great pride in our hotel, customer service, and attention to details to insure our guest have the best experience here, so again your comments have been addressed. We hope that you do give our hotel the opportunity to host you again when visiting the Buena Park/Orange County area. If you would like to, please make the reservation with the sales office so we can insure your stay to be a pleasant experience.  Best Regards,  Dennis Banks Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with this hotel
Summary: This hotel is beautiful.  The courtyard and pool are gorgeous.  Free breakfast is a definite plus.  The rooms are spacious, quiet,, and very well-kept.  Housekeeping does a great job, though I do wish they would put more creamer and sugar in rooms  (3 packets of coffee, 2 creamers, and a few sugars-don't really add up).  Take advantage of the shuttles so you don't have to pay for costly parking (also, one of the shuttle drivers in particular is just a really fun and great guy).  Overall, I really feel like we lucked out with this hotel.  Some of the other guests were loud and inconsiderate, but that is beyond the hotel's control.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best value in OC. All of the staff was very friendly and very helpful. Bartenders and waiters were great at the managers reception really good drinks and snacks daily for free. The breakfast can't be beat for a free breakfast (mexican omellette is the best). Pool is really nice and clean. Room was very nice and very clean with lots of room for kids and parents. Free wifi and parking what else can I say. Buena Park is a nice area and right next to Knotts berry.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Loved it and will go back often
Summary: I took my son and his best friend for 5 days to Knotts/Soak City and we stayed at the Radisson.  EVERYTHING was nice.  It's within walking distance (1/2 mile) so we walked to the park every day.  It's right next door to Medieval Times and it's pretty close to a Mall with a huge arcade and movie theater.  They had complimentary breakfast too. We ate breakfast at the hotel, had lunch at the park or nearby and had dinner in our room.   The kids LOVED having the living room area with their own tv and sofa sleeper.  The staff was very helpful and the room was clean.   The only thing that didnt work very well was the Wifi but they did have cords available so you can plug in your laptop/computer.  The best part was that most of the guest were families with teenagers so the kids were
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review of the Radisson Suites Hotel Buena Park. We are very happy to hear that you really enjoyed your stay with us. We are very proud of our hotel grounds and take great pride in keeping them looking there best. I will share your comments with our staff, as we like to acknowledge them on a job well done. We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next stay in Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a great price.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights with my son & his high school band.  The hotel was full of teenagers.  So, you can imagine it got a little loud at times. The manager & staff were very friendly, helpful, and accommodating.  We requested a room change when  our neighbors upstairs became too noisy for us to get a good night's sleep. The manager made it happen in no time.  The room they moved us to was perfect.  No teenage noise.  We finally got a good night sleep.  The room was very spacious. Beds very comfortable.  Our room had 2 flat screen TVs, couch, refrigerator & microwave.  Perfect for a family.  I got my room for a great price.  Under $100 a night.  Way worth it!  Did I mention the free breakfast?  All-american breakfast.  Eggs, bacon, hash brown, toast,pancakes,
